choices: Like Little Sister, Like Big Sister
1.content:
Welcome to the "World's Strangest Adult Babies Tales"! There are eight different story plots, each with its own characters, plotline and different choices of twisted AB madness! Choose one tale:

1.) "Like Little Sister, Like Big Sister": 17-year-old Claire is stuck wasting her perfect Saturday babysitting her little 2-year-old sister, Maggie. She loves her baby sister's lifestyle and wishes she would live the same way as her...until she finds one of Maggie's pacifier and sucks on it. Soon, Claire's mother soon believes that Claire was Maggie's "twin" sister and treats her exactly the same, diapers, pacifiers, baby clothes and mind regression in all.

2.) "The Nursery of Doom": 19-year-old Anne and her friends, Emma, Amelia and Wendy, are stuck at an old haunted house when their car breaks down in the rain. Inside, the girls meets with a lonely 39-year-old maid named Amanda who allows them stay for the evening. However, Amanda brings thems into a oversized nursery as the girls begin to slowly mentally regress into little girls and Amanda adopts as her own.

3.) "From College to Kindergarden": Amy Willaims is moving to college in a fewer weeks and her 41-year-old mother Dana misses the little girl that Amy once was. Dana brings a mysterious potion and tricks Amy into drinking it. Soon, Amy begins to mentally regress into a kindergardener, a pre-schooler, a toddler, a baby and finally, a newborn.

4.) "Too 'Little' For Panties": Andy is tired of being treated like a child by her bigger sister, Dawn, and plans revenge. During Dawn's sleepover with her friends, Andy uses a magical pen, which can alter reality, to make Dawn and her friends slowly act like little girls and aren't potty trained yet.

And many more tales to choose!
1.title: Choose A Tale!

"Okay, I'll be back at 4." said 41-year-old mother, Brooke, putting her keys and wallet into her purse.

Claire sat on the couch, flipping channels on the TV. She was a 17-year-old woman, almost ready for driving, college and relationships with boys. Claire wore a pink shirt with didn't covered most of their stomach, a simple white skirt, and white sneakers. She also had shoulder-length orangish red hair and C-cup breasts.

"DID YOU HEAR ME?" shouted Brooke, snapped out of her TV-watching daze. "Yes!" Claire shouted back at her mother.

"Look, I'm sorry, but someone needs to be here for Maggie."

"Whatever. You still ruined my Saturday."

"Can't you get another date with Derek next weekend?"

"No way! He's the most hottest and popular guy in my school. I doubt that he'll remember it."

Brooke grabs her coat from the closet and puts in on. Before she walked out the door, she say, "I'm really sorry, Claire. Perhaps I could make it up for you."

"There's nothing you could do." Claire muttered, her hands crossed.

Her mother signed and closed the door behind her while Claire resumed watching TV.

12.content:
CRASH!

The thunder crashed as the rain continued to pour heavily on the road, making it harder on Anne to focus her driving. She and her other girlfriends were driving in their Anne's minivan so that they could ride over to party at their college dorms and party with their boyfriends.

The ride was almost smoothly going fine...until the car came to a sudden wet halt and was, unfortunely, stopped in a very huge mud puddle. It looks like they were going to be a little late.

"Oh, great!" shouted an angry Anne. She tried to reverse the car out of the mud, but the wheels were now too slippery by the mud to help. "NOW the car breaks down! In the rain even." You could obivous tell that Anne wasn't much on the patience side.

"Calm down, Anne." said Amelia, the most mature young woman in the car. "I'm sure that the rain will let in a few minutes and we'll be able to go back to the dorms." Amelia was the voice of reason in the group who often tried to find a more mature way to handle situations.

"Calm down? CALM DOWN?!" shouted Wendy. "We're stuck in the mud and you want us to calm down?"

Wendy was the stereotypical bratty princess who got kicked out of her private school and was sent to the college where Anne, Amelia and Emma was. Wendy's bratty attitude caused her any chance of friends, which is why she hanging out with the girls.

"All of those boys are going to be so lonely." whined Wendy.

Emma was the partially quiet one who rarely talked most of the time and felt rather welcome to Anne's group. She noticed something through her window: Emma saw a big empty-looking mansion at the top of the hill with a bit of a dismal setting placed around it.

The quiet black-haired girl tugged on Anne's shirt. A still upset Anne said, "What do you want, Emma? I'm SO not in the mood to be annoyed." Emma pointed to the mansion and Anne simply said, "It's a house. So what?"

"Maybe we could ask someone to help up in that house." said gentle Amelia.

Wendy said, "It's better than being out here in the rain."

With that, the girls quickly ran through the rain and came up to the mansion patio. Anne used the ugly-looking door-knocker and knocked on the door.

Then....
12.title: "The Nursery of Doom" Plot Beginning

They peeked into the living room where lots of baby stuffs, like a playpen, a baby walker, toys, etc, plagued the entire room. Upon closer inpection, the girls noticed that the baby stuff were actually large enough for them.

The beds were well made, there was a plasma screen TV, several bean-bag chairs, the latest consoles, and even the carpet was sparkling...somehow. This left Anne stuck next to Wendy. "Joy," she sarcastically muttered to herself, causing Amanda to giggle. -----[Note, it's optional to continue from here or have something else]
Emma was awoken by a blood curdling scream coming from Wendy. She, as well as Anne and Amelia, threw off their covers to see what the fuss was about. What they saw was surprising. Wendy was wearing a green, silk, button-up night-shirt, and her hair had some green highlights, but that wasn't what the focus was on. What the trio was looking at was the diaper Wendy was wearing, which looked to be about 10" thick, and very wet and messy, the green tapes of which Wendy tried to remove but couldn't. The only differences were that Amelia's highlights, shirt, and diaper tapes were red, and that her diaper was heavily wet, but only 25% as bad as Wendy's. Another difference was that Anne had only wet her diaper 50% as much as Wendy. Emma, however, wasn't so lucky, having wet herself 75% as much as Wendy, but also messing herself 50% as much as her. Out of sheer embarrassment, Emma started tearing up too before jumping into Amelia's hug. Anne, however, was confused, mortified, furious, and furiously happy all at the same time.

Suddenly, Amanda barged in, looking like she had run a mile. "Girls! I forgot to tell...you..." she looked at the diaper-clad girls and sighed. "I'm too late, aren't I?" All of them looked at her confused until she said "How about I change all of you and then explain the situation?"

Long story short, the room was actually enchanted and they were slowly going to experience different changes. "Wait, this has happened before?" Amelia felt the need ask. "Yes, to a young girl who loved adventure," Amanda said as she tried to avoid eye contact, "and payed the price." It didn't take long for Amelia, Anne, and Emma to figure out who it was, but Wendy took her sweet time. When she finally did figure it out, she opened her mouth to speak, only to be interrupted by Amanda. "H-hey! How about breakfast?!"

1231.content:
Later, Anne slowly stirred from her slumber. "What happened?" That's when Anne found herself in a giant adult-sized crib.
She tried to sit up, but she found that she had been restrained. Non-metal shackles - the type associated with hospitals and mental institutions - had been applied to her wrists and ankles. They were pinned down at her sides and she could barely even move then an inch or two above the mattress she was lying on.
At the very least, she managed to look down at her body. That was when she realized she was that her clothes had been removed. She was wearing nothing except a huge, thick, soft disposable diaper. There were little designs of teddy bears around the top of the white diaper.
"Hello?" Anne called out. "Is anyone there? Hello!"
There was silence for a moment. Then a voice said faintly "Anne? Is that you?"
It was Amelia. "Amelia, where are you? Are you alright?"
"I'm fine." her friend replied, "But I'm a little... tied up at the moment."
Amelia was in the exact same position as Anne: shackled, naked except for a diaper, and locked in a crib.
"It's so dark in here; I can't see a thing!" said Anne.
"We've got to try to get out of here." Amelia decided.
The two girls struggled to break free of their bonds, but to no avail. They were very tight. Before long, Wendy and Emma came around. They too had been shackled, stripped, diapered, and placed in two different cribs.
Shortly after all four girls regained consciousness, they heard a creaking sound, like a door being opened. Just then, a figure entered the room and turned on the lights. The figure was a woman whom none of the girls had seen before. The woman had long, poofy pink hair and wore a black maid's outfit. She looked about in her mid-30's. She had a pleasant-looking smile on her face as she surveyed the room with the four terrified diapered girls.
"Who are you?" demanded Emma.
"What do you want from us?" shouted Wendy.
"Let us go!" yelled Amelia.
"Shhhh, my darlings. I know you must be frightened; you've had a long night. But do not worry, I will look after you." The woman gently assured the girls, speaking very sweetly. "My name is Amanda, and I'll be your mommy from now on."
"Why are you doing this?" asked Anne, "Please, let us out of these things."
"I cannot do that," Amanda responded, "It is well past your bedtime. You must go to sleep and I will explain everything in the morning."
"No, we DEMAND to be released, you have no right to hold us against our will!" Anne shouted.
Amanda slowly walked up to Anne's crib and looked down at her. She could tell that the teenager was frightened, but not so much as she was angry.
"Please quiet down and get your rest, sweetie," was all she said.
"No, I will not calm down!" screamed Annie, "And don't you call me 'sweetie!' Release me and my friends now, or we will scream until someone comes for us!"
Amanda sighs and states "I cannot allow that. You leave me with no choice."

Amanda moved to the front of Anne's crib and removed a small key from her pocket. She unlocked a little door at the front of the crib and brought down that part of it. Then she removed a long white scarf from her other pocket. She held onto its ends and leaned near the front of the cribs.
Anne tried to look over her shoulder, but her shackled wrists made it difficult for her to turn her body very much.
"What are you doing?" she asked, sounding both worried and angered.
"Shhh..." was all Amanda said. She moved her hands over Anne's pillows and brought the center of the scarf directly over Anne's mouth. Anne struggled to shake the cloth away, but Amanda was strong. After pulling the scarf's center over her lips, Amanda pulled the ends of the scarf back and tied them tightly at the back of Anne's head. As a result, Anne's remarks were reduced to muffled cries.
"Mmmmmph!" Anne tried to scream through her gag. But it was tied tightly over her mouth.
Amanda closed the small door to Anne's crib and locked it back up.
Then she went around the room, doing the same thing to Wendy, Emma, and Amelia. About ten minutes later, all four of the girls were tightly gagged. They struggled to break free, but to no avail.
Amanda just smiled and said "Goodnight, my dears. I'll see you in the morning." Then she turned out the lights, left the room, and closed the door. Then she securely locked it behind her.
The four girls had no intention of going to sleep yet. Not without at least attempting to break free. They tried as hard as they could to slip their hands and feet out of the shackles, but they were firmly applied. The shackles were strangely soft and gentle, yet they were virtually impossible to escape from.
Eventually, the girls tired of their futile effort to struggle. They all found themselves becoming strangely tired. After all, it had been a long night and they hadn't gotten any sleep all day. One by one, they all succumbed to drowsiness. First Emma, then Amelia, then Wendy.
Anne was soon the only one left. She sighed and worried how this could have all happened. She and her three closest friends were being held prisoner by a deranged woman who was intent on babying them for God knows how long.
When Anne finally did decide to try to sleep and to worry about plans of escape later on, she noticed for the first time just how comfortable the diaper she was wearing was. It was tight yet bulky, and it caressed every part of her crotch. Also, the bed she was lying on felt very soft; definitely a far cry from sitting up in the driver's seat of her car all day.
Anne even noticed that part of the diaper rubbed up against her most sensitive area. It felt heavenly to her. Despite being in a totally helpless situation, she decided to enjoy getting a little rest before she worked up a plan to get herself and her friends out of the nursery.
After calming herself down, she slowly drifted off into a peaceful slumber.

13.content:
"Sigh."

Dana Willaims, 41-year-old mother of one, sighed as she peer through Amy's old baby books. Amy was Dana's eldest daughter who was heading to Harvard University into a couple and was going to "leave the nest". Dana looked at some of Amy's baby pictures. Some were pictures of Amy was a little 4-year-old girl who was practicing potty-training. Others were about Amy when she was a baby, crawling on the floor naked and sucking her paci happily.

"Where's that little girl now?" Dana cried softly, her tears dropping on the picture.

Just then, Amy walked into the scene where she saw her mother crying a bit. "Mom, what's wrong?" Amy asked.

Dana quickly wiped her tears and said, "Nothing. I'm just a little depressed that you're heading off to college soon."

Amy replied, "Mom, chill. I'm gonna come back....in four years."

"Ohhh, why couldn't you be a little girl forever, Amy?"

"Sorry. It was bound to happen."

```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````` ```````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````` ````````````````````````

141212111121.content:
You stand in the kitchen--the pen in your pocket--watching as Dawn's friends pile up into the house. You've seen them all before, and try to remember what you can of them.

There's the really weirdly-skinny hispanic looking girl, about Dawn's age. She always seemed really nervous around Dawn for some reason.

There's the really big, tall, chubby girl, who looked about your age. You really didn't like her very much; she smelt and wore ugly baggy shirts. Dawn makes fun of her to her face almost all the time, but she still sticks around and tries to be liked. One time, you asked your sister why she let's a girl she doesn't like be around her; Dawn said that it's because of the funny jokes and interesting stories she tells, makes her fun to have at a party.

There's the Hungarian girl. She looks about seventeen. If there's anything interesting about her as a person, you never noticed because you were always too distracted by her accent.

There's Sherry; the kind of pale-skinned, smooth-black-haired girl who may actually be a bit older than Dawn, (but maybe not). If there's one person who's almost as popular at your school as your sister, it's her. But few people no how much Dawn subtly demeans and intimidates Sherry. You actually feel sorry for her, she seems like a girl who actually deserves to be popular; she's nice and friendly. But you've picked up on the suspicion that Sherry feels that, if she stops hanging out with Dawn, her popularity will decline.

And then, at last, there's the only other girl whose name you know: Katie. She's a bit small and perky; her build is minimalistic, and she's always talking about her passionate hobbies. You have a major crush on her; big time huge powerful crush, and have for two years now. Especially when you found out that she's two months younger than you, and that she shares more than a few of your interests.

You actually were pretty confident around her, and even did some light flirting together from time to time. However, she wasn't interested. You figured you could do a better job impressing her, but then Dawn told you to stay away from her, so you were forced to give up. You've been pretty torn up about that, in fact, and get close to crying any day that you've been around her.


That's all of your sister's friends. Your Mom greets them, and tells them that they've the basement for their sleepover party.

After they spend a few minutes in there, your mom comes to you and says,
"Now Andy, obviously, you're not allowed to go into the basement at all until tomorrow afternoon, okay?"

"Sure mom." You reply.

You spend the next half hour sitting behind your desk, thinking meticulously about what you're going to do with the pen. You can faintly hear the energetic fun being had downstairs, and finally think of a good way to go about it.

"Andy was able to walk down into the basement, and no one would notice he was there" You wrote on a piece of paper.

You got up, and opened the basement door, right in front of your mom--who didn't even turn look at you--and then stepped downstairs.
You reach the bottom of the basement, and none of the six girls even react to your presence in any way.

Right, time to take action. You walk right into the middle of the basement and sit behind a table with a piece of paper--wielding your pen. You sit there, enamored with the sights and sounds of an unfiltered slumber party taking place right in front of your face. You snap yourself out of it and write on the paper,

"Suddenly, ______________ panties turned into a diaper, and __________ bladder and bowels were cognitively regressed to that of a three-year-old."

You left those blank spots there, because you couldn't decide who you wanted it to affect: your sister Dawn, or every girl at the party. You go back, and decide...

You slide your chair away from the desk. A single drop of sweat drips down your forehead and you feel your underwear poof out and expand. You unzip your pants and look; what used to be dark-blue boxer briefs is now a bright, thick, white diaper.

You sat there, in your filth, about to cry. You sat up and down a few times and uncomfortably wiggled around in the soiled diaper; it felt absolutely horrible.

And then your clothes started to ripple around.
"Oh no oh no no no no no please no!" You writhed around in the chair. "Please please stop oh please stop!" You exclaimed as your shirt and pants molded together and quickly poofed out into a magenta-colored dress that fit you just right. It actually looked quite a bit different than the one that had grown on your sister, interestingly enough; it wasn't just a few sizes smaller. But it was still frilly, still magenta, and actually looked even more juvenile.

You watched as your door opened.
"Andy! What are you doing up here? You're supposed to be downstairs where we can keep an eye on you." Dawn says, coming to grab you by the hand.

"Wait, wait stop!" You say, breaking up into tears, when suddenly you see the entire last eighteen months of school education that you have remembered flash in your vision in a single second, and then vanish.

Dawn takes your hand and gets you up on your feet. Right after that, you feel every single important thing you know about life disappear. All at once, the world suddenly became much more confusing and hard to grasp, to you.

Your sister pulls you out of your room and into the hall.
"Dawn! Stop it! This is really important! Please!" You say, struggling as you feel your sense of balance shrink dramatically and almost slip and fall; your body feels so much more unwieldy; you can't resist Dawn's pulling anymore.

"No seriously, Dawn, please lissen tuh... tuh muh... I muhh... ahhh... bllthh!" With tears now soaking your cheeks, you feel almost all the vocabulary you know become unobtainable; you can't think of the right word for anything, and can barely pronounce anything correctly.

"Quit protesting. You need a diaper change." Dawn says, guiding you to the upstairs bathroom. As your big sister opens a cabinet--surprisingly, to reveal a package of diapers your size--and pulls out a fresh diaper for you, you feel all of your mental capacity and critical faculties snap and fall apart; you can no longer think clearly, or at least not in the same way. You're trying desperately to keep planning about how to solve this problem, but, no; now your mind fills purely with how sad you are right now.

The tears are practically flooding into your mouth, and your face is 100% red in every spot, as Dawn grabs you by your arms and lowers you down on the cold tile floor, and flaps your girly dress out of the way, proceeding to untape and open your diaper.

It is when your big sister leans forward and wipes you that you feel your soul crumble; you literally feel like you just fell from the ceiling to the floor. You no longer even think of yourself as a fifteen-year-old; you perceive yourself as a three-year-old, in the way that that's how it's always been. Your mental regression into a toddler is complete.

"There, all clean." Dawn says, adjusting the inner-leg-area of your diaper and getting you back on your feet, then washing her hands and brings you down to the basement with her.

The girls all look at you and giggle; you've stopped crying, but your face is covered in tears, and seeing them looking at you like this is keeping you blushing. Dawn sits you on a bean bag and lets you set there and play while the girls do other things.

One surprising thing, actually, is that you still have your memory. Intellectually, you remember that you were once a fifteen-year-old who used the potty like big sister, and you know that you have a powerful wish-granting pen in your room, and you know that your entire perceived reality right now is an illusion created by the pen after you misused it.

However, you can't pull yourself together; you're sad right now, and that sentiment is completely monopolizing your thoughts and feelings. You have no sense of maturity and little sense of priorities; you can't stop thinking about how much you don't like having to wear diapers, and how much you hated having Dawn see you naked; and how much you don't like wearing girl's clothes. You're still choking on your shortness of breath caused by crying.

However, the intellectual side of your brain is still trying as hard as it can to stay active in your conscious and at least give you a little restraint. You manage to at least hold your tongue and not tell anyone about the Alter Pen.

You plan on waiting it out the next 24 hours, until the pen is usable again. In the mean time, you sho--WHOOPS, you lost control of your thoughts again and see a small chair and want to run to it.

Katie feels more and more confident when she uses them for their intended purpose. On top of that, she doesn't change her diapers immediately, she only changes herself when it's necessary."

15112111111.content:
Mike was confused by a lot of things. His brother had somehow made him his twin? They had twin telepathy? Would he change back? How did this happen? And, most importantly, why was he standing around questioning these things when Barney was on? “Sure!” He exclaimed, before running past his brother and enthusiastically sitting down in front of the TV, completely hypnotized. “Hehe, wait up!” Brandon giggled as he ran up to sit beside his brother.

Mike was completely fixated on it. He wasn’t sure why, but he loved it. He was singing the songs, and actually answering any questions Barney asked him, even if he knew it was just a show. Nicky giggled “Boy, your bwo sure wikes Bawney.” Brandon laughed “Yea, we watch it all the time at my house.” Mike was too busy watching the show to care what they were talking about. He was somewhat aware of his former girlfriend talking to someone outside, but couldn’t make out what they were saying. He was too invested in Barney to care.

Eventually the show went off to another, to Mike’s disappointment. He could’ve watched it forever, but with it off, was finally aware of the fact the he, a 17-year-old boy, had just spent the past hour and a half watching Barney, a show for toddlers, and enjoying it. He had gone from sitting on the ground, to lying on his stomach in front of the TV. It was weird. “Aww, it’s ovew alweady.” Nicky sighed. “It’ll come on again tomowwow.” Brandon said cheerfully, which somehow made Mike feel better about everything, strangely enough. Nicky yawned, “I’m tiwed anyway…” Mike was suddenly aware of how exhausted he was. “Yeah, me too.” He said rubbing his eyes.

“Well, it sounds like it’s about naptime for you boys.” He heard a gruff voice say, to his surprise. He looked behind him and saw a buff, older man standing in the doorway. He recognized him immediately. “Papa!” Nicky cooed, as he got up and waddled over to him and hugged his leg. It was Sharon’s dad, Sean. She said he’d be at work. The man ruffled Nicky’s hair as Nicky snuggled against him. Mike was now aware that his girlfriend’s dad was seeing him in a diaper, and his face went red. Where was Sharon?

As if to answer him, the grizzled man said “Apparently Sharon had a date tonight, so she couldn’t stick around” He bent down and picked Nicky up, holding him in his muscular arms, “I’ll be filling in for her for the rest of the night.” Mike was shocked. Sharon was supposed to be on a date with him. Did Brandon’s wish change it so she had another boyfriend? Was she cheating on him? His mind reeled until Brandon poked him in the side. “Eh, it’s awight. We don’t wike giwls anyway, wight Mikey?” He smiled. Mike wasn’t sure if he believed that or not.

The older man walked over to them “Don’t worry though, I’m great with kids. Raised three of them myself!” He boasted and let out a hearty laugh that Mike was strangely comforted by. “Now, as I was saying, it looks like you boys are ready for bed.” He knelt down, placing Nicky on the ground, and picked Mike up. Mike was too shocked to protest, and he couldn’t if he wanted to anyway, not against a man as big as Sean. He was practically a mountain. “You’re a big boy, aint’cha?” He chuckled and looked down at Brandon. “So Brandon, right? And you must be Mikey. Sharon told me how to tell you guys apart.” Brandon laughed. “Yeah, Mikey’s a wittle big.” Mike was embarrassed. His girlfriend’s dad was holding him up, treating him like a baby, and he couldn’t do anything about it. “Alright, let’s get you boys ready for naptime. We gotta eat first though.” Mike realized that he was pretty hungry. Food didn’t sound so bad right about now. But then Sean said something that made him even more humiliated than before. “Looks like you boys could use some diaper changes though.” He felt Mike’s crotch, and Mike realized he was soaked.

He wet himself, while watching Barney, and didn’t realize it. Just like a baby. And now, his girlfriend’s dad was gonna change him. And he couldn’t do anything about it. All of this, all at once, was too much for Mike. Tears welled in his eyes, and within moments, he was bawling. “Aww, shh, shh, it’s okay.” Sean comforted him, holding him close and rocking him. “Don’t worry, Da-da’s gonna get ya cleaned up in a jiffy, it’ll be alright.” Mike was crying his eyes out into his shirt. “Mikey! Mikey! It’s okay” Brandon reassured him “Wook! I wet myself too, see?” He motioned to his sagging crotch, which was discolored from some diaper leakage. By the looks of things, he wet much more heavily than Mike did. “Aww, you guys really are twins.” Sean chuckled, cradling Mike. It helped, strangely enough. Without realizing it, Mike had started sucking on his thumb. “See Mikey, it’s perfectly normal for boys your age to have accidents, and we’ll get you cleaned up in no time.” He looked down at him and spoke in a fatherly tone of voice. Mike had stopped crying and was now just sucking his thumb and burying his face in Sean’s chest, wondering when this would end. “You two could definitely use changes.” Sean said, scooping up Brandon into his other arm. “What about you, Nickster? You need a change?” Nicky nodded excitedly while Sean motioned for his son to follow him to a changing table.

Setting Brandon and Mike down on the table, Sean ruffled their hair a bit and smiled as he got out changing supplies. “Alright, who wants to go first?” He said, looking at the two of them. Mike wanted…

The game continued on, and in spite of himself, Mikey really enjoyed it. He had trouble occationally counting up all the numbers on the dice but Brandon could do it for him. As he went through all the areas of candyland, the big baby often let out childish coos and squeals of delight, bouncing up and down on his diapered butt when he got closer and closer to the end.

152.content:
Space.

Is it nothing more than a simple black empty void, or some strange force that no man has ever known? Did you know that a massive and mysterious comet comes across the galaxy every 200 years? It was called Noisserger's Flame, a mighty comet which, according to most legends, would subtly alter the very fabric of reality without warning.

For years, the innocent people of Earth never noticed the vast and immediate changes to their lives or even history; heck, they'd be surprised if Noisserger's Flame actually CAUSED dinosaurs to disappear and inspired people to create many inventions like the car, the toaster, etc. Most of the time, good things would come out of the Flame's passing.....

....but sometimes fate looks the other way when BAD things come around. Was it fate that brought this strange fates to these innocent peoples? It'll be up to you to find out how "innocent" they'll be afterwards.

(Note: The choices below have NO connection to one another and are each their seperate stories.)
152.title: "Broken Reality" Plot Beginning

1521.content:
Meet Felicity Robinson.

She's probably the most well-known and most popular gal on her campus, wowing the boys and acing the grades. However, underneath all that glamour and praise, she's a TOTALLY different person; she's bratty, immature and quite shallow towards her rivals and anyone else who dares looks at her funny. Felicity considers as "the most important female mind of the entire student body" with almost everyone basically annoyed by her giant ego.

About two weeks is her graduation where she eagerly awaits to be an "adult". With the comet passing by, perhaps fate has come to put her in back and turn her entire world upside down.

What does the comet's magicks have in store for her?
1521.title: Felicity's Story

15211.content:
When Felicity woke up, she knew something was wrong. But she couldn't put her finger on it...what was it? Hopping out of bed, she looked down at her PJ's, nope, same fairy onesie she wore last night. In fact her room was completely normal, all her pony toys in one corner, her stuffed animals in another, and the whole room was painted in various shades of pink, with lots of fairy posters on the wall a short well.

"Kitty," her mommy called from the hall "are you up yet?"

Felicity walked over to the doorway and opened it and looked at the hall, and it was the same as well. "Yes mommy!" She yelled.

"Take your PJ's off before coming downstairs!" Her mom yelled back up.

Felicity worked hard to get to wear PJ's, she'd proven she was a big girl, because she only had to crawl to use the stairs, she could identify animal sounds and pictures, and she could count to five! Finally the Velcro gave way, and she hopped out, clapping her hands, before grabbing her fairy princess doll and heading downstairs. Her brother Max wasn't a big boy yet, he still couldn't walk yet, despite him only being two years younger. Mommy said everybody grows up differently, everybody go through the....the 2 stages of life she said, at different speeds, baby first then toddler.

Once downstairs, Mommy called her over to the changing mat on the floor of the living room, and began to change Felicity's diaper. "Sleep good Kitty?" She asked as she wiped.

"Uh-huh!" Felicity said around her thumb, which she'd put in her mouth at some point. "Nummies!" She cried as her mom guided her head up to her boobies. She loved breakfast, it was the first of two meals where she was breastfed, the other being dinner, since daycare didn't have anough boobies to go around.

As she was enjoying her breakfast, she saw her Max crawling naked on the floor, chasing a ball, his pee-pee swinging penulously under him as he awkwardly chased after the ball. Felicity thought boy pee-pees were weird, at least girls had boobies! They were fun to play with, and you could get nummies out of them!

She finished her breakfast and her mommy burped her, before setting her down so that mommy could go get dressed for work. Felicity thought about what she'd want to wear today. Definitely her fairy wings, maybe a tutu? She decided to play with Max for a bit, rolling the ball away from him, having it bounce off the wall back to her, he was so easy to entertain.

Mommy came back all dressed up, her hair up in pigtails, wearing a frilly dress that was doing nothing to hide mommies diaper, and she decided to go barefoot. She pulled Max over and diapered him before having felicity follow her upstairs to get dressed, both mommy and felicity had to crawl to go upstairs, so she was almost a big as mommy!

"Well kitty, what do ou want to wear today?" Mommy asked as she began to go through Felicity's diaper drawer, taking out enough for daycare.

"I wanna be a fairy!" She squealed, imagining herself being the prettiest girl at daycare today, all the other will be jealous!

"Ok Kitty." Mommy said bringing the fairy wings over to her "Arms up!" Felicity complied, allowing her arms to slide easily through the straps, and mommy handed her her wand. "Do you want a shirt or a dress too?"

"I wanna tutu!" Felicity squeaked, "A pink one!"

Mommy helped her into the tutu, put Felicity's hair up in pigtails, and then grabbed the diaper bag for the siblings and loaded them up in the car. Had felicity knew that today's she'd be going to daycare at 20 wearing a diaper, fairy wings, and a tutu, baring her boobies for all to see, she'd have called you crazy.

She looked out at the neighborhood, seeing the mail lady deliver a big box before she bent over and made a big poopie in her diaper. She saw Gwen, her best frien, and her mommy getting in their car, she saw a mommy and her son playing nakie in the sprinkler. She was so jealous! Maybe mommy and her could play in the sprinkler after daycare!

"Mommy!" Felicity yelled from the back passanger seat "Can we play in the sprinkler when we get home?"

"Sure Kitty!" Mommy said smiling. Mommy a,ways made her feel good, ever since this morning when...That's right! She felt like something was changed, but everything looked the same! Maybe .Gwen and her could play detective, and solve this mystery.

Mommy pulled up to daycare, wheeling Max in on an oversized stroller, while Felicity skipped into the building, boobies bouncing merrily, which caused her to laugh. "Bye-bye mommy!" She called as she was led to her room, she was so excited to play detective with Gwen when she got here!

As she waited, she decided to play with blocks, and Ms. Stacy came over and told her she had to get her diapey changed, she looked down, and realized she made a poopie, so she followed Ms. Stacy to the changing table, she hopped up and let her nice teacher change her. She was so nice, maybe she'd let her play nakie!

"No diapey!" She yelled as she grabbed her feet and exposed herself to the world for all to see "Wanna be nakie!"

Ms. Stacy simply nodded and let Felicity play with her blocks, everyone had a nudie phase that came around every no where and then, just like "no" phases and "mine" phases, it'd pass eventually and return.

Does Gwen remember the world before the relation shift, or is she mentally a toddler too?
15211.title: Reality instantly changes without warning.

152111.content:
Felicity was a happy naked toddler, wearing only her tutu and a smile, she played with the animal toys in front of her, making sounds for the animals she didn't and repeating the sounds she knew for the animals she didn't know. Gwen was brought in by her mommy, and when she saw Felicity (Kitty from now on), she smiled and toddled over, before she fell on her padded bum and crawled the rest of the way over.

"Kitty!" Gwen sang as she hugged her bestest friend.

"Gwen!" Kitty yelled back "I'm nakie!" She rolled on her back, exposing her bum and her pee-pee to her friend.

Gwen pouted, nakie was so fun! "I wanna be nakie!" She cried as she ripped her diapey off, laughing as Kitty chased her across the room.

Ms. Stacy walked to the front of the class and called for everybody's to take their seats, it was time for class. "Today, we gonna learn about Green!" She said as she held up a card wit her lots of greens, some dark and some light.

As Ms. Stacy was asking her students to name things that were green, Lilly, Kitty's other friend, leaned over and said "You not nakie". Kitty looked over at her friend. "You's gots a tutu on, that's not nakie."

Despite having nothing on her body that could offer her any modesty, not even an infantile garment as a diaper, the logic made sense to Kitty, who pouted and began pulling at her tutu in an effort to get if off. Eventually she succeeded and tossed the offending garment behind her, hugging her friends close rubbing their boobies together with hers.

"Kitty," Ms. Stacy called out, bringing her back to the present. "What's something that's green?"

Kitty thought hard and long, she looked at the big card, all the greens on there, but being put on the spot like that frazzled her, and she began to look around the room until she saw a green pony toy lying in front of the cubbies. "A pony!" Kitty yelled, while pointing at the toy.

Ms. Stacy looked over and smiled "Good job!" But before she could go any further, she bent forward and her face suddenly was focused on a singular task, making poopie. Her face turned a little red, and she stuck her tongue out focusing entirely on trying to make poopie that she'd forgotten about her students. A loud chain of farts erupted from her diaper, and she sighed as it sagged noticeably.

"Ms. Stacy made poopie!" Mikey in the back yelled out, causing the class to laugh at their teacher. Ms Stacy waddled over to get a change from Ms. Polly, the assistant teacher.

As that was happening, the snack bell rang, and the three naked friends all got in line to get their snack boxes. Ms. Polly called them over, telling them that they'd have to have a diapey if they wanted snacks, and the three friends sadly agreed for their snacks.

Kitty, Lilly and Gwen all sat down having their snacks when Kitty remembered to ask about the weird feeling this morning. "I feeled weird this morning." She said "Did you guys?"

Gwen shook her head "no" while drinking her juice box.

Lilly nodded vigorously, sending her pigtails flying "Lilly feel weird, then I gets nummies from mommy and I feel all better!"

Kitty nodded, the same thing happened to her this morning. So it could be that they were just feeling funny. As snack time wound down, the various adult toddlers began to yawn and head over to have a nap.

Kitty was thinking about what to play after nap time. Play on the playground, or play inside?
152111.title: Gwen's a toddler

1521111.content:
After naptime Kitty and her friends set out on the playground to wait until their mommies came home to pick them up. Kitty and Lilly were playing worth the pony toys while Gwen was having the time of their life on a tiny plastic slide. Kitty couldn't shake the feeling that something was still wrong. What could it be? Her friends were normal, her class was normal, they were about to graduate to Daycare 2, where they'd learn more stuff.

But something still felt off. Lilly was giggling and pointing at Kitty, which confused her, until she looked down and saw that she'd peed herself. She toddled over to Ms. Polly who happily changed her as she made horsie sounds for the pony in her hands.

When Ms. Polly was done, Kitty took off running, before plopping down with Lilly again to play with the ponies. Mikey, who'd been her boyfriend before the reality shift, was busy running around nakie with his pee-pee out for all to see. She giggled, she liked to go nakie too, but mommy was coming soon to pick her up, mommy didn't want bare bums in the car.

She looked around at the rest of her class, watching them play on the swings, in the sandbox, running nakie, something still felt weird. She got up and went back in the classroom, and saw student drawing with crayon, playing with toys, or taking another nap, she liked naps, but if she was woke up from one, she'd throw a big tantrum. She should---that train of thought was interrupted when she felt the call of nature, like her teacher earlier, she bent forward and focus on making poopie. She shut her eyes hard and pushed, before a loud fart echoed in the classroom and Ms. Stacy looked up at her and waved her over to the changing table.

As Ms. Stacy was changing her, Kitty had a thought. "Ms. Stacy, you feel weird before daycare today?"

Ms. Stacy looked at Kitty funny before nodding. "I felt like I supposed to be smarterer, but it go away when I maked poopie." That was weird! A teacher saying they're supposed to be smarterer? How much smarts can a person have?

"Kitty" hearing her name called, she turned her head and saw Mommy and Max at the door. "Time to go home!"

Once Ms. Stacy was done changing her diaper, Kitty ran to meet her mom before holding hands and leaving daycare. "Kitty." She over at her mommy "We have to go to the mall for foods." Kitty smiled, the liked the mall, so bright and colorful, she couldn't wait!
1521111.title: Playground

15211111.content:
Had Kitty retained some memory of the world before the shift, she would've practically fainted at what the mall looked like now. Clothing stores advertised the most childish of garments, men and boy's clothing seemed to focus on trucks and dinosaurs and whatever passed for sports in this new reality. While girls clothing had become frilly and girly, colored in pastels, or focused on fairies, ponys, princesses, and cute animals. Whenever anybody seemed to wear anything at all, it seemed that along with potty training, modesty seemed to have been swept away, the only constant was the diaper, though there were those in the "nakie phase" that would do everything in their power to stay nakie.

As mommy pushed Max's stroller through the mall, Kitty looked as all the bright colors, and all the pretty pictures. She saw the big playplace in the center of the mall, its slides and tunnels and bright colors, "Mommy, can I go play?" She pointed and made a pouty face. That normally worked.

Mommy looked and she said "No. We have to get stuff. Maybe next time." Kitty pouted and looked back on the play place as it vanished around the corner. Mommy led Kitty into a big store, it had lots of stuff on the shelves! "Alright Kitty, let's get--". Mommy stopped as she bent forward and began to push, her face running red as she focused hard on making poopie. Finally she straightened up as her diaper sagged noticeably behind her beneath her frilly skirt.

"Mommy!" Max called from the stroller "I went poopie!" Mommy sighed and pushed Max over to one of the changing tables in the store and Hagen to change his diaper. Kitty took this time to look at the people around her, she still had that weird feeling that something was different.

She saw a girl her age and her mommy wearing matching diapers, which was cute, she saw a girl pushing her older sister around in a stroller, while a bit odd considering their age, everybody grew up at different speeds (had she been able to count that high, the younger girl was about 12 and her older sister was about 19). She looked over at another family and saw a daddy changing the mommy's diaper, as much as she looked she couldn't see anything that looked strange or made her feel weird.

Mommy hopped up on the changing table and began to change herself, and Kitty looked around some more, this time at the shelves, they had baby bottles, sippy cups, lunch boxes. Everything that the store normally had, and the changing tables were usually in use at some point during the day as a mommy or a daddy or a family needed to use one.

Mommy hopped down from the changing table and began to grab some colorful food boxes off the shelf, Kitty reached for a pretty box that had a fairy on it 'fairy snacks' the box read. "Mommy, mommy!" Kitty held the box right in mommy' face "can we get these?"

Mommy took the box and put it back on the shelf "No Kitty, we don't need these, maybe next time." Kitty pouted and followed mommy to the front of the store where she had a card go through a funny flat thing before they left.

Once they got home and mommy had put away the groceries, she put max out on the front yard where he crawled around playing with his toys, and mommy took Kitty out on the porch so that mommy could keep and eye on both of them. "Does Kitty want nummies?" Mommy asked as she took her dress off

Kitty's eyes grew and she smiled one of the biggest smiles all day "Yes! I want Nummies!" Kitty waited until mommy sat down and she was about to lay down to get numkies when Max crawled up and took one of mommy' boobies. She pouted, she liked having both boobies to herself. Mommy pulled her down and let Kitty have her other booby.

Just like that, the funny feeling disappeared as she suckled on mommy' booby on the front porch in for the whole world to see.
15211111.title: The mall, but for toddlers

152111111.content:
Kitty yawned as she woke up from her nap. Looking around, she was laying on a fluffy blanket in the living room, in the same state of partial dress as earlier, naked except for their diaper. As she slowly woke up, she saw mommy and Max both napping on their nap blankets too. Even though mommy gave her nummies, she still felt like something was strange, different, even though she couldn't figure it out.

She crawled out into the hall and headed up the stairs, maybe if she looked around she could find the weird thing! She'd already checked her room this morning, so Max's was next. Crawling into his room, she took a good look around, seeing stuffed animals, diapers, everything seemed normal. But what about mommies room?

She tried to stand up as she went down the hall, but it felt like her legs had been weakened, she could toddle, but her steps were unbalanced, so she had to walk slowly. Once she got to mommies room, she took a good look around. Honestly, it had pretty much the same kind of stuff that her room did, fairies, stuffed animals, frilly dresses. But she felt like there was something making her feel weird right here in this room! As she toddled unsteadily through the room, she passed mommies big mirror.

Looking at it, she saw a lady! A lady with her hair in pigtails just like her! Kitty giggled when she saw the lady, she was nakie! Well, except for the soaked diaper she was wearing. Wait....big girls didn't wear diapers, did they?

For some reason, she found herself really confused. Why did the lady have her boobies out? Kitty looked down at herself, her boobies were out, she had a diaper on too, was the diaper what was wrong? She began to tear at the sides until she succeeded and the soiled diaper fell onto the floor. Looking down at her hairless body, she felt happy at freeing herself from the bad diaper!

Looking back at the lady, she saw that the lady got rid of her diaper too! Kitty decided to be friendly and wave at the nakie lady. The lady waved at the exact same time! Kitty giggled, and the lady did too! This was fun! Kitty sat down and decided to hide from the lady, she covered her eyes, feeling so smart, but when she peeked through her fingers, the nakie lady was doing that's too! But her shortened attention span began to kick in, and she began looking around the room sucking her thumb, eventually she came back to the mirror, and saw the naked lady sucking her thumb...big girls didn't do that, did they?

Suddenly she found that she didn't know what big girls did anymore, and she took her thumb out of her mouth and reached out the the naked lady before her hand bumped up on the glass. She began to feel really funny and giggly, before taking her hand and sticking as many fingers in it as she could, watching the nakielady doing the same, she could only giggle, laying on the floor with her fingers in her mouth staring at the spinning ceiling fan as her chances to return to normal began to dwindle.
152111111.title: Later in the day....

choices: Felicity explains the reality change to Kitty
1521111112.content:
A few minutes in, and Kitty's mindless gaze towards the ceiling fan had started to take its own toll on her short attention span. She continued to subconsciously suckle on her fingers with a steady stream of spittle and drool to escaping the corners of her mouth. Her slumped posture jumped back to the usual crawling position and headed for the door, which prompted something strange to catch the corner of her eye.

In the mirror -- which had accumulated several large fingerprints and drool stains thanks to Kitty's playing, had suddenly projected a much different image. The lady from before who copied her every move had disappeared -- replacing her with another woman looking exactly like her, only for the reflection to wear clothing that Kitty didn't seem to recognise.

The reflection seemed to be wearing clothes. Fancy clothes, and Kitty couldn't figure out why the lady was wearing them. A pair of blue jeans, stylish brown boots and a cream cardigan weren't infantile in any reasonable manner at all.

"That's weird." Kitty chided, "You aren't nakie."

"Am I supposed to be?" The reflection responded. It took a few seconds for the response to sink into Kitty's head -- a response which made the reflection smile ever-so slightly more than before. "I could ask why you're sitting in Mother's bedroom naked. You look like a big baby without any clothes on," The reflection's eyes met at the discarded diaper. "Oh, I see. You're supposed to be wearing diapers but you took it off instead."

"Diapies are good." Kitty responded, her blank expression soon turned to an annoyed look. "Babies and toddlers use diapers, they're good." She couldn't understand why she went on the defence for diapers. A moment ago, she felt weird just wearing them, which further added to the strange feeling she was experiencing.

"Whatever." The reflection rolled her eyes, "I'm Felicity. What's your name?"

"Kitty." Kitty responded. She felt obliged to reach out, only for her drool-sodden hand to press against the mirror's glass.

"Wonderful." Felicity's smile eventually weakened, "I've got something important to tell you. You need to listen carefully." Her face became serious.
1521111112.title: Kitty/Felicity regains some lucid thoughts

choices: Playtime outside where she feels funny again
Playtime outside where evything feels normal
15211111121.content:
"Listen," Felicity began, "something happened and the whole world has changed, and you need to get to the bottom of it!" Kitty stared intently at the lady, spittle dripping off her fingers and onto her boobies. "I know that this will be difficult, but we need to work together. I'm a fragment of who you were, I can't interact with the world, but you can, as long as you have a mirror, I can communicate with you. We need to find out where these changes came from, and figure out if we can reverse it." Kitty continued to suckle on her fingers, spittle covering her chin and hand. Felicity shuddered a bit at the sight "I don think I can handle being wha you've become, so let's try to fix the universe. Are you with me?" Felicity reached her hand out against the mirror, hoping for a hand-to-hand moment in leu of a handshake.

Kitty looked intently at Felicity, and slowly took her other hand and reached for the mirror where Felicity's hand was and once her hand was over Felicity's she yelled out "Pretty!"

Felicity facepalmed. "I've been explaining things in words you don't understand, haven't I?" The look of intense concentration Kitty had in lying on her back, exposing herself to the world, trying to suck on her toes said it all to Felicity. "Alright, I'm gonna have to try smaller words. Kitty?"

Kitty looked up at Felicity "Yeth?"

"That funny feeling? I feel it too."

Kitty was immediately focused on this. "You do?!"

Felicity nodded. "And we need to be friends and find it."

Kitty nodded, but looked down and remembered that she needed a new diapey. "I gotta get a diapey." She said as she made to crawl downstairs to mommy.

Felicity yelled out desperately "Remember! Look for the funny feeling!" But as Kitty crawled away down the hall, her bare little bum wiggling in the open air, Felicity plopped down on the ground in the mirror before puttering her face in her hands "I'm doomed." And she faded from the mirror until Kitty wandered in front of another mirror.

======

"Mommy!" Kitty called as she toddled back into the living room, "I need a diapey!"

Mommy nodded and cleaned and changed Kitty before changing Max, and then herself. Mommy turned on the TV, putting it on teletubbies, she went off to use get rid of the soiled diaper in her bedroom.

Kitty felt a little weird again. She looked over at Max, her little brother (by 2 years, making him 18) giggling while shaking a set of toy keys around. Watching him made her feel funny, but not like this morning had, it must be her room then! But it was almost her dinner Time! Max had his earlier, which meant she'd have mommies boobies all to herself! She smiled and clapped at the thought.

But what about the lady she saw in mommies room? She said she had to look for the funny feeling, so she should do something around Max. "Max?" She asked, scooting closer to him, he stopped before looking at his sister. "You feel funny today?" He stared at her intently, before flopping forward, trying to get nummies out of her boobies! "Max!" Kitty cried as she pushed him off. He only giggled and kept singing "boobies, boobies!" Before returning to his plastic car keys.

Kitty scooted back away from him, wiping off her booby with her hand and drying it off on her blankie. What could the thing making her feel funny be?

"Kitty," she heard mommy call her name, and she looked over at mommy toddling down the hall back into the living room "ready for dinner?" She said as she sat down.

"Yeth!" Kitty cried as she crawled forward to get her dinner nummies. As she began to suckle, she began to think, what in her room was different? After Nummies and nap time, and then playtime, she'd look around before going to beddy-bye. But where should she start? She could start--- her train of thought was interrupted as mommy had her switch boobies. What was she thinking of?

She shrugged, she'd remember it if it was important, right now, she just wanted to enjoy her mommies boobies.
15211111121.title: Felicity explains the reality change to Kitty

choices: Kitty crawls to the oak tree and senses the stone
Kitty forgets and instead plays with her toys
152111111211.content:
The aimless wandering by Kitty's infantile mind lead to herself in the back garden. A decent plot of land with a stone slab path circling a pile of tall bushes and a large oak tree -- an oak tree poorly littered with several marks of crayon and scattered toys surrounding it. Her eyes scanned the greenery and suddenly felt the unusual feeling return to the recesses of her mind, forcing her to rub her forehead and eject her fingers from her mouth. A nearby paddling pool soon took her focus off the sudden headache, which immediately stopped as she peered over the edge and saw her reflection -- once again wearing the weird clothes.

"You felt it? Didn't you--"

"Hello again!" The conversation was immediately cut short by Kitty's greeting. Felicity sighed, and ran her fingers through her long hair before making eye-contact with Kitty once more.

"Hello," Felicity replied, forcing a smile and a gentle wave. "Did you feel the funny feeling?"

Kitty nodded, "Uh-huh. My head feels funny. I don't like it."

"Don't worry. We can fix it together." Felicity's smile returned. "You need to find a special stone. It's a very pretty, shiny stone."

She eventually lost interest in listening and instead focused on her reflection, Kitty gently dipped her hands into the cool water and attempted to grab her reflection -- motioning her to come to the other side. Her efforts were in vain as her hands swished the shallow waters around and left soft ripples throughout the pool. Her wet hands soon entered her mouth where she began suckling the water droplets off her fingers and gave a hum of dissatisfaction, unable to understand why her reflection hadn't come through.

"--If you look hard enough. It'll start glowing when you get close enough so grab it and then give it back to me by dropping it on the pool. I'll catch it on the other side. Did you understand all of that?"

"Uh-huh." Kitty nodded. She gave a final wave at her reflection and crawled away from the pool.
152111111211.title: Playtime outside where she feels funny again

1521111112111.content:
As Kitty toddled across the yard, looking for where the funny feeling was strongest, she was distracted by some laughing. Looking over she saw mommy and Max playing on the see-saw, and she stood there watching them, laughing along as mommies boobies bounced up and down. What was she doing again? Oh yes, looking for the pretty rock! She stuck her hand back in her mouth, for some reason it felt weird to not be sucking on something, and continued to toddle around, her boobies swinging freely in the sun.

Eventually, she found her way to the base of the crayon and paint splattered oak tree, plopped down on her diapered bum, and began to look for the pretty rock for the lady in the pool. Eventually she found a glowy green rock, but holding it made her feel like she was having vertigo, and didn't like it, so she threw it away, hearing the distant *thunk* as it landed under the bushes behind the old oak tree. But her friend said she needed a pretty rock! Sucking on her fingers, ignoring the spittle that now coated her hand and dripped onto her boobies, she continued to look for a pretty rock for her new friend. She found a red one, a black one, a grey one, but none of those were pretty. She crawled awkwardly around to the other side of the tree, trying to keep her left hand in her mouth, and plopped down once she got to the other side of the tree.

There! A pretty rock! She grabbed the rock and held it up looking at it, it was pretty! A nice sparkly white rock for her friend in the pool! She toddled awkwardly over to the paddle pool and looked in, smiling around her hand at Felicity who had a huge smile on her face as Kitty held the rock ove the pool.

"That's right!" Felicity encouraged her infantile counterpart "Just drop it too me!" Kitty let go of the rock and it plopped into the water, and sank right to the bottom of the pool. Felicity began to get both angry and depressed, angry that the stupid toddler that had she had become had dropped in the wrong rock, and depressed because she felt like she was going to eventually become one with the toddler personality of Kitty, and be a diaper-using baby forever.

"Bye-bye!" Kitty called as she toddled back into the house with mommy and Max. The sun was going down by now, it was bedtime. Felicity called desperately for Kitty to come back, but Kitty either didn't hear her, or her simple mind was too focused on going back inside to take notice of the pleas to look for the right rock.

====

Mommy helped Kitty get into her PJ's and Kitty's helped mommy get into her PJ's before Kitty sat expectantly for her goodnight kiss and hug from mommy. Mommy was busy tucking Max in, so Kitty had a bit of free time yet before she drifted off to dreamland.

Kitty remembered something! There was something in her room that made her feel funny! She immediately began to dig though her piles of stuffed animals and frilly skirts. She could feel like she was getting closer, she just had to keep looking! Eventually she found her princess mirror and held it in her hand, this kinda made her feel funny, was this what was wrong?

"No it's not you imbecile!" Felicity cried as she materialized in the mirror. "Don't you realize how much the world has changed!?" Felicity pointed at Kitty while using an accusatory tone "Your simple mind doesn't even realize what we lost! I was a college senior! I had my whole future set! Now I'm stuck in the broken mind of an adult baby who uses diapers and gets breastfed regularly!"

Kitty stared at the angry little lady in the mirror. "You angry. Are you tired?"

Felicity yelled back "No! I'm---". Kitty cut her off again.

"Cause when I don't get naps, I gets cranky, just ask mommy!" She toddled over to her bed as she heard mommies footsteps toddling down the hall toward her room. "Goodnight!" She called as she tossed the mirror back into her stuffed animal pile.

Mommy came in, check Kitty's diaper before tucking her in, tucked her under the covers all snugly, and kissed her goodnight on her forehead. Kitty smiled contently as she awaited the next day with her mirror-friend and her daycare friends.
1521111112111.title: Kitty crawls to the oak tree and senses the stone

choices: Kitty goes to daycare and begins looking for the stones
Kitty goes to daycare, her friends brought their own mirrors with reflections
15211111121111.content:
The following morning was the standard routine that Kitty had come to expect. Wake, breakfast and getting ready for daycare. A free hour of playtime in her bedroom was left, and she didn't want to waste a moment with her toys. She toddled back into her bedroom with a uncoordinated gait over to her large assortment of toys, dolls and teddy bears only to discover a familiar 'strange' feeling returning to the recesses of her infantile mind. Her legs weakened to the point where she practically lowered herself down to the floor, plopping her padded rear on the floor, and proceeded to relieve herself the only way she knew. Her thumb entered her mouth, which alleviated the sudden numbness to a degree, but it wasn't clearing her foggy thoughts completely.

Kitty's attention eventually turned to her pile of toys. The idea to play with her toys to take the unusual feeling off her mind seemed pleasant, and another chance to speak to the mirror-lady seemed to be pretty important considering her tone of voice last night. She took several toys, including the princess mirror from the pile and messily set them in a poor circle. Kitty took the mirror and slowly opened it, smiling at her reflection.

"I'm still angry."

Kitty felt her smile drop, "Whuh? I dropped the rock in the pool."

Felicity's expression seemed to drop, nearing on being at the verge of tears more than anything, "Wrong rock, Kitty. If you don't give me the correct stone, then I won't be able to change reality back to the way it was. I won't be able to be myself, and you and everyone else will be stuck for the rest of your life thinking your all overgrown babies."

While Kitty listened, she took one of her teddy bears by the arm and pressed the stuffed animal between her legs and embraced it with a soft, warm hug. She couldn't help but feel a sting of sadness just by looking at her now-crying reflection. "Do you need num-nums? That makes me feel better."

"Ew," Felicity recoiled, "I don't want THAT. I just want--" She paused, and wiped a few tears away.

"--You're upset! I don't like it when people cry." Kitty responded, she drew the mirror closer and looked further inward through the reflection. Felicity's bedroom seemed to be completely different, instead favouring more muted colours with no toys as far as the eye can see. A bed without protection rails could be seen, but that made it more-so baffling that her reflection could sleep without the protection of a crib.

"I'm upset because we haven't got one of the stones, Kitty!" Felicity replied, she glanced behind herself before looking back at Kitty. "You're going to... ugh, daycare, right?"

"Yuh-huh." Kitty nodded.

"Then can I come to daycare with you? One of the pretty stones I want is at the daycare, and I know where it is."

This sounded like a brilliant idea. A chance to take a new friend to the daycare and play together sounded like fun. For Felicity, the ability to guide Kitty towards one of the stones was probably the best possible choice.

"Sure!" Kitty squealed in sheer excitement. She released her hold on the teddy bear and happily bounced on her bottom, letting her diaper loudly crinkle. "We can play together! This'll be a lot of fun!"

"Fun...?" Felicity blinked, her cheeks reddened. "We can play together after we get the special stones."

Kitty wasn't listening, she leaned over to her pile of toys and rummaged out a small childish backpack -- a backpack that resembled a college student bag albeit with babyish colours splattered all over. A few toys were quickly stuffed into the backpack, and the mirror soon followed afterwards.
15211111121111.title: The next morning....

choices: Felicity begins to act more childishly
Mikey and Kitty decide to play together
152111111211111.content:
Once at daycare, Kitty put her backpack in her cubby and took her teddy bear and her fairy mirror out and sat down on the far side of the classroom. Sucking on her left hand and her teddy bear nestled in the crook of her elbow, she opened up the fairy mirror to see Felicity looking nervously around the room.

"Kitty," Felicity talked slow and as simply as possible to avoid another mess up "look for a glowy rock, it will make you feel funny, but if you give it to me, you will stop feeling funny, and I will be very happy."

Kitty smiled around her left hand and nodded, and began to wander around following the funny feeling like she did yesterday. Felicity meanwhile was looking behind Kitty, staring horrified at her former classmates and professor who were reduced to diaper-using toddlers. Even her boyfriend Mike (now Mikey) wasn't spared, he was on his knees drawing awkwardly, the crayon held in an awkward position in his fist.

She was distracted by a look on Kitty's face, her eyes were crossed, and her tongue was sticking out of her mouth, Felicity never saw Kitty make this face before. "Kitty, what are you--" a muffled fart came up from Kitty's diaper, and Felicity briefly recoiled in horror watching her counterpart mess herself like that.

Kitty, oblivious to Felicity's discomfort, simply replied "I maked poopie!" While toddling over to Ms. Stacy for a diaper change. Ms. Stacy simply gestured to the changing table, and began to change Kitty while she looked around the classroom, looking for the glowy rock for her mirror-friend.

Felicity saw it, on the corner of Ms. Stacy's desk, a glowing pink rock, one of four she needed. As Kitty began to toddle away, Felicity pointed out "Look on Ms. Stacy's desk! There's the rock!" Kitty looked over and saw the pink glowy rock, but it was on the teachers desk...she'd have to be sneaky.

She pulled her drool-covered hand out of her mouth and began to crawl to the desk, holding on tight to her mirror and her teddy bear. Eventually she got to the desk, and quickly stood up, grabbed the rock, and dropped it on the mirror, where it vanished. Felicity smiled. "Good girl!" She beamed, "Only three more to go!"

Kitty nodded happily, noticing that the rock had made her mirror friend much happier, she was even dressed similar! Felicity' hair was up in pigtails, and she was wearing a Hello Kitty shirt and a princess diaper which, if Kitty could read, said 'messes happen'.

Unbeknownst to Felicity, the stones were part of the changes done to the universe, but they were removing her awareness of them, normalizing her back into complacency in Kitty's head.

=======

Because of how nice the weather was, the class was having a field day, where they would be allowed to have class outside all day. Today, they were going to have class in the big field next to the daycare, securely fenced in so that no wayward students could get away.
152111111211111.title: Kitty goes to daycare and begins looking for th...

choices: Gwen and Lilly ask Kitty and Mikey to play
Kitty and Mikey begin to feel weird
1521111112111112.content:
The feeling had disappeared -- and not a single sign of a headache for a mild fog clouding her mind in the slightest, which came as the more preferable option as the field trip in the neighbouring field was about to begin. The first of four stones had been returned to Felicity, and she couldn't be anymore grateful for Kitty's help in ways she couldn't explain. Her clothes had changed, but as was par for the course, knowing that the altered reality would begin to take shape and finalise itself. The opportunity to obtain the remaining stones was ahead -- which had to unfortunately wait as Kitty prematurely dumped the mirror back inside her backpack and toddled back over to the rest of her former regressed classmates.

"Ugh," Felicity sighed, "I can't believe the stone did this." Her positive attitude from earlier had changed, now that the stone had suddenly transformed her clothing into something that Kitty would most likely wear. She cringed as the thick diaper hugging her waist needlessly crinkled, but forced herself to concentrate as the energies of the stone began to transmit into her body.

"I should've never tampered with these magical stones." She scolded herself, "You let your mind slip for just a microsecond and suddenly you're thinking about everyone being big babies."

The stone's pink energy eventually faded, and left nothing but a colourless husk of a shell to rest in Felicity's palm. She scanned her bedroom, feeling the start of the immense power building within, and willed a book of her own choosing into existence. "If Kitty's going to be a while, might as well pass the time catching up on college." Felicity cringed at the prospect of having to wear a diaper -- nonetheless having to deal with Kitty's infantile behaviour in addition to that, couldn't help but shrug off the negative feelings inside. "Things'll work out, Felicity. Things'll work out. I'll just separate the realities and let them co-exist, no biggie. A twenty-year old can split realities like nothing on a weekend, no sweat."

---

A series of picnic blankets were evenly spread across the field with an assortment of baby bottles and sippy cups haphazardly scattered around for the overgrown infants. Few sat down, while many instead opted to ignore the refreshments and instead focus on their toys and their thumbs. For the few, Kitty, Mikey, Gwen and Lilly instead opted for shade underneath a large oak tree. Gwen and Lilly amused themselves, dragging their toys and empty bottles around for pure entertainment while the cool summer breeze pressed against their near-naked bodies, save for the diapers.

Kitty and Mikey remained silent, for Kitty had finished her own bottle of milk and occasionally shifted her view over to Mikey's naked lean frame. She broke her silence, and rested her head against Mikey's upper thigh and felt a smile crawl across her lips as she gazed up. "It's warm."

"Yuh-huh." Mikey replied, seemingly busy with a suckling session of his own fingers. "I still feel warm, too."

A giggle from Kitty prompted her to take Mikey's free hand and lock her finger in-between her own. While Mikey didn't respond to Kitty's squeezing gesture, Kitty took charge and pulled her friend's hand into a soft cuddle against her face. "Do you feel funny sometimes, Mikey?"

"Yuh-huh." Mikey lowered his head, "I feel funny sometimes, but then I don't. My Mommy gives me nummies and I feel lots better, but sometimes I feel worse."

"I feel like that too." Kitty hummed, "I go poopie and then I feel lots better."

Mikey smiled, "Just gassy."

"Nuh-uh." Kitty felt defensive, her head raised off of Mikey's legs a little and she childishly huffed. "I'm not gassy. I have lots of good nummies with my Mommy."

"Do not!" Mikey replied, his fingers escaped his mouth and a string of drool fell to his chest. "You're the stinkiest baby in daycare." He chuckled.

The overgrown toddlers soon feel silent. While Kitty pouted, Mikey had started to grin and prompt a few chuckles before running his wet hand through Kitty's hair. "You're not the stinkiest baby. Ms. Stacy is the biggest, stinkiest baby in daycare."
1521111112111112.title: Mikey and Kitty decide to play together

choices: Felicity begins to act more childishly around Kitty
15211111121111121.content:
Lilly clumsily toddled over to Kitty and Mikey, dropping to all fours to cover the last few feet before glomming over the both of them. "C'mon!" She began pulling on their arms, trying to get them up and over to where Lilly and Gwen were playing. "Play wit us!" She wined, giving up on trying to move the two and settled for puppy dog eyes.

Kitty giggled at Mikey's expense, he looked extremely mad that Lilly had interrupted them. "Lets go play!" Kitty said as she stood up and began to toddle out toward Gwen. Mikey reluctantly followed behind.

Gwen saw her friends coming over and cheered, bouncing up and down in her sitting position causing her boobies to jiggle freely. Lilly joined her on the ground, grabbing a pony toy and playing with the toys scattered around Gwen. Kitty toddler over to the haphazard selection of toys that daycare brought out and grabbed a dolly to play with while Mikey grabbed two cool looking trucks and followed her.

The four friends played a game with neither rules, nor coherency, simply enjoying themselves in their extended childhood. Mikey though, began to have a problem, as all toddlers are want to do, they go through phases, and poor Mikey had begun to go through his "nakie phase." His diaper began to feel itchy and uncomfortable, and he solved the problem in the most efficient way possible, he stripped it off, exposing his hairless pee-pee to the open air.

Kitty and her friends simply giggled, going nakie was cute, and Kitty and Lilly were regularly nakie anyway. Mikey, for his part, simple ignored their giggles and continued to play with his trucks in his birthday suit, his well-tanned bum pointed up for all to see. This would've been a sight if almost a third of the daycare class wasn't in a similar state of undress, including Ms. Stacy, who was busy laying naked entranced by the clouds as she sucked on her toes.

Kitty and Lilly, deciding to not let Mikey be the only nakie one in their group, ripped off their diapers too, enjoying the breeze and freedom that their Nakie phases demanded. Gwen, the slightly more modest one, opted to keep her diaper on, but like all the girls of this altered universe, had no qualms about going topless.

Lilly was playing with a horsey toy when's she heard a trickling sound, looking around, she saw Kitty absentmindedly sucking on her fingers as she squared down in the grass and was going pee-pee out in the open. "Kitty!" Lilly called out, "You peeing!"

Kitty, who seemed to have been in her own world up until Lilly called her, looked down and giggled, normally she'd go to get a diaper, but the teacher and assistant teacher were both nakie at the moment, as long as she didn't go poopie, she could still stay nakie.

Eventually, the naptime bell rang, and the class began to congregate together and either get changed, or re-diapered before heading inside for naps.
15211111121111121.title: Gwen and Lilly ask Kitty and Mikey to play

choices: Kitty and family at home again
152111111211111211.content:
Kitty woke up feeling extremely refreshed from her nap, most of her class was still asleep, Ms Stacy and Ms. Polly were playing patty cake over by their desk, and the few other classmates who were awake were starting their own forms of entertainment. Kitty toddled over to her cubby and pulled out her pink backpack and pulled out her various stuffed animals and her fairy mirror. She took them over to a corner of the classroom and setup a little tea party for her and her mirror-friend to play.

When kitty set up everything, she opened the mirror and saw Felicity, still wearing the infantile clothing, appear. "Hi Kitty," Felicity said trying to look friendly despite her frustration with her situation. "What'd you need?"

Kitty motioned to her stuffed animals at the oversized toddler table "We's havin a tea party!"

Felicity sighed heavily, deciding that being able to fix this whole mess was worth entertaining her infantile counterpart. "Alright then!" She said sounding as enthusiastic as possible "How do we start?" Kitty bounced up and down on her diapered bottom clapping her hands in excitement as she explained what to do when playing tea party, even though Felicity couldn't really interact with the toy cups.

=======

Felicity, despite the limitations of being stuck in a mirror, found herself enjoying the tea party, Kitty was doing her best to make sure that she wasn't excluded as she made up conversations with the various stuffed toys she brought to daycare. In fact, she found herself wishing more and more that she could join Kitty in her world, and play alongside her and her friends.

Wait, what? Where'd that come from? Sure Kitty was nice, but her attention span was diminutive, and she was oblivious to her unnatural state as an overgrown toddler. And Felicity wanted to fix this whole sitiuation before it became permanent, no matter how cute her clothes were and how comfy her diapey was ---there it was again! Something was messing with her mind! And she needed to figure out what it was!

=======

Kitty saw Felicity do a big (to anyone else, obviously fake) yawn in her mirror, "You tired?" Kitty said as she leaned in to get a closer look.

Felicity nodded, keeping up the ruse "Yeah, I missed my nap, I'm going to sleep for a bit, ok?"

Kitty nodded, and closed the mirror and put everything back in her backpack. She noticed that Felicity was a lot nicer now that she got her rock, maybe if she got all of them, she'd stop acting all weird and be normal like Kitty and her friends! Maybe if---she saw something shiny roll past her and took a look, it was just a bouncy ball that one of her playmates was chasing after.

Kitty shrugged, having forgotten what she was doing earlier and decided to suckle on her fingers, the desire to suck on something was strong, and she decided to go play dress up while she waited for mommy to come pick her up! Ms. Polly said it was the 'weekend' coming up, and they'd have the next two days without daycare! That meant three meals of nummies a day from Mommy!

She smiled around her hand as she toddled over to the dress up station and began to dig through everything when she noticed a big mirror here too! Toddling in front of it, there was the nakie lady from mommies room before she met Felicity! "Hello again!" She said around her fingers as she waved with her other hand, watching as the nakielady did the same, her boobies swinging back and forth.
