Kitty giggled and made a funny face, and the nakie lady did too! She watched as the lady popped down the same time she did! And she did everything that Kitty did! She was good at this game!

But there was something off again, she couldn't tell what it was, the feeling wasn't like with the rock she gave Felicity, it was more like she forgot to do something and couldn't place it. And maybe the nakie lady knew what it was? She tried asking her, but the lady only moved her mouth around whenever Kitty tried to talk, maybe she couldn't talk!

Kitty awkwardly stood up and looked the a kid lady over, her hair was up in pigtails like Kitty's was, her boobies were out, and she was wearing a diaper with words on the front, and as she turned around to look at all sides of the nakie lady, she saw words on the back too! (If kitty could've read the words on her diaper, the front reads 'pee pot' while the back read 'poopies here')

Something was off about this lady and Kitty was going to find out what it was! But then Kitty felt the cal, of nature and bent forward and began to push, and felt so much better now that she went poopie. Looking back at the Nakie lady, she saw that she went poopie too!

Kitty giggled and so did the lady, Kitty waved bye-bye as she walked over to Ms. Polly for a diaper change.
152111111211111211.title: More playtime after nap

1521111112111112111.content:
Once Kitty got home, she crawled upstairs to put her backpack and stuffed animals away while mommy fed and changed Max downstairs. As she was putting the toys back, her mirror fell on the ground and she saw Felicity appear in the mirror.

"Hello!" Kitty said as she crawled over to the mirror, her boobies swinging pendulously under her as she smiled widely at her counterpart.

Felicity smiled a little and waved back "Hi Kitty," she began to straighten one of her pigtails as she began talking "I'm so glad you found the pretty rock today, do you think you can find the one in your back yard?" She looked so hopeful and asked very simply and nicely, Kitty nodded enthusiastically before grabbing the mirror and crawling back downstairs to head into the backyard as Max got nummies from mommy in the living room.

Kitty focused on her singular task, finding the glowy green rock she found the other day. As she toddled around in an uncoordinated toddle, she eventually began to feel funny again by the bushes. Laying on the grass in nothing but her diaper, she could see the glowy rock in the middle of the bushes. She didn't want to go under there, it was scary, but her friend needed that rock! So she crawled as fast as she could so that she wouldn't be in there long! Once she grabbed it, she crawled out even faster, feeling extremely happy now that she'd gotten her friends rock.

Once she dropped it on the mirror, Felicity smiled at Kitty "Thanks Kitty! I have to do something, I'll be back later!" And her image faded from the mirror.

Kitty, feeling quite proud of herself, toddled inside to watch cartoons and play with her toys.

======

Felicity felt like she could relax even more now that she had two of four rocks back. Her clothing problem had been solved, her wardrobe had returned to its normal 'diaper only' state, much like Kitty and the rest of the world wore, she felt so much better with her boobies out. And her diaper had such a pretty design on the front! (Unknown to her, it wasn't a design, it was simply "poopie princess" in pink words on the front of her diaper, she'd lost her ability to read anymore). And her room was finally back to its normal pastel pinks with her bed guards back on so she didn't roll off, and all her stuffed toys were back too! Soon everything would be the ways things were supposed to be.

=======

Kitty was enjoying playing with her toys when she saw mommy finish feeding Max his nummies and as Max crawled away after being burped, mommy laid herself down and began to change her diaper, looked like mommy went poopie while feeding Max!

Kitty giggled a bit as she pictured that happening. But once mommy was done, she motioned for Kitty to come over and get her nummies. Kitty's crawled over and began to suckle from mommies boobies, enjoying her dinner. She was so happy whenever she got mommies boobies all to herself, she didn't like sharing with Max. Did Felicity ever get nummies? Or did she have to eat nasty solid food all the time?

Maybe she could ask Felicity if she could come out of the mirror, so that mommy could give Felicity nummies after Kitty was done? That sounded like a good plan.

Kitty looked up at mommy, she looked so happy, sucking on her fingers, looking oblivious to her grown daughter breastfeeding from her boobies. Kitty giggled around mommies booby, mommy was drooling, and that was always funny to see. Kitty felt a little funny in her belly, but a quick push in between suckles took care of that feeling, emptying all that poopie into her diaper as she enjoyed mommies boobies.
1521111112111112111.title: Kitty and family at home again

15211111121111121112.content:
After getting nummies from mommy for dinner, Kitty and her family went outside for playtime in the sun before baths and beddy-bye. Mommy must've been in her nakie phase, because she took off her diaper and let Max and Kitty play nakie outside too!

Max played with his baby toys while mommy and Kitty played with their big-girl toddler toys in the plastic playhouse. Kitty was enjoying playing with mommy, they both liked to play with ponies and fairies and princesses, not like boys who only liked trucks and mud and stuff.

Mommy eventually got tired of playing house and wanted to play tag, and Kitty chased mommy through the front yard, baring their naked bodies out for all to see, as they ran back around the house into the backyard, their bare bums jiggling and boobies bouncing. But they eventually got tired of this, and as the sun went down, mommy took all of them inside and upstairs to take a bath.

Kitty looked at the bath tub, in the world before the regression, this would've been a massive bathtub, but here, it was a standard family bathtub, able to fit all threee of them in there comfortably at the same time.

Bath time was fun! Mommy put bubbles in it, and they made bubble hats and saw who could make the biggest splashes with their boobies (mommy won). And mommy dried them all off, diapered them, and put them all in their beds, Max in his crib, and Kitty on her bed with bedguards.

As Kitty sucked on her thumb, she dreamed of all the fun that she'd have (starting tomorrow) over the weekend.
15211111121111121112.title: Family playtime outside

152111111211111211121.content:
When Kitty woke up, she yawned and scooted her way out of bed, taking a few minutes to take off her onesie PJs, she toddled out of her room and crawled downstairs, her full diaper sagging behind her as she went. Once downstairs, she saw mommy changing Max's diaper, and crawled over and laid down next to him, waiting for mommy to change her diaper too.

Kitty began to look around the living room, waiting for her diaper change, she began to suckle on her fingers, and became entranced by the ceiling fan. She was so focused on the fan, she didn't notice mommy changing her diaper, only realizing that mommy was done when she saw mommy toddle off to give Max his nummies for breakfast.

Sitting up, she decided to play a bit as she waited for her nummies. Toddling unsteadily over to the toy chest in the corner as she suckled on her fingers, she dig through the toys with her free hand, before deciding that none of the toys were what she wanted to play with. But as Shen plopped down in frustration, she noticed movement below her arm. Looking down, she saw her boobies jiggling after her drop onto her diapered bum. Boobies were fun to play with!

Giggling around her hand, she twisted and bounced her torso, watching as her boobies shook and bounced around.

"Kitty," mommy called from across the room, "nummies!" Max was crawling away now to play with his baby toys.

Excited at the prospect of breakfast, Kitty crawled over to mommy and began to suckle at mommies booby. As she suckled her breakfast, she was wondering what mommy had planned for the day, would they go out? Would they stay at home? Or would she let her see mommies office where she worked?

As mommy switched boobies, Kitty decided to ask mommy what they'd do today after she was done with breakfast.

What did they do?
152111111211111211121.title: Saturday morning

choices: Kitty falls asleep until they arrive
Kitty gets bored and checks the mirror for Felciity
1521111112111112111212.content:
"We're going downtown. We've been invited to a play date."

The announcement sent shivers of excitement down Kitty's spine. Her last trip to downtown had been only two weeks -- a seriously long amount of time for her regressed mind to comprehend -- and she dawdled no further than climbing up the stairs with Mommy idly crawling behind ready to wear something pretty for downtown. The downtown district was always a fancy place, leaving mobs of people, packed shoulder-to-shoulder minding their own business with large premium stores that the shopping mall could only dream of.

A few minutes after the announcement, and Kitty had already picked out an assortment of toys, trinkets and clothes to wear for such a fabulous occasion. She happily toddled to the family car with her backpack in hand -- favouring to waddle over to her seat as her pink t-shirt -- courtesy of being picked out by mommy, had covered her chest and the top-half of her diaper. She eventually lost focus on the rest of the world, save for her fingers, which she happily shoved back into her mouth as the car began to move.

"Oh, Kitty." Her mommy began, "We're going to a play zone for a few hours. We've been invited by Gwen's mommy so the both of you get to play."

"That's good." Kitty hadn't the thought or sense of concentration to listen, only mindlessly mumble along.

"Remember," She intoned, "No nakie. Babies who want to go nakie aren't allowed in the ball pits."
1521111112111112111212.title: Go downtown

15211111121111121112121.content:
Without Max playing in the car (mommy was having him watched by Ms. Kate next door) Kitty found herself drifting off to sleep, her hand halfway out of her mouth, drooling all over her hand and shirt. Mommy woke her up when they got to the play zone, helping her out of the car.

"Oh Kitty, you drooled on your shirt." Mommy said as Kitty scooted out of the car. "Arms up."

Kitty complied, and mommy took the drool-sodden pink shirt off, once again back down to just her diaper for her outfit, just like mommy. As the two toddled their way up to the play zone, Kitty saw a nakie boy around her age being chased by a little girl about half her age wearing a diaper and princess shirt holding a diaper in her hands.

"Stop Tommy!" The girl yelled as she chased him "Dey won't let you in nakie!" The two disappeared around the corner of the play zone.

Kitty giggled at the scene, she like being nakie, but she couldn't go nakie in the play zone, so she'd have to follow the rules and be a good big girl. Once she was inside, she looked in awe at everything in the play zone, there were massive ball pits, huge play places (like the kiddy places at McDonald's before the change), art stations, everything that a toddler could want for entertainment was here.

"I wanna play!" Kitty screamed as she looked around, trying do decide what to do first.

Mommy held onto her hand tight, "Not until we see Gwen and her mommy, this is a play date." Mommy pointed with her other hand holding the diaper bag "There they are!"

Looking over, Kitty saw Gwen getting nummies from her mommy and toddled as fast as she could over to them, wanting to get to playing as soon as possible. Once Kitty and mommy got to the little table that Gwen and Ms. Rose (Gwen's mommy) were at, gwen waved at Kitty as she continued to suckle on her mommies booby.

"Hi Gwen!" Kitty said, getting down on all four and crawling over to her bestest friend in the world, ignoring her own naked boobies swinging pendulously beneath her, or the fact that her friend was being breastfed despite being twenty years old. "How much longer?" Kitty asked, referring to Gwen getting nummies from Ms. Rose, "I wanna play!" Kitty said again.

"Just a bit dear." Ms. Rose said as she leaned forward and made a poopie in her diaper. Gwen soon finished getting her nummies, and took off with Kitty to enjoy the play zone. What did they'd do first?
15211111121111121112121.title: Kitty falls asleep until they arrive

choices: Felicity appears, but she looks a lot like Kitty now...
152111111211111211121212.content:
Kitty and Gwen toddled off toward the play places, getting on their hands and knees as they crawled through the tunnels. Kitty and Gwen's giggles echoed through the tunnels as they watched their boobies swing pendulously under them as they crawled through the tunnels. Kitty continued to go up as high as she could in the play place, until she was up at the top of the play place, next to the big slide into the ball pit. Looking out across the play place, she saw everyone in there, she saw mommy and Ms. Rose (Gwens mommy) finger painting, although it looked like they were painting each other rather than the papers in front of them, as mommy and Ms. Rose had hand prints on each other's boobies.

Kitty decided to go down the slide, and giggled as she flew down, and flopped into the ball pit, sending little plastic balls everywhere. She toddled out awkwardly, trying to not fall back in the balls, but once out, she found that her legs felt funny, and that walking was a lot harder than it was earlier, but her infantile mind simply didn't realize it. Since toddling/walking wasn't working, she decided to crawl back to the play place, before she passed by a big mirror in the part of the play place that served as a castle.

Looking at it, she saw the diaper lady from daycare! She was nakie except for her diaper, which was sagging a bit, obviously used. Kitty waved at the diaper lady, "Hi!"

The lady waved back! And Kitty decided to see if the lady would play the mimic game again.
152111111211111211121212.title: The massive play places

1521111112111112111212122.content:
Before Kitty could begin playing with the diaper lady, the reflection changed, now the lady's was replaced with a lady that looked a bit like Kitty in a diaper sucking her thumb. "Hi Kitty!" The lady said around her thumb. "Another pretty wock is here!"

Kitty smiled back at Felicity, its been a while since she saw her mirror friend, and now she was dressed properly; wearing a diaper. "Where's the rock?" Kitty asked while looking around her.

Felicity shrugged, and got a bit distracted by her boobies jiggling before remembering why she was here. "Just follow the funny feeling," she said as she plopped down to poke a tiger her diaper, "Come back to me and give it to me. It'll be a pretty pink glowy rock."

Kitty nodded and began to go on her mission to find her friends pretty rock. She decided to start over by the ball pit since she was already there, flopping in the ball pit from her crawling position, she wormed her way down in the balls and began to search for the rock, or find the funny feeling which would lead her to the rock.

While she felt very cool and sneaky at the bottom of the ball pit, she hadn't gone all the way down, she was really moving along with her diapered rear sticking up in the air.

After looking around in the ball pit, she crawled out, her still soiled diaper sagging behinds her as she crawled out to look elsewhere for the rock. Where did she go next?
1521111112111112111212122.title: Felicity appears, but she looks a lot like Kitt...

choices: Kitty asks the group for some help to find the stone
Kitty decides she's capable on her own to find the stone
15211111121111121112121222.content:
Despite Kitty's limited mental capacity, she managed to coherently deduce that looking in the primary play-zone would be the most logical step in finding the pink reality stone. The mostly flat patches of space, accompanied with several hills and safe climbing frames made looking for the stone a breeze. She crawled past several random individuals, all bearing the same standard of infantile clothing, displaying thick diapers, onesies and pacifiers dangling from their necks on small pieces of string.

The first of many play-zones resembled a small forest with bright greens and many fake trees scattered across the room. A small pathway painted a slab-like grey went over a blue chunk which represented a lake. Fake logs, chairs and toys were evenly scattered about with many toddlers in the room taking what they could and playing with the environment.

A small handful of toddlers, by Kitty's guess, between the ages of twelve and sixteen were sitting together in a small circle. Some wore camping clothes, while the others preferred to sit in nothing but their used diapers as the toy lantern shone light amongst the group. Two boys, wearing some arrangement of camping gear sat beside three girls, all of which weren't wearing anything but their used diapers.

The forest was quite large, and it possible that looking for the stone would take a serious amount of time -- time which she didn't have. She stopped, rested her bottom against the floor and began to contemplate whether asking for help was such a good idea.
15211111121111121112121222.title: The massive play places

choices: Kitty remembers to look for the rock
152111111211111211121212222.content:
Kitty decided that she was a big girl, and that she could find the glowy rock all by herself. But sitting down made her realize that her diaper needed changing, so she went to the group she saw and asked if one of them could change her diaper.

All snug a dry in a new diaper, Kitty crawled off through the fake forest, as her legs still refused to cooperate for some reason, and began looking behind the plastic trees and under the toddler-safe fake logs scattered around. As she worked her way across the blue part of the floor that was made to look like a lake, Kitty saw something shiny off in the playhouse on the "island" in the middle of the painted lake.

Crawling as fast as she could, she peaked into the playhouse, and didn't see the glowy rock, maybe it was under the tiny table or chairs? She began to squeeze her way through the window, her simple mind forgetting about the open door across from her, and focused on getting through the window. After a bit of squirming, she managed to get her boobies through, and began to work hard to get her diapered behind through the window, but the diapers were thicker than she was used to, and she was having a bit of a tough time getting through.

She could take her diaper off, but then she'd be a bad girl, but she really needed to get into the playhouse, so she gave one last big push, and managed to *pop* through the window.

Getting back into her crawling position, she began to look around the playhouse, but realized that the shiny thing wasn't the glowy rock, just a toy with some lights on it. Looking around in the playhouse, her simple mind began to wander, her singular task of getting through the window having exhausted her infantalized brain, and completely forgot what's she was doing.

She decided to play house, and began to pretend to take care of the babydoll that was in the playhouse, and when Gwen came over to see what she was doing, the two decided to play house together. They decided that Gwen should be the mommy, while Kitty entertained herself bouncing on her diapered bottom in her thicker diaper.
152111111211111211121212222.title: Kitty decides she's capable on her own to f...

choices: Felicity interrupts Kitty's thoughts by appearing in the mirror
Kitty has a (brief) restoration of her mind
1521111112111112111212122222.content:
As Gwen busied herself in the playhouse playing the mommy in their game, Kitty amused herself by shaking her boobies around, enjoying watching them bounce and swing, when she saw a pink princess tiara with a big pink diamond on it. That's right! The glowy rock she was supposed to look for! Crawling out the door, Kitty made her way over to the playsets set up, with slides and swings and various toys built into the walls to entertain the simple minds it was built for.

She began to look around the swings, but didn't see anything, and crawled up the steps to the slide, and looked in every nook and cranny, but still didn't find anything. She eased herself on the slide and slid down, giggling as she slid off the slide and landing on her padded bottom.

Crawling over to another playset, she looked around the bottom of it before crawling up inside, but as she crawled past one wall with various doo-dads and noise makers attached, she bumped into one, sending off a loud musical sound, distracting her simple mind.

Entranced by the various bits and bobs on the wall, she amused herself playing with them for a time before deciding to go down the slide. She giggled again when she flew off the end and plopped on her diapered behind again. As she crawled around to go back down the slide, she passed by another mirror.

Interested, she stopped and looked, and saw the diaper lady again! Waving at the diaper lady, she giggled as the lady waved back at the same time. Sitting down in front of the mirror, she moved her arms really fast, clapped in a nonexistent pattern, all the while trying to get the diaper lady to mess up. But she was good!

But Kitty was smarterer! She had a plan! She would hide from the diaper lady, and catch her not copying her! Putting her hands over her eyes, Kitty giggled at how smart she was, hiding so cleverly from the diaper lady! After what felt like an eternity (but what was really only a few seconds), Kitty peaked through her fingers, and saw the diaper lady doing that too!

But as she pulled her hands away from her head, she felt another feeling, like when her legs stopped cooperating earlier, now she felt an irresistible urge to suck on her fingers, preferably her whole hand. Sticking her fingers in her mouth, she felt so much better, looking back at the diaper lady, she saw her doing the same thing too!

As she tried to find out why the big lady would be sucking on her fingers, she saw a shiny thing! Bending down to look, just under the mirror was the pretty glowy pink rock that her mirror friend wanted! Looking back at the mirror, the diaper lady had a glowy rock too!

But the more she looked at the diaper lady, the more something began to feel weird, that funny feeling from yesterday was returning, but it wasn't from the rock...
1521111112111112111212122222.title: Kitty remembers to look for the rock

choices: Give the glowy rock to her mirror friend
15211111121111121112121222222.content:
As she sucked on her hand, Kitty's mind suddenly *clicked* back into existence from the ether where it had almost faded away completely. Looking at the reflection, which she now recognized as simply herself and not some other lady, she slowly removed her hand, disgusted by the drool that covered her fingers, and she looked around, in a state of shock over what she was seeing. Grown people. In diapers. Acting like toddlers and babies.

Looking down at the glowing pink rock in her hand, she remembered the conversations, as one-sided as they were, with her reflection of who she was supposed to be. But she needed to get this rock to her, that much she remembered, and she knew that screaming and panicking would do no good. Best to set off and get this rock to her reflection as soon as possible.

She made to stand up, but her legs refused to cooperate, and she grabbed onto the wall of the playplace for support, and succeeded in getting herself to a standing position. More of a squatting position than standing, but she wasn't crawling everywhere now, and she made a huge exaggerated step forward, almost losing her balance. Slow and steady it was then. As she inched her way back to the playplace with the ball pit, she ignored the comfortable feeling of the diaper...No! That was her infantile mind trying to come back! She had to stay focused! If she went back under she won't come back again!

She didn't know where she got that information from, but she knew it was the truth, and she had to keep herself focused on the singular task of getting the rock to her reflection.

Suddenly, her tummy made a rumbling sound, catching her off guard. And suddenly her diaper was filled with all that poopie that she hadn't gotten out yet. It felt so good to go poopie, and yet, some small part of the remind knew that it was the last thing she needed.

The sudden weight in her diaper threw off her tenuous balance and she plopped back down on her bum, giggling at her boobies bouncing in front of her. Feeling the urge to suck on her fingers again, she stuck as many fingers as she could back in her mouth, feeling much better. As she sat there sucking on her fingers in her messy diaper, unaware that her adult mind and knowledge had faded away completely and forever, she saw the glowy rock in her hand.

That's right! Her friend needed this pretty rock! But the ball pit was right there, and it looked so colorful and fun to play in! Decisions, decisions....
15211111121111121112121222222.title: Kitty has a (brief) restoration of her mind

choices: "I feel funny. I feel like I've forgotten something."
"I feel fine. Those sharks are scary."
152111111211111211121212222222.content:
While Kitty's memory was foggy at best, she felt an excruciating headache come her way the longer the pink reality stone was wrapped tightly in her hands. For the time being -- Felicity could wait as Kitty needed to let off some steam and find a way to make her awful headache magically disappear. The stone was delicately hidden, as best as possible considering the circumstances and Kitty left the large mirror to enter the ball pit.

The ball pit seemed standard compared to ones Kitty had played in before, but the exception was the surprisingly pretty desert island theme that went along with many different play-zones. A patch of land, imitating a small island in a sea of purely blue balls sat in the middle of the pit with plush toys representing many different aspects of sea life were scattered around. To Kitty's surprise, Gwen had taken the island for herself and sat on the edge, her toes dipped into the blue balls with an idle kick sending them flying.

"Kitty!" Gwen chirped, waving in the distance. "Quick! The island is safe!"

In the midst of the plush toys were a few shark toys, while immobile, left a negative impression on the surrounding toddlers and babies alike as they passed through the ocean. While easily avoidable, the lifeless shark toys left many to cry at their scary appearance. For Kitty, she quickly toddled through the blue balls and climbed onto the patch of fake land -- with a helping hand from her friend.

"Yikes." Kitty gasped, "Those sharks are pretty scary."

"I know, right?" Gwen nodded in response. "They're everywhere. They're going to--" She broke her long gaze away from the sharks to see Kitty's pained expression. "What's wrong, Kitty? You look sad."
152111111211111211121212222222.title: Play in the ballpit

1521111112111112111212122222221.content:
"I feel like I forgot something." Kitty said as she idly kicked the blue balls around with her feet, tying to bury one of the stuffed sharks with them. "I feel a little funny too."

Gwen giggled as Kitty said this, "You went poopie silly!" She said pointing at Kitty's soiled diaper.

Looking down, Kitty realized that she had, at some point, went poopie and hadn't realized it until now. "Oh. I should find mommy or someone with a diaper bag then." She said as she looked around the island and the sea of plastic balls and stuffed animals around their tiny island. As she looked, she noticed that Gwen had gone poopie too. "Gwen, you're poopie too."

Gwen looked down and laughed, "Then I guess we better find our mommies then right?" Kitty nodded, and she saw mommy and Ms. Rose off in the distance, changing each other's diapers at a changing station not too far away.

"There's they are!" Kitty said pointing while hopping back in the ball pit. Gwen followed suit, and the girls worked their way through the balls slowly, avoiding the stuffed sharks as carefully as possible, the best path to avoid the plushy sharks took the girls ten minutes to get out of the ballpit. As they got out, Kitty noticed that's her legs were cooperating again, and she toddled unsteadily to her mommy, her diaper sagging noticeably behind her.

As mommy changed her diaper, and Gwens mommy changed hers, Kitty suckled on her fingers, trying to decide what she wanted to do next when her tummy rumbled.

"Sounds like somebody's hungry~!" Mommy sang as Shen finished changing Kitty's diaper. "Do you want nummies now, or play a bit longer? Kitty looked to Gwen, and saw her deciding the same thing, it WAS lunch time, but she still had to get the pink glowy rock to Felicity.....
1521111112111112111212122222221.title: "I feel funny. I feel like I've forgott...

choices: Silly Kitty takes the rock to Felicity
Another toddler took the rock before Kitty did
15211111121111121112121222222211.content:
"I want nummies!" Kitty said, getting on her back, reday to get mommy's boobies all to herself for lunch. As she suckled on mommy's booby, she thought about how much fun she'd been having, going on the playplace, seeing Felicity here, playing in the ballpits, and there was still so much to do! She looked over at Gwen to see what she was doing, and saw Gwen getting nummies from her mommy's boobies too! Smiling around the nipple in her mouth, she focused on filling her tummy and getting a good big lunch before returning to play.

As Kitty suckled, she remmebered that she left the rock by the island-themed playplace, peeking out from under a mirror if she recalled correctly. Once she was done getting nummies, she'd go and give Felicity the rock before going off to play again. But there was this empty feeling in her head still, like she'd forgotten to do something important, or was forgetting something.

But as she looked up at mommy, watching mommy suck on her thumb as Kitty enjoyed getting nummies from her boobies, Kitty couldn't figure out what she was forgetting. Maybe it was----Kitty's train of thought was interrupted as mommy had Kitty switch boobies.

What was she thinking about again? As her tummy filled with all the tasty breastmilk, that empty feeling in her mind seemed to fill up, and she found herself giggling and smiling around the nipple in her mouth. She suddenly felt so silly! All she wanted to do now is play and get nakie and use her diapeys!
15211111121111121112121222222211.title: Felicity can wait, get nummies!

choices: Follow the toddler and the mommy and find a way to steal the stone sneakily
Go to the toddler and the mommy and explain that the stone belongs to her
152111111211111211121212222222112.content:
A short toddle back to the mirror brought Kitty back to her senses. Once her stomach had settled after suckling on her mother's milk, the sudden motivation to return back to Felicity and deliver the pink stone as promised was currently the most important thing to her. Gwen, the play zones and oodles of toys would have to wait.

The mirror had remained the same -- as much as Kitty's infantile reflection allowed it to be -- she remained resolute in searching for the stone hidden underneath the mirror. Her hands brushed underneath the frame, but to no avail, found nothing but dust. Her eyes widened,

"Wh-Wha..." She felt a lump develop in her throat, "It's not here...?"

Kitty dropped to her knees, lowering herself further down than before to get a good look under to the mirror to see nothing but more dust underneath. "That's wrong! Where's the pretty stone?"

Alarm bells were ringing off. She couldn't deliver the stone to Felicity if she didn't have it, and even worse, potentially upset her friend knowing how important they were to her. Small tears formed in the corner of her eyes,

"No, no, no." Kitty felt her emotions get the best of her. "Where's the pretty stone? Where's the pretty stone? Felicity's going to be upset!"

Just then, an older woman and a toddler caught Kitty's immediate attention. She noticed a smaller toddler around the age of twelve being dragged towards a play-zone with her mommy. In the hands of the smaller regressed child was a bright pink stone that quickly set off further alarm bells. Kitty's mouth dropped, "The stone!" She loudly whispered.

"This is bad. I need to get it back, now."
152111111211111211121212222222112.title: Another toddler took the rock before Kitty did

choices: "...want you to help me find the rock." (Look for rock)
"...bet I can get your boobies to bounce higher than you can!" (Booby playtime)
1521111112111112111212122222221122.content:
Kitty toddled over quickly to the two toddlers, intent on letting the mommy know that the pretty rock that her daughter had belonged to Kitty, but her legs suddenly gave out again, forcing her to crawl the rest of the way. As she crawled, she found herself distracted by her boobies, swinging back and forth under her and she stayed there on all fours, swinging them back and forth for a bit, enjoying watching them swing.

Boobies were fun to play with!

Eventually remembering what she was doing, she crawled as fast as she could for the 12 year old toddler and her mommy. "Hey!" Kitty called out as she caught up with them, "That's my rock!" She pointed at at the pink glowy rock in the girls hand.

"Nuh-uh!" The girl said as she clutched the rock protectively, "Its my rock! I found it!"

"No it's mine!" Kitty said, getting into a sitting position to better face her enemy.

"Mine!" "Mine!" "Mine!" "Mine!" The argument went back and forth between the two toddlers until the girls mommy stepped in.

"My little girl found it," she said as she pushed Kitty over, "it's hers!"

While the fall on her back didn't hurt, it did surprise her, causing her to cry out in shock, before she rolled over and knocked the mommy over. The sudden fall caused the mommy to go poopie, which caused her to start sniffling.

"Now look what you did!" The little girl said, hugging her mommy as she sat in her poopie diaper. "C'mon mommy, let's get you changed." She said as she led her mommy over to the changing mats.

"Wait!" Kitty said as she crawled after them, "You still have my rock!"

The girl turned to Kitty with an angry face, "Oh yeah?" She threw the rock as far as she could across the playzone, where it disappeared into the distance. "Good luck you baby!" The 12 year old toddler then continued on her way to change her mommy's diaper.

Kitty groaned as she began to crawl her way to the other side of the play zone, deciding that from now on, once she got that rock, she wasn't letting go of it until she got it back to Felicity. As she crawled past the puppet show, she saw her mommy and Ms. Rose waving at her from the back of the crowd watching the puppets.

"Kitty," mommy began, "our play date ends in an hour, so make sure you do everything you want before we leave, ok?" Mommy asked as Ms. Rose played with her and mommies boobies. "The clock will let us know when it's 2:00, then we've got to go home. Remember that." Mommy said as she returned to watching the puppets and playing with Ms. Roses boobies too.

Nodding in understanding, Kitty crawled faster to where the rock was thrown, looking as thoroughly as she could, trying to beat the clock. Eventually, she grew worried that she'd never find the rock, and that's when Gwen came over, seeing her BFF sniffling.

"What's wrong Kitty?" Gwen asked.

"I lost a pretty glowy rock." Kitty said as she lowered her head, "And I need to find it before we leave!"

"Hmmmm...." Gwen was in deep thought about how to fix this. "I know!" She took Kitty's hands and put them on her boobies while she put hers on Kitty's boobies. "Playing with boobies always makes me happier!"

Kitty giggled despite being upset, "Gwen I....."
1521111112111112111212122222221122.title: Go to the toddler and the mommy and explain tha...

choices: Splitting up in the best way of finding the stone.
Working together is the best of finding the stone.
15211111121111121112121222222211221.content:
It was tempting. To be presented the opportunity to play with Gwen's breasts was a rare treat in its own right, but the stress of pleasing Felicity by returning the stone overtook her senses and kept it her objective front-line and centre. She retracted her hands away from Gwen's body, much to her friends confusion, and bit her lip knowing she desperately needed help.

"I want you to help me find the rock." Kitty began, leaving a worried tone in her voice.

"What's so special about it?" Gwen huffed, while Kitty had retracted her hands away from her breasts, she kept a firm hold on her friend's chest in an attempt to play.

"It belongs to my special friend." Kitty replied, "She's upset because the stones are supposed to do something pretty. She lost them and she wants me to help her find them all."

While Gwen wasn't particularly interested in 'Felicity' -- as her mind felt the strange urge to pay no mind -- Gwen couldn't help but feel upset for Kitty's own dilemma and eventually came to a decision, "I'll help. We'll work together and find the pretty stone before we have to leave. You're my best friend and I don't like it when my friends are upset."

"Thank you." Kitty felt her smile return, "We need to look around here. I watched the bad toddler throw the stone in this play-zone."

It was slightly easier said than done, as the play-zone the rock had unfortunately dropped into was the forest zone. The tall trees, foliage and hills made searching for the stone slightly harder than usual. But luckily, Kitty and Gwen were the only ones in the forest play-zone as the rest of the toddlers and infants had made their way into different parts of the building.

As Kitty and Gwen begin to search, they ultimately decide that...
15211111121111121112121222222211221.title: "...want you to help me find the rock."...

152111111211111211121212222222112211.content:
Gwen and Kitty decided that splitting up to find the pink glowy rock would be best because it worked in cartoons, and began to look around the fake trees and logs for the rock. Kitty has begun to crawl off toward the fake bridge where they played house earlier, while Gwen looked around in the play campsite.

===========

Gwen was feeling particularly grumpy with Kitty and her "special friend", Kitty never said no to playing with boobies! Especially with her BFF! She knew one thing, she did not like this Felicity at all! As she toddled around the camp, she kicked a stuffed deer away, revealing a glowy pink rock! Plopping down in her diapered bottom, she held up the rock to look at it carefully, this must be the rock Kitty wanted for her poopy-head friend!

She promised Kitty that she'd help find the rock, but she didn't want to help someone who seemed to be taking her BFF away! Looking over at the playhouse on the "island", she struggled with deciding on wether or not to give Kitty the pretty pink glowy rock. Why should some meanie stealing her bestest friend forever get this pretty rock? Why couldn't she have it?

============

As Kitty crawled around the playhouse, looking under and behind everything she could think of, she began to get worried, what if another toddler found it? What if they taked it home? Then she would never find it! But she was smart! She found the other two, surely she could find this pink one again, and then the last one after that! She just had to look hard enough.

Crawling over the painted on lake to look under the plastic bridge, she didn't see the glowy rock, but she did see some Elmo toys long forgotten, and what looked to be a lost diaper bag. Crawling away, she started to look over in the forest section again, when she remembered that's they'd have to leave soon! Looking over at the clock on the wall, she tried to figure out what it said. Poopie. This would be easier if she knew her numbers, but that wasn't until next year at daycare.

"Gwen!" She called out in the general direction that's Gwen was searching in, "Did you find it?"

Gwen looked over her shoulder at Kitty, then back at the rock in her hand. What's does she decide?
152111111211111211121212222222112211.title: Splitting up is the best way of finding the stone.

choices: "No, I want to go back to Mommy."
1521111112111112111212122222221122112.content:
While Gwen was entirely reluctant to hand the stone over to Kitty given the circumstances -- she was smart enough to realise that Kitty's worrisome attitude and the overall importance for giving the stone back to 'Felicity' was more than important than having a distaste for Kitty's strange friend. She held the pink stone in her hands and presented it to Kitty, and happily took it.

"You're the best, Gwen." The tears had stopped, and Kitty was starting to smile once again. Kitty rested the rock below her breasts, cradling the inanimate object with gentle affection before holding to tighter in one hand. "We need to see Felicity. She's going to be so happy we found another pretty rock for her."

Talking about 'Felicity' didn't do any favours for Gwen's souring mood. She wanted to get on with what remaining time she had before the clock struck two o' clock, but a part of her wanted to see who Kitty's mystery friend truly was.

"Do you think I can meet your special friend?" A slight twinge of distaste came through Gwen's tone of voice, but she forced a smile and toddled closer to Kitty and wrapped an arm around her friend's chest and pulled in for a hug.

"I don't know." Kitty hummed, "If you promise to play nice, because she's a little cranky when she talks about the pretty rocks. She doesn't act like a big baby like everyone else for a silly reason."

This piqued Gwen's interest. This definitely sounded unusual, and at most, baffling that there's someone who doesn't act like a typical toddler. It was hard to imagine someone with a lifestyle that didn't involve diapers, feedings and daycare with her regressed mind. She finally came to a conclusion and answered,
1521111112111112111212122222221122112.title: "Yes!"

15211111121111121112121222222211221122.content:
Gwen decided that helping Kitty was as far as she was going to go in regards to this mysterious "Felicity", she'd rather play and have fun rather than meet Kitty's strange friend. "I'm gonna go play in the bouncey house," Gwen said as she toddled away, "see you there."

Kitty nodded and toddled awkwardly back to the mirror, her legs not cooperating fully, but were working again.

Felicity appeared in the mirror once Kitty got in front of it, but she looked totally different, she was dressed normally! Felicity was wearing a diaper with pink words on it (Messes happen, not like either could read anymore), her hair was up in a ponytail, and she was, like Kitty, wearing nothing else.

"Hi Kitty!" Felicity waved a two Kitty, before getting distracted by her boobies swinging free.

"I got your rock!" Kitty said, forcing the rock into the mirror, where it disappeared. A brief ripple occurred on the mirror, and Felicity found herself unable to stand or walk anymore.

"Yay!" Felicity clapped her hands, "One more and everything is back to normal!" Kitty's clapped in celebration too, one more rock, and her friend would be just like everybody else! Though, she seemed to be slipping further back than Kitty on the developmental scale, seeming to act more like a baby than a toddler. Her eyes glazed over, losing focus even in the brief meeting today, Kitty could see the immaturity in her friend.

"Hey," Kitty began, "if I get you the last rock, could you come out here?" Kitty gestured to the area around her.

Felicity thought about this, but she saw her feets when she looked down, and couldn't resist sucking in them, she giggled around her toes, before looking back up at Kitty, who was still awaiting an answer. Felicity nodded, before rolling on her back and enjoying sucking on her toes.

Smiling at the prospect of her friend able to come out and join her once she got the last rock, Kitty toddled happily over to the bouncy house to wrap up her play date with Gwen. She saw Gwen on the princess bouncy castle, and hopped up to join her.

"Where's your friend?" Gwen asked as she hopped around the castle.

"She only needs one more rock, then she can come and play with us!" Kitty said, bouncing on her diapered bottom, enjoying the sensation of her boobies jigggling and bouncing around. That reminds her, "You wanna play with boobies?" Kitty asked, not at all stopping in her bouncing to look up a team her friend.

Gwen cheered and hopped over, "YES!!!", each friend reaching over to play with each other's boobies, feeling like this was the best way to end their play date.
15211111121111121112121222222211221122.title: "No, I want to go back to Mommy."

choices: Run by office to do something real quick
152111111211111211121212222222112211222.content:
When it hit 2:00, mommy and Ms. Rose found Kitty and Gwen on the bouncy castle playing together with their boobies. But the playmate was over, and mommy had other things to do today, so they had to leave.

"Kitty," mommy said as she led her away from the bouncy castle, "lay down, I need to change your diaper."

Kitty looked at her diaper, and saw that it was thoroughly soaked. Briefly she wished that she could tell when she used her diaper, but unless she made a big poopie, she never could. Besides, nobody knew when they used their diaper, that's why mommies and friends changed each other!

"Did you have fun?" Mommy asked as she slid a new diaper under Kitty.

Kitty nodded before she stuck her fingers in her mouth, enjoying the feeling of sucking on her fingers, lost in her own little bliss. As they toddled out, Kitty waved goodbye to Gwen and Ms. Rose. As they turned to go to their car, Kitty saw her babysitter! It was Maddie! Maddie was such a big girl, already finishing her third year of preschool before starting kindergarten. Kitty knew that it'd be a long time before she got there, she was only in first year daycare, she had three more years to go before she started preschool, assuming that she didn't fall into the category of people who never grew up enough to leave daycare.

Kitty noticed that Maddie was shorter than her, weren't babysitters supposed to bigger? But that was silly! Maddie was only eleven! Of course she would be shorter, but she was, developmentally, so far ahead of the curve for most people. Most people didn't hit preschool until they were Kitty's age, if they ever grew out of the baby stage at all!

Mommy waved at Maddie, "Hi Maddie!"

Maddie waved back, and headed over to Kitty and her mommy to talk. "Hi Ms. Lisa and hi Kitty." She briefly looked at her watch to check the time, Kitty wished she could tell time! "Am I still babysitting tomorrow night for you?"

Mommy (Ms. Lisa to everyone else) nodded. "Yep! I'm going to make sure we've got everything in the house for you."

Maddie nodded at that, "Well, see you guys then!" She walked, (not toddling, Kitty noticed) into the play zone.

Mommy led Kitty back to the car, and got all ready to go. Where'd they go next?
152111111211111211121212222222112211222.title: Heading home (its 2:00)

choices: Kitty continues arguing and breaks free from the stroller
Kitty stops arguing and helps Mommy with shopping
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
A few minutes of drifting in and out of reality proved to be too futile for Kitty to handle. Her eyelids drooped and soon the echoes of Mommy's voice pushed her into a deep sleep, "We're going to the supermarket."

---

Upon waking, Kitty found herself strapped in a large stroller with Max sleeping beside her. The supermarket seemed somewhat empty -- despite being in the middle of the afternoon -- with the quiet atmosphere providing a sense of calm amongst the few shoppers. An assortment of babies, toddlers and infants were toddling and crawling down the aisles picking and choosing their favourite meals. With families grabbing large packs of diapers, food jars and new sets of infantile clothing to match for the adults themselves and their children alike.

While Kitty had resorted to chewing on her fingers to relieve the boredom, she noticed the shopping basket above her stroller had been filled with several jars of food and baby formula which set off something unpleasant in Kitty's mind. Her drool-ridden hand grabbed onto the side of the basket and removed the bottle formula with a second of preparation to toss the small plastic container away, but Mommy's hand swiped back and retrieved the formula in an instant.

"No, no." Mommy warned, "That's for tomorrow night. The formula is for when I'm not at home."

Kitty let out an indignant huff, "Formula is icky! I don't like it."

"Too bad," Mommy placed the container of formula back into the basket, with an additional measure of keeping it further out of Kitty's grubby reach. "You're not going to have any milk when I'm gone, and Maddie doesn't have any boobies."

That angered Kitty more than she liked to admit, "It's not fair. Why can't I have normal nummies? I don't want baby jars or formula."

"It's just for one night." Mommy cooed, "You'll be busy playing games with Max and Maddie so it shouldn't matter."
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Simple shopping errands

choices: Kitty refuses to take her nap
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Kitty's infantile mind wasn't giving up in her fight for nummies, "I don't care if it's only one night! I want your boobies!" Kitty screamed at mommy.

Mommy was undeterred, "I know you don't like solid food or baby food, so formula is the only other choice." She said as she grabbed a pack of diapers, "Mommy has to go to that fancy meeting tomorrow night." She looked down at Kitty, a look of understanding on her face, "You'll understand if you become a big girl."

Kitty crossed her arms and huffed in frustration. "Will you give me nummies before you leave?"

Mommy wasn't happy with the attitude Kitty was giving off, "Not if you keep sulking about it."

Kitty simmered in her anger as mommy continued to shop, she wanted mommies boobies! She wanted nummies! Even if Maddie was a fun babysitter, Kitty didn't like the taste of anything other than mommies milk, preferably straight from the source.

Looking over, she saw Max happily drooling in his sleep, his thumb hanging out of his mouth, and a very heavily used diaper around his waist.

"Mommy! Max used his diaper!"

Mommy shushed her before gently lifting up the 18 year old baby and changing him on a nearby changing table, and while she was distracted, Kitty slipped out of the stroller and grabbed the various food items and made a toddle to put them back.

"Kitty! No!" Mommy called, grabbing Kitty's arm and pulling her back. "You need to to listen!" Mommy said as she opened up the back side of Kitty's diaper, Kitty began to struggle, but against mommy, she was unable to make good her escape.

======

Kitty sore bottom was well and truly red underneath her diaper. She suckled on her fingers as mommy went through checkout, and Kitty made a point to look away from mommy on the way to the van.

"You're so cranky, I forgot to give you your nap in the playzone." Mommy said as she helped Kitty into her car seat. "I'll put you down for your nap once we're home."

Kitty just grumbled as the van began its trip back to the house.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Kitty continues arguing

1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Once back home, Kitty was put down on a plush blankie in the living room next to her brother Max. The exciting play date at the play zone had really tired her out, and once she snuggled herself into a comfortable position, she drifted off to sleep quickly.

Her dream was weird, she was wearing clothes, and shoes, and not wearing a diaper, and her brother Max could talk in full sentences, not just a few words at a time! And she did shopping and driving, all the things that mommy did! And the strangest part? Everyone wasn't wearing diapers!

She woke up feeling much refreshed by her nap, finding that she was much calmer and more relaxed after sleeping for a bit. Looking over, she saw Max was getting his dinner nummies from mommy, and she smiled, the weird dream was over, and she'd be getting nummies soon! As she sat up to play with some toys while she waited, she noticed her diaper was sagging, and decided to remove the uncomfortable garment. A few quick tugs on the straps released the diaper from her waist, and she began to toddle nakie around the playset, having an adventure with her princess toys.

"Kitty, dinner time." Mommy called from the other side of the living room.

Kitty giggled in happiness, and toddled as quickly as she could over to mommy, her boobies swinging freely, and as naked as a jaybird. "Nummies!" She called as she laid down to suckle.

Kitty decided to enjoy this while she could, tomorrow night she'd be babysat by Maddie, and she wouldn't be getting nummies because Maddie didn't have boobies.

Once she was done, mommy burped her. "All better my little jaybird!"

"Me nakie! Me do! Me do!" She sang, pointing to the discarded diaper as if undressing herself to be naked was a grownup thing to do.

"If you wanna be nakie, you gotta play outside." Mommy said, ushering Kitty and Max outside for nakie playtime. "I'll be cleaning in here, and play nice with Max!"

Kitty nodded as Max began to cry out, "Nakie me! Nakie me!"

Mommy giggled as Max demanded to get nakie too, and removed his diaper, "Have fun my nakie jaybirds!"

Kitty looked around the backyard, what does she play with first?
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Kitty willingly takes her nap

choices: Mommy calls them inside for bedtime
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Kitty, enjoying her nakie time, did a clumsy hop into the kiddie pool, and began playing the the toy boats and young sea animals in the half a foot of water. She was in the middle of having her princess duck stink Max's toy boats when she remembered that Felicity appeared in the pool water once! She began looking around at the reflection in the pool, but didn't find her. Maybe she was busy and couldn't talk? That sounds ok, Kitty only needed to find one more rock, and then Felicity could come out and play with her!

Her happy thoughts were interrupted by Max crawling in the pool after his sister, intent on getting to his toy boats. "Max!" She yelled as he splashed her. "Stupid-head." She muttered as she turned around, putting her back and bare bottom to her little brother, intent on playing by herself.

"Kitty!" Max said, poking her from behind, "Wan' play!" He began to whine, Kitty realized that she might as well humor him, mommy did tell her to play nice with Max.

"Fine." She stood up in the pool, looking down on her little brother in the pool, "Imma be a princess, you be my helper!" She decided at least she could play princess, and Max was too little to want to do any icky boy games.

"Ok!" Max said, crawling after his sister as she toddled unsteadily toward the playhouse to get one of her princess crowns.

"I'm Princess Kitty, and in my kingdom, we's nakie!" She said as she placed the crown on her head before striking a "regal" pose, "We don' wear no diapees!"

Max cheered and crawled after her, intent on playing with his sister.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: The plastic kiddie pool

1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
After a long game of "Nakie Princess Kitty (and her helper Max)", mommy called Kitty and Max inside for a bath and beddy-byes. As Kitty and Max sat on the bathroom floor waiting for the tub to fill up, mommy came in with bath toys and towels for everyone. Once mommy had the bathtub filled up, and checked to make sure the water wasn't too hot, she helped Kitty and Max in before taking off her diaper and shirt and sliding in after her children.

Kitty and Max were distracted with the toys as mommy shampooed their hair, Kitty and Max distracted in particular by Kitty's boobies, enjoying the splashes that they could make. When mommy had them stand up so she could apply soap, Kitty noticed Max's hairless pee-pee. For some reason, she felt like she shouldn't be seeing her brothers pee-pee. She looked down at her own hairless pee-pee and then looked over at mommy's, but she just couldn't place the feeling that she shouldn't be taking a bath with her family. But why shouldn't she take a bath with her family? She certainly couldn't give herself a bath, and baths were more fun when you had people to play with!

Once mommy was done rinsing them off, she climbed out of the tub and began to dry herself off before putting her sleep diaper and PJ shirt on and leaving to get Max's and Kitty's sleep diapers and onesie PJ's.

When she returned, she took Kitty out first, helping her into her princess onesie, and Kitty's entertained herself with the drying bath toys on the floor. When Max was helped out, he put up a fight, refusing to wear his diaper. Mommy had to promise him that if he was a big boy, he'd be able to go nakie tomorrow. That consoled him enough to let her diaper him.

As mommy led them to their room, Kitty couldn't help but feel that she had her own room this morning, but as she was led into the room, her toys and crib on one side, and Max's on the other, she couldn't tell where that memory came from. She snuggled into her big pillow and blankie, before sticking her thumb in her mouth and drifting off to sleep, forgetting all her confusing memories.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Mommy calls them inside for bedtime

choices: Felicity escapes the mirror and lands beside Kitty inside the crib
Felicity and Kitty swap. Kitty resides in the mirror and Felicity is free
Nothing happened. The glowing sensation disappeared with Felicity's reflection
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Sunday wasn't as busy as the days before. There wasn't a plan, or a specific task to perform so today was as carefree and as relaxed as they came. The only unsettling fact -- surviving a entire night without Mommy's nummies -- was going to be very tough when Maddie comes to babysit. The morning and afternoon were the best times to make the most of what Mommy had to offer before she left.

Mommy had waddled into Kitty and Max's bedroom, grinning proudly at the state of her used diaper in tow, and took to feeding Max first and foremost. Kitty, while trapped in her crib, whined and fussed as she could do nothing but watch as her brother had his filling first.

A few minutes went by, and Kitty had enough of being forced to watch her brother greedily suckle on Mommy's breast. But luckily, Mommy had seemed to stop feeding Max, "I'm going to change my diaper and then I'll feed you." As Mommy left, Kitty found herself heading back to her small pile of toys within the crib and decided to pick up her pink mirror.

Inside the mirror, Kitty could see Felicity in the corner of her bedroom. Kitty's counterpart appeared to be visibly upset with something, and it suddenly set off alarms in Kitty's regressed mind. She took to hiding under her blanket and whispered through the mirror, "What's wrong, Felicity?"

Felicity was startled, "Leave me alone. I'm not feeling so good."

Upon closer inspection, Felicity seemed to be covering her bare chest with her arms and legs. Her body was bundled into a slight ball with an obviously discarded unused diaper thrown across the other side of the room. "You're upset, Felicity. I don't like it when my friends are upset."

"Upset?" Felicity repeated, her tone started to bring in a harsh anger towards her current state. "Upset?! I'm trapped in a stupid nursery! I'm trapped in here for all eternity!" While Kitty couldn't see clearly, a series of tears streamed down Felicity's face and fell onto her chest.

"Don't say that! Best friends aren't supposed to be in mirrors. They're supposed to be together!" Kitty suddenly felt awful, she brushed her drool-laden fingers across the mirror's plastic surface in an attempt to reach for Felicity.

"How can we co-exist? We're the same person. The rules of the universe don't work like that."

Kitty felt a pang of frustration, she wanted to comfort her sobbing friend, but the limits of the mirror prevented her from reaching. "Come to the mirror! I want to hug you!"

It took a minute, but Felicity slowly crawled over to the mirror, arms covering her bare breasts and slowly nudged against the mirror. Felicity took the initiative to rest the mirror against her chest and hug her mirror, the energy between Felicity and Kitty began to cause a bright blue glow emit from the cracks.

Both Felicity and Kitty recoiled and suddenly felt their minds numb as the blue glowing sensation drew them closer to the mirror.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Sunday morning nummies

choices: Felicity snaps out of the hazy feeling
Felicity begins to regress to Kitty's level
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Kitty felt a massive sensation of vertigo, and felt as if the air around her had grown extremely hot, and the glowing blue light prevented her from seeing anything. When the light faded, Felicity was sprawled out naked on the floor of the room. Kitty smiled and clapped her hands, happy that her friend had been able to leave that mean mirror.

Something seemed different about the room though, looking at her half of the room, she saw that all her stuff was still in its haphazard piles, and that the walls on her side were a pastel pink, while the other half was also very frilly, but instead of pink, a shade of purple.
