"Don't say that! Do I even remotely sound like Kitty and Max? They're too dumb to use words like WE can. Just a few days ago, I was teaching you how to use a computer, ride a bike, and stop those bullies from stealing your homework."

"What the...?" Maddie blinked, she crawled slightly-closer towards Felicity and looked at her straight in the eyes. "How do you know about the bullies?"

"It wasn't supposed to be like this," Felicity replied, she nudged a little closer to Maddie and continued to lock eyes. "I messed with some stuff that I wasn't supposed to be messing with and suddenly everything's wrong. We're not supposed to be wearing diapers or sucking on pacifiers. You've felt that tingling feeling in your head, haven't you?"

"My Mommy said that was a good feeling." Maddie bit her lip. "But... You're right. You don't act like Kitty or Max, like, as if, you aren't a baby or something. Is there even a word for that?"

The seeds of doubt had, at-least, been planted. Tears started to run down Felicity's face, "I'm so sorry for what happened. If you understood how ridiculous you look wearing that diaper at age eleven is then you'd understand."

Something was definitely wrong. As far as Maddie could tell, given to her higher education, that Felicity's behaviour wasn't like the others. She spoke clearly, knew about the bullies and seemed genuine in her plea for help. If there's something wrong with reality, then something had to be done in order to fix it.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Felicity tries to convince Maddie

choices: Felicity tries to get Kitty to explain where she was from
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
"Alright," Maddie began, "but before I do anything, I'm going to change that diaper, you don't want a rash do you?"

Looking down a thing her soiled diaper, Felicity blushed and complied, laying down on the changing mat and letting her babysitter clean her and get her a new diaper.

As Maddie was changing Felicity's diaper, she mulled over what she'd heard from her older charge, and didn't know what to think. Sure she talked better than other on her level, but everyone developed at different speeds, in the long run Felicity wasn't really that unique...but she did know about the bullies. The other thing that confused her and threw her for a loop was that's Felicity said that she'd been messing around with something she shouldn't have, but what? It sounded like an episode of Rescuebots that her brother liked to watch when he came back to visit from first grade.

Actually, now that she thought about it, it WAS an episode that she remembered catching parts of when her brother was home last week! They messed up the universe, swapping cats and dogs roles and the good guy and bad guy roles.

"Filly," Maddie asked, "how can you prove that you're not not making this up? You might've just heard me talking about my bullies somewhere."

Felicity snapped back to reality and realized that her diaper change was done, so she could sit up now, and had to figure out how to prove her story as true. But what could she do? The stones were gone, and unless she could find a way to prove her story, she'd just be thought of as an imaginative baby.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Maddie needs time to think it over and changes ...

choices: Maddie asks Kitty about the mirror
Maddie wants to know a few more things
Kitty and Max interrupt, with Kitty upset that she wants food
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
The energy from the stones had disappeared once Felicity climbed across either side of the mirrors. She thought of several examples of the inconsistencies of this world, "Alright, there's loads of stuff that doesn't make sense."

"Like what?" Maddie asked, she sat in front of Felicity and crossed her legs.

"Why are we always drinking..." Felicity cringed, "Breastmilk? Mushy food and other baby foods? I'm supposed to be a lot older and I need meat, vegetables and loads of other minerals and vitamins to keep healthy. I can't be healthy if I keep eating the same thing over and over."

"Breastmilk is good," Maddie simple responded, shrugging. "It's so good we don't need anything else."

"Then what's the point of baby mush and other stuff if all we need is breastmilk?"

"That's..." Maddie stopped to think. It's true, breastmilk was always a favourite meal for everyone she's ever known, even to the point where it was all people wanted. The other foods just seemed so inconsistent and pointless. "Weird..."

"If people have always been wearing diapers, then why isn't there a push for recyclable diapers? If people have been using diapers since, forever, then why isn't there worries about used diapers in landfills and harm done to the environment?"

For once, Maddie was left dumbfounded, she couldn't grasp and comprehend such a wide range of important questions. She was definitely smarter than most people, but she found herself feeling small and dumb at the complexity of such questions. "I don't know how to respond..." Maddie whimpered. "They're too tough to answer."

"You know I'm right," Felicity responded, "I KNOW you're smart enough to know when a building block doesn't fit in the hole. If you want extra facts, ask Kitty about my image being in the mirror."

"What do you mean? Mirror?" Maddie asked.

"I was trapped in a mirror when reality was changed. Kitty freed me by getting several powerful stones, but they've lost their power and need to recharge before they do anything else. Ask her!"
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Felicity tries to get Kitty to explain

choices: Felicity wakes up, its morning and time for daycare (mommy's home)
Felicity, filled with breastmilk, acts a bit more babyish
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
"Alright," Maddie was definitely seeing the possibility that the universe had changed, but she wanted to see what Kitty said about this. "I'll go he told Kitty, we'll see what she has to say."

As Maddie left to go get Kitty, Felicity felt happy and excited, genuinely excited! She may not be able to find a way to fix the universe, but she certainly could get people to realize what was wrong! Suddenly, she saw a shimmer across the room, almost like everything went out of focus for a moment, and then it returned to normal.

"What was that?" She asked herself, but looked up and smiled when she saw Maddie bringing Kitty (and Max for some reason) down the hall.

Maddie took the two over to the living room with Felicity and sat them down before heading off to the kitchen, coming back with warmed bottles of milk. "Alright guys, here's dinner!" She said as she passed them out to the three before she grabbed hers and started drinking her dinner.

"Uh, Maddie, did you forget something?" Felicity asked.

"No. It's dinnertime, and those are the bottles your mommy made for you."

Felicity was a bit worried now, "What about the baby mush and other foods?"

Maddie raised an eyebrow at Felicity, "What other foods? All we eat is our mommies breast milk, and they get theirs from their own, buy it tab the store, or another mommy."

Oh no. Felicity realized what happened, the universe was still trying to reduce her to a baby, trying to ensure that she'd have no way out! "What about recyclable diapers? Why don't we have those?"

Maddie just looked at Felicity like she'd grown another head, "Whats recycling?"

Meanwhile, Kitty and Max simply looked between the two, enjoying the argument with their heads going back and forth between the two like at a good tennis match.

"Taking something old and remaking it to something new and useful. I mean, what happens to the diapers once we throw them away?" Felicity tried to find an out, something that the universe didn't take away.

Maddie shrugged, "Our diapers go in the trash, then they go away forever in the trash truck. What's there to know?"

"Don't landfills or the garbage dumps get pretty filled up?" Felicity asked.

"What're those things?" Maddie asked.

Felicity looked down, realizing that her previously arguments had been fixed, now she imagined that the only food she'd be getting would be milk, and SOMETHING was happening to keep the world from being buried in diapers, but whatever it was, was beyond the comprehension of either her or Maddie. Feeling extremely hungry, she decided to have her dinner while it was still warm, and began to suck on her bottle, her eyelids drooping as her tummy got filled up with all that warm mommy's milk.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Maddie asks Kitty about the mirror

choices: Felicity bumps into Maddie, who happens to be looking after her class.
Felicity attempts to sneak out with Kitty tagging along
Felicity is greeted by Mikey, mistaking her for Kitty
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Whatever had changed Maddie's perception of reality to remove the suggestion that something was wrong with reality had long-since disappeared. If anything, the morning couldn't get any worse. The lengths and effort Felicity went through with hiding her embarrassment at breakfast was an understatement. She couldn't stomach having to idly sip from a large baby bottle, nor stand to look at Kitty and Max's naked bodies happily gorging on breakfast.

Afterwards was slightly more pleasant, while Kitty and Max opted to be left in just their newly-changed diapers, Felicity took the opportunity to choose a set of clothes and seemed to be the most mature, per Mommy's suggestions, and came prepared wearing a set of denim toddler-esque overalls and a pink t-shirt underneath. Her thick diaper didn't do any favours for her slight waddle, and threw her balance off-centre somewhat.

"We're going to daycare, Felicity!" Kitty happily exclaimed, "Aren't you excited?"

"Not really." Felicity felt a lump develop in her throat, "It's embarrassing to be in daycare. I shouldn't even be in daycare. I'm a college student nearing my final exams, not a toddler."

The journey in the car left a small pit develop in Felicity's stomach. For every stop, turned corner and eventual string of slow traffic, left her to look out the window and witness the rest of the infantile world go about its business. People in diapers, seemingly ignorant of the true reality, happily playing and conversing amongst one-another. Felicity couldn't bear to keep looking out the window.

Upon arriving at the daycare, Kitty and Felicity exited the car with slight pause as Kitty used her diaper mid-exit and waddled over to the doors. Felicity eventually looked back and saw Mommy waving goodbye with a cheerful smile, with Max seemingly oblivious to the world around him.

Gulping, Felicity slowly took a deep breath and passed through the doors and followed Kitty into the playroom.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Felicity wakes up and heads to daycare

choices: Learning about colors (Felicity has problems with identitying them)
She uses her diaper and gets changed in front of the class
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
As the two sisters toddled into their classroom, Felicity saw the name plate for her former professors on the desk. "Ms. Stacy-Teacher, Ms. Polly-Assistant" she read as she passed the desk.

"Hi Kitty!" A familiar voice called from somewhere to her left. Looking over, she felt her stomach drop: it was her (former) boyfriend Mike (now Mikey), naked except for his diaper, toddling up to her. "Did ya miss me?" He asked as he hugged her awkwardly, not really having any coordination with his arms anymore.

"Silly Mikey!" Kitty laughed from behind her, "I'm Kitty!" Kitty said that last part loudly, opening her arms wide for a hug.

Looking back and forth between the two, Mikey looked like he was ready to question his whole world up to now. "There's two of you?"

"No." Felicity said as she looked at her bare feet, "I'm Feli...Fel...Filly." She finally got it out, trying to hold back her tears as she realized that her speech was beginning to be affected, now she couldn't even say her name.

"She's my sister! We're twins!" She hugged Felicity awkwardly from the side, and Felicity tried to ignore the bare boobies....breasts being squished against her side.

Mikey looked between the two of them, "Both of you?"

Felicity almost cried a tear at how stupid that question was since Mike was so smart originally (he'd been planning to become a lawyer), but her reply was interrupted by Kitty. "Yep! Mommy said I'm older by ten minutes!"

As the two oversized toddlers talked about what it was like to have a twin, Felicity toddled away, intent on just trying to get through today without any more mental damage. Looking around the classroom, she noticed that practically each and everyone in her class was only wearing a diaper, even Ms. Stacy and Ms. Polly were only wearing their diapers. The handful wearing anything other than just their diapers were boys wearing a favorite shirt, and a girl with a frilly skirt that didn't cover her diaper at all, and no top as most girls seemed to prefer doing. She blushed as she realized that she'd inevitably stand out and get odd looks through the day, but it was worth being dressed, even if bras seemed to be an alien concept, some of the girls here looked like they could use one. Looking down, she realized that she was a few sizes bigger than before too.

In her partially regressed mind, this made some level of twisted logic to Felicity, since breast milk had become the only food now thanks to her pointing out the lack of logic last night, being topless ensured that when a girl started.....making milk (another hit to her pride as she realized she'd forgotten several words, and couldn't remember what that was called), it made it easier for her friends or kids to get access to their meals. And larger boobies would allow for mommies to give bigger meals to their much larger babies.

Not looking forward to the rest of the day, she plopped down in a spot on the floor in front of where the teachers would be having today's lesson. "How bad can the day be?" She asked herself.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Felicity is greeted by Mikey, mistaking her for...

choices: “Forget it! I’ll just stay like this for a while.”
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
While the class hadn’t started, the small-talk and idle chatter amongst her regressed peers ranged from boring, embarassing and overall dull. The conversations about relationships, life and higher-education were gone. Replaced with topics on how well one is capable of filling their diapers, toy collections and wanting to become naked — of all things.

Kitty and Mike weren’t far behind. Both toddling behind Felicity’s crouched body and took their own seats, leaving Felicity with each regressed toddler sitting beside her. Kitty wrapped an arm around Felicity’s waist, pulling her in for an uncomfortable hug, and rested her head on her un-regressed twin sister’s shoulder.

“Filly, Filly.” Kitty mumbled into Felicity’s ear, causing her to respond by wincing, “If you need a diaper change then you just have to ask the teacher. She’s really good at changing.”

“She’s the best.” Mikey added, grinning, “She looks after all the boys and girls, especially the boys.”

There was a thousand ways to interpret this, but Felicity fought to ignore their comments and narrowed her gaze forward, intent on blocking out all distractions. Her eyes widened as she suddenly felt a sudden warmth develop around her crotch, her bottom lip quivered and her legs involuntarily twitched in surprise.

“Oh no,” Felicity gasped, she drove her hands down towards her crotch and found her overalls getting in the way. She needed to remove the icky diaper, but found herself fumbling at her crotch buttons to break the overalls away.

“What’s wrong?” Mikey started to notice Felicity’s fumbling, “Did you use your diaper?”

“N-No...” Felicity hissed, she jerked herself away from Mikey and Kitty with a groan, hands still latched onto her crotch. “I just need to go somewhere private.”

“Why?” Kitty mumbled, removing her fingers through her mouth. “Need the teacher to check your diaper? It’s okay, we can’t tell when we go either.”
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: She uses her diaper and gets changed

choices: Learn about colors  (felicity gets them wrong)
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Despite her claim earlier that she could do this on her own, Felicity realized that she needed help. Her hand coordination was gone, her attempts at unbuckling her overalls amounted to smacking uselessly at the buckles with her hands. "Fine," she said quietly to Kitty, "I need help."

"Ms. Stacy!" Kitty yelled out, getting the attention of the whole class, "Filly needs a change!!"

Felicity's face turned bright red as everyone's looked at her, and then surprisingly everyone looked away, but Felicity remembered that this was the norm here. Ms. Stacy came over with a diaper bag, and it took her a minute to figure out the buckles too, but she managed to get the overalls off. "Alright, lay down Filly." She said as she pulled a fresh diaper out.

"What?" Felicity was shocked, she'd seriously change her out in the open like this?

"Lay down sweetie, I need to change your diaper."

Felicity shook her head, "No."

Ms. Stacy smiled condescendingly at her, "But if I don't change your diaper, you'll get a rash, and you don't want that do you?"

Felicity weighed her options in her head, and finally consented, laying down and letting her business get exposed to Kitty, Mikey, and the rest of the class. Even though everyone wasn't focusing on her, it still felt like everyone was watching this moment to taunt her with forever.

"All done!" Ms. Stacy said, throwing the used diaper away. "Let's get ready for class everyone!"

Looking down a thing her bare legs, Felicity realized that Ms. Stacy hadn't put her overalls back on, she had them balled up with the diaper bag. "Ms. Stacy, can I have my pants back?"

"Hmm?" Ms. Stacy looked over and giggled, "You won't need them sweetie, they're too hard to get off and on, and we don't want them getting dirty or ruined later in the day do we?"

Sighing, Felicity realized that her overalls were a lost cause, and decided to focus on keeping her shirt on at least. "Alright Ms. Stacy." She said, just waiting for this to be over so she could go home and hide from the world.

"Alright class," Ms. Stacy began, "today we're going to..."
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: “Alright... I need some help.”

choices: Mikey calms Felicity with a cuddle.
Felicity bursts into tears over the answer
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
"We're going to be learning about colours."

This was going to be easy. Despite being surrounded by mentally regressed versions of her peers -- and by extension, a duplicate of herself in daycare was an absolute nightmare. A mischievous grin, almost dripping with an air of superiority loomed over her as she knew the answers before the lesson had even started. If there was one thing Felicity could do, and that was show her intelligence over her regressed friends and show off her college-tier education in front of the equivalent of teenage toddlers.

A handful of large laminated cards were stuck to the blackboard by Ms. Stacey, each representing a single colour, all of which were pastel toned for the regressed toddlers could easily see. While Felicity, Mikey and Kitty focused their attention on the cards being set up, the rest of the class seemed to eventually lose interest, resorting to suckling their thumbs, pacifiers and playing with their toys.

"So class, there's some pretty pictures of colours you've seen in different places. Which colour is this?" Ms. Stacey pointed at a nearby image, prompting Kitty and Mikey to mumble a few incomprehensible words before shrugging. Felicity grinned,

"It's blue," Felicity raised her hand, "Blue is the colour of the ocean and the sky."

"Wrong."

Felicity blinked, "W-Wrong?"

She felt her stomach perform several flips. Felicity was so sure her answer was the correct one -- but alas, Kitty raised her own hand and took the initiative to respond, "It's green! Green! Like grass!"

"Correct." Ms. Stacy nodded, smiling in approval at Kitty's answer, she leaned forward and ruffled her student's hair. Felicity gaped, her moment to shine was robbed by her infantile doppelganger, leaving her fuming.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Learn about colors  (felicity gets them wrong)

choices: Ms. Stacey punishes Felicity and Mikey for being 'innapropriate' in class
Felicity lets her feelings get the best of her and kisses Mikey
Kitty uses her diaper, and wants Felicity and Mikey's attention
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
This shouldn't have angered Felicity as much as it did. The notion of getting an answer wrong in class, altered reality or not, had set off a flurry of fustration and anger over as something as simple as getting a colour wrong. She couldn't help but cross her arms and pout, resembling more and more of a toddler than before with each passing moment. A silver lining came as Kitty hadn't decided to gloat over her perceived smartness -- yet. She couldn't let her doppelganger, Mikey or anyone else actually think they're smarter than her.

"Feeling okay?" A pair of uncoordinated hands slowly crept along Felicity's waist, bringing her to shiver as Mikey's cold hands pulled her into a soft cuddle. The regressed teenager leaned against Felicity's body, humming in delight as he brought himself closer to Kitty's sister. "You looked upset. Cuddles always make Kitty feel better, you'll like them too."

It felt disturbing at first, to simply bring herself to lock eyes with her regressed boyfriend brought back several pleasant memories of the days they spent time together. His lean, almost-naked frame was still attractive, and his curly brown hair was still as messy as it always had been. Felicity smiled, but she couldn't tell whether she was faking it, or feeling the sudden warmth grow across her chest.

"T-Thanks." Felicity responded, she gingerly accepted the cuddle by leaning into Mikey's chest. It didn't seem to matter if anyone was paying attention to their body language, it felt comforting to be embraced by Mikey's arms again -- regressed or otherwise, she sorely missed this type of comfort.

The rest of the class had begun to lose attention in Ms. Stacey's lesson. While Kitty and a select few were exceptions to the rule, the rest were starting to become restless as their diapers began to fill or nearby toys stole their attention away from learning. Felicity and Mikey, too, were also losing focus as they wrapped themselves in the moment.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Mikey calms Felicity with a cuddle.

choices: Try and pay attention to the lesson
She feels compelled to play with the baby toys
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Stressed out and in the embrace of her once-boyfriend, she simply followed her old instincts and leaned in and kissed him on the cheek, but didn't get the reaction that she usually did.

"Why!? I'm Kitty's not yours!" Mikey cried as he distanced himself from her, rubbing his cheek in an effort to remove where Felicity had kissed him, looking nervously over at his special girl to see if she noticed before looking back at Felicity.

"I'm sorry..." Felicity mumbled, looking down, trying not to make the situation worse, "It just felt good, I'm sorry..."

Mikey couldn't stay mad at Kitty's little sister, and simply hugged her again, "It's okay, like Kitty said, she'll help you with colors!" He smiled at her, and Felicity smiled back, glad that's she hadn't accidentally made Mikey or Kitty into daycare enemies against her.

Satisfied that she wasn't sad anymore, Mikey toddled off, leaving Felicity to either refocus on the simple, but increasingly more difficult lesson, or let herself go and play. As she was wondering what to do, she leaned forward subconsciously and filled her diaper with all that poopy she didn't get out earlier. Unaware of her full diaper, Felicity sat there, wondering what she should do now that's her breakdown had been reversed.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Felicity lets her feelings get the best of her ...

choices: It was Kitty, who looked concerned for her twin sister.
It was Ms. Polly, who offered to change Felicity's diaper.
It was Mikey's friend, Toby. Who looked to flirt with Felicity.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
A few minutes had passed, and left Felicity to ponder on what to do next as the rest of the lesson continued. The other students in daycare seemed to care less about Ms. Stacey or what Ms. Polly had to offer, leaving the rest of the infantilized teenagers to dawdle away from the centre of the room and look for something else to do. Few sat together, intently keeping their concentration on the lesson about colours. The others, had resorted to filling their diapers or latching onto a nearby toy to keep themselves occupied. As tough as it was, the temptation to join the rest of her regressed peers seemed more difficult than ever.

The deciding factor was, inevitably, thinking about Mikey's own regression. She slowly slumped away from the remaining students who wanted to learn and crawled over to a nearby unmanned pile of toys in a quiet corner of the room. A buildup of tears, sniffles and an unsettling feeling develop inside her tummy had left her confused and upset over Mikey's relationship with Kitty. He was hers, or now because of the alterations done to reality, he was hers. Even the smell and the horrid feeling of sitting in a used diaper couldn't overwhelm the sudden feelings of losing Mikey.

While on the verge of becoming visibly upset in front of the class, Felicity felt a need to hide her emotions and distract her thoughts with something else. She latched onto a nearby large teddy bear, wrapping her arms around its soft frame before burying her head into its shoulder. The pleasant baby powdered aroma coming from the teddy's soft fur brought a sincere smile, amidst the sniffling and tears, she closed her eyes and let her body rest up against the large bear's body for comfort.

"It's not fair! It's not fair! Why can't everything go back to normal?"

A few moments sinking into the teddy's soft belly, and Felicity heard footsteps toddle towards her. She opened her eyes, peeking, and looked to see who it was approaching her.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: She feels compelled to play with the baby toys

choices: Kitty interrupts, playing with her own reflection or the tea party is ready
Felicity remembers how a mirror works
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
"Hi Filly..." Kitty sad, wringing her hands together looking concerned for her twin. "Are you otay?" She asked, sitting down next to her stinky sister.

Felicity looked the the teddy bear, hugging it closer, "Imma little upset.."

"Is it about the colors?" Kitty asked, leaning in and hugging her sister, "Don' worry, I teach you."

Realizing that nobody had the mental capacity to understand her problem, but accepting the comforting hug, Felicity leaned into Kitty, hugging her sister in return. Despite the whole mess (the reality change, not her poopy diaper) she was in, she did feel better with the hug from Kitty, maybe she could make it through this!

"Thanks Kitty." Felicity said as Kitty broke off the hug.

Kitty smiled widely, and clapped her hands excitedly, glad that her sister was happier now, "Lets pway pwetty pwincesses!" She exclaimed.

Felicity, though she felt better, wasn't about to wear a tiara and a tutu over her diaper, and decided to offer another game instead, "What about a teddy tea party?" She asked, holding the teddy bear up.

Kitty smiled and nodded, "Yeah! Imma get the tea set!" And she toddled off to the toy box and started to dig out the tea party supplies.

Giggling at her sisters antics, Felicity got up, noticing that her diapey felt a little heavier than normal, but shrugged it off, not realizing that she'd used it and simply attributed the weight to a different brand of diapers. Plopping down at the low table that Kitty was setting up with other stuffed toys, setting them in ideal spots to make sure they could play equally with all of them, Felicity hugged her teddy bear tight, glad that her stress and sad feelings had faded away so easily.

Letting her mind and eyes wander while Kitty setup the tea party, Felicity saw a lady that looked just like her! She was sitting at a table too! And when Felicity got up, and toddled unsteadily to her, so did the lady! Smiling, Felicity noticed that the lady had gone poopy in her diaper, and giggled, "Hey lady, you went poopy!" She said to her, but the lady didn't say anything, giggling just like Felicity.

Plopping down in front of the mirror, Felicity started to play peakaboo with her reflection, not realizing that her mind wasn't making the connection of how a mirror worked. As Felicity enjoyed playing peekaboo, her game was interrupted as:
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: It was Kitty, who looked concerned for her twin...

Filly and Kitty want to be nakie
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
"Hey Filly!" Kitty called from behind her, "The table's all set! Let's pway!"

Turning around, Felicity saw that the table had been set up, and all the toys seated in the perfect spot, getting up to toddle back to the table, she waved bye-bye at the lady in the poopy diaper before plopping down on the opposite side of the table. "I'm ready!" She sang to Kitty.

Clapping her hands, Kitty smiled and the two began their tea party, Felicity was thoroughly enjoying herself, Mr. Stuffy (her teddy bear), was a perfect gentleman, siding with Filly on everything she said. Filly especially found it funny when Kitty reached over to 'refill' Mr. elephants tea, and she stopped midway, her boobies knocking over the cups as they'd swung there, while Kitty made a poopy and then continued like nothing happened.

Filly and Kitty were so focused on their tea party that they didn't notice their messy diapers until the teacher and assistant teacher came over and changed them, the twins just giggled through it all, Felicity's adult mind wrapped in so many layers on infantile behavior, and drowning in yummy breast milk, that a full recovery to her former mental state was almost impossible by now. Filly had just laid there as her mess was wiped of, giggling and sucking on her fingers, her bare boobies out for everyone to see.

Eventually, daycare had to end, and Mommy came and picked up Kitty, Filly, and their brother, before heading home. It was only 3:00 (not that Filly could tell time anymore, much less read), and the twins were left downstairs while mommy put their brother down for a nap in his room.

When mommy came back downstairs, Filly and Kitty were sitting cross-legged opposite each other and playing with each other's boobies, making their mommy giggle too. "Who wants nummies?" Mommy asked as she sat down, gesturing to her boobies.

"I do!" Both girls squealed in joy, crawling haphazardly toward their mommies boobies, before each latched onto a nipple and began suckling.

All the while, Felicity's adulthood was slowing drowning in playtime and nummies, little Filly had appeared to have taken control, unaware of what she was losing.
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.title: Kitty interrupts, playing with her own reflecti...

Ms. Stacy didn't know, and gets changed
1521111112111112111212122222221122112222.content:
Kitty, smiling at her success, looked over at Felicity, who was staring at the cards with an intense stare. "What's the matter Filly?" Kitty asked, nudging her twin, "Dont be upset, I'm the older sister, so I'm supposed to be smarter."

Felicity looked over at Kitty, almost like she was seeing her for the first time, "But it's supposed to be blue!"

Kitty giggled, shaking her head, "Nuh-uh, we learned about green a few days ago, I remember!" 152231.content:
It started with a bright flash of light in the sky, and then a shrug of indifference. A series of changes had begun to affect the small town of Redwood in many different ways, and not a sinple person was spared. The children, teenagers and all adults were starting to act differently, and everyone was none the wiser to the comet's effects. Reality had begun to change and mold everyone's perceptions into something completely different, one by one.

The transformation wasn't instantaneous, the residents of the small, quiet town underwent mental regression at their own pace. The longer it took, the more of the town was affected by the mysterious comet and the magical power was amplified.

Where do you want to start? A few days into the change, where everyone in town begins to find themselves acting differently? A week into the change, where the people of Redwood begin to change en masse? Or a full month into the change, where the entire town has been fully regressed, turned into an Infantilist society?

Seventy-two hours after the mysterious flash in the sky; and the people of Redwood forgot the cosmic event just as fast as it had happened, with the citizens of the small town going on with their daily routines. The sudden rise of Infantilism, albeit in a small wave of momentum had struck the town with several townspeople regressing and acting differently to what they were once like. In the sea of unregressed townsfolk, they were a blip on the radar, but it could've been sworn that the regressed individuals were growing in number.

For Michelle and Rick; two teenage students sharing an apartment together, were caught in the rising wave of Infantilism. They felt compelled to notice the strange appearance of diapers, pacifiers and an infantile care-free attitude surrounding their neighbourhood. The local parents began to treat their children like toddlers and their own classmates began to inhabit childish behavior; resulting in onesies, pullups, pacifiers, plushies and sippycups being quite the sought after trend.

For Michelle and Rick, where does their adventure in a slowly regressing Redwood begin?

1522312.content:
A week had passed since the bright light in the night's sky. For the time being, the people of Redwood returned to their everyday lives and continued on like nothing had happened. It wasn't until a strange change in the town's behaviour was when a small handful of people began to notice that something wasn't quite right, at least, for the moment being.

The handful of people who weren't feeling the effects of the regression magic noticed a few odd trends that popped up amongst the community. Odd pieces of clothing, such as diapers, pacifiers and adult-sized baby clothes seemed to be all the rage for some strange reason.

Amongst the craze for baby clothes, an overwhelming number of parents seemed to be rather happy by the sudden fact that their children and teenagers began to openly wear and use diapers in public, loudly praising them and treating them as if they were overgrown toddlers. In addition to that, a large amount of stores seemed to be stocked full of baby items, with diapers, rattles, pacifiers, onesies and much more accompanying them.

A parent who was caught in the middle of this was Rachel Simmons. A single mother living in the centre of town, who saw the sudden changes first-hand as her neighbours and co-workers adapted to a new lifestyle. Her two children, seven-year old daughter Elise and ten-year old Benjamin were also under the effects of the strange infantile fashion. It didn't help that they began to reject their grown-up responsibilities and find themselves slowly attracted to the rest of the town's sudden fascination with baby items.

As much as Rachel wanted to object, seeing as how her children weren't babies, she argued with herself over the fact that there didn't seem to be anything wrong with the sudden desire to wear diapers and act like a toddler. It would be quick, but her desires to accept the baby clothes also seeped into her mind, but reality conflicted with itself, her rejection of accepting Infantilism was getting harder and harder. It felt like she needed to be in control, and maintain her status as an adult in front of her children.

For Rachel and her family, where do we begin?

She couldn't resist the urge and something had to be done. Her thoughts constantly betrayed her mind, ebbing her, and teasing her to go in and lose control in the play area. The woman's dumb grin beside her wasn't helping. A quick solution to breaking her infantile thoughts needed to go.

"If its okay," Rachel began, rubbing her forehead, "I'll change your daughters diaper. She's done quite a number, hasn't she?" That was it. A way out, focus on something else... And make a new pair of friends at the same time.

The woman looked back at Rachel, her face leading an unbearably blank expression before eventually curling a sincere smile in delight. "Sure!" The woman replied, "Abby went pee-pee in her diaper, twice."

"Oh, that's fine." For some reason, the diapers didn't bother Rachel as much as she used to be. Her thoughts went back to her own children when they arrived home with a fresh pair of diapers wrapped around their bottoms one day from school, learning that the school was replacing a large chunk of the school uniform with onesies, pull-ups and diapers. It wasn't the changing that was the problem, her disappointment stemmed from not being gifted some in her own size.

The woman adjusted herself, leaning to the side and handed Abby over to Rachel, who was now resting on her lap. A quick glance at the oversized toddler revealed a similar blank expression, more focused on the pacifier in her mouth more than anything else in the world.

"She's such a good girl," The woman began, her expression relaxed and her legs opened to reveal more of the diaper underneath the sun dress. "I put her back in diapers, y'know, as all parents should and she was so happy. I threw out her training potty because... Well, I don't even know why I bought it in the first place."

Rachel lay Abby on the bench and began to untape the child's diaper, "That's very interesting." It wasn't, Rachel needed the conversation to keep going in order to keep her mind occupied.

"At first, I remember trying to make her sit on the potty so that she would stop wearing diapers." The woman chuckled, "It's so silly, I can't even remember why I was making her stop, it wouldn't be because everyone else wears them."

A part of conversation seemed to resonate with Rachel. In the past, she was quite adamant about getting Elise and Benjamin getting out of diapers and into regular underwear when they were both younger. And now, the idea sounded ludicrious beyond belief - she felt like a bad mother. Her children went through so much grief, tantrums and tears when they were being potty trained and now they're back wearing diapers, only to be happier than ever.

The evidence was growing against her at this point, even teenagers and adults were having fun losing themselves and their responsibilities, exchanging their grown-up life for a simpler and happier mindset.

"I've got a question to ask you," Rachel snapped out of her thoughts, and continued to change Abby, "It's a little personal so I understand if you don't want to answer."

"I don't mind," The woman shrugged, resting her hands between her exposed diaper.

"Do you feel happier? I mean, after deciding to go back to diapers?"

"Happier?" The woman raised an eyebrow, leaning forward she opened her mouth and said...

The woman's hands lept forward and quickly grasped Rachel's buttons on her skinny jeans, only for her to clumsily pull the buttons apart to get to Rachel's underwear. "I'm going to check your diaper, too."

"W-Wait a minute!" Rachel reacted accordingly to the woman's invading hands, violently shuffling to the edge of the seat while almost shrieking in fright. "I didn't ask for you to--"

"It's only fair!" The woman replied, pouting like a child, "I need to make sure you haven't gone potty! I don't even know why you're hiding your diaper to begin with."

That's right. Her 'diaper' wasn't a diaper, it was a pair of basic white panties that she desperately clung to in order to keep her role as an adult. A role that she was slowly starting to doubt, it didn't make any sense why, but Rachel found herself reluctantly agreeing with the woman. As if she learned a harsh truth, that her undergarments are meant to be exposed and not hidden, there was no point in hiding a part of herself away especially when everyone was else exposing their padded bottoms to the world.

"Aright," Rachel groaned, slowly undoing the buttons on the front jeans, she leaned back into her seat and slowly slid her trousers down to her thighs in order to reveal the basic white underwear. The woman sitting opposite held no expression, or she did, but Rachel coudn't tell what she was thinking.

"Hrm," The woman tapped her chin, "That's odd. Where did you find that diaper? It's a little too thin, don't you think?"

A quick inspection, and a not-so-subtle prod against the small pink ribbon on the front of Rachel's underwear had proved that something wasn't right. "What happens when you pee? It's too thin, you'll just leak everywhere and make a puddle on the floor."

As the 'inspection' continued, Rachel found herself agreeing with the woman's assessment of her undergarments. The panties weren't thick enough to hold if she went in them and they weren't certainly crinkly or thick between her legs. A part of her wanted to recognize the white underwear as something that needed to be replaced, as they certainly wouldn't hold a single wetting, while at the same time she felt they seemed to be alright for the moment being.

Her skinny jeans, on the other hand, had to go. The woman was right.

"Y'know," The woman began, "That thin diaper looks familiar...?" she continued to stare at Rachel's underwear for a moment longer before pulling her sundress up and inspected her own clean diaper. "...Nope!" She smiled, digging her fingers into her padded crotch and proceeded to gently rub. "But hey! Do you want a diaper change now? It's silly, because you're not messy or wet, but I don't think that super-thin diaper isn't going to hold anything."

An adult as mature and as well-repected as Rachel would never go on a children's slide, not even to feign enjoyment for her children. But, damn it. It wasn't the slide itself that was fun, the culprit was the calls of participation and encouragement from her children that brought out this type of behaviour in her.

Elise and Benjamin beckened for their mother to join them in a nearby ballpit, only for them to frown as Rachel retraced her steps and climbed back to the top of the slide, grinning wildly. Her body plunged down the slide and she squarely landed into a nearby pillow that cushioned her rapid descent.

A series of congratulatory cheers and whoops from the nearby infantilized children, teenagers and adults alike sent waves of pleasure through Rachel's mind, unable to stop grinning at what she had done. Her time with the slide was lovely, but her children were more important, she could always buy a slide for the back garden and use it on a sunny weekend with Elise and Benjamin.

Her children had went ahead and entered the large ballpit, which was seperated with a large plastic window and a small tunnel made for crawling through. Rachel dipped her head into the tunnel and slowly crawled into the pit, unknowingly wiggling her bottom at the adult babies watching.

The ball pit didn't entertain Rachel as much as she had hoped, it didn't deliver the same high-speed thrill that a slide would normally give. Her wide grin slowly soured at the rustling noise of the multicoloured plastic balls that sat in the pit. The only saving grace was the ability to hide a part of herself in the pit, pretending to be a shark in the wide ocean. The pit was such a bore that, it snapped the infantile thoughts out of her mind, readjusting her thoughts to focus on her children, once again.

Benjamin and Elise found themselves sitting on a small platform slightly above the ballpit, idly kicking their feet and launching several balls across the room, giggling and clapping at the simplicity of their antics. "You two!"

Their antics stopped at the sound of a familiar voice, "It's time to head home, so move your ltitle tushies, or there'll be no dessert for dinner." Rachel stepped out of the pit and made her presence known to her children, pointing at the small tunnel.

"That's not fair!" Benjamin responded, crossing his arms, "You went on the slide, twice!" Elise glanced back and forth at Benjamin, and back at her mother. The eight year old sunk her thumb into her mouth and continued to deliver several weak kicks into the ballpit, ignoring the conversation.

"That's because I'm an adult, Ben," Rachel added, gesturing towards herself. "Grownups can do things that children can't do." At this point, she was lying even to herself, grownups don't slide down slides or play in ballpits. It wasn't the fact that she enjoyed sliding down or a slide, or rummaging through a ballpit, she needed to set an example for her children, and that's all that mattered.

"I'm not a kid!" Ben continued to argue back, "I'm a big baby!" he pouted.

"And big babies follow what grownups say," A line that was supposed to be the finisher for the argument, but it didn't feel satisfying to say that for a reason that Rachel couldn't understand. Her mind suddenly went foggy for a brief second, gently pinching the bridge of her nose to try and make sense of what she just said.

"You're not a grownup! You're an even bigger baby!"

There it is. The words that made Rachel question her own role as a mother. A part of it felt true, her enjoyment of the slide and her breif daydreams to wear nothing but a diaper alongside her children were tantalizing. A different part of her screamed for control, she had to remain a grownup and provide an adult example for her children.

And yet, every single glance at the adults in town seemed to paint a different picture. Adults, specifically the parents, were providing a carefree and happy lifestyle by indulging in infantilism alongside their children. A piece of her mind felt wrong for suggesting that a life without diapers, pacifiers and infantilism could be possible. The entire town changed, and it seemed to be for the better.

A choice had to be made, and Rachel decided to...

Rachel was about to walk out the front door when she felt someone grab her shoulder “Um, excuse me ma’am”. Rachel turned around to see the young daycare worker who had stopped her. She had blonde hair green eyes and a uniform that blurred the line between daycare teacher and student, with an apron smock and shirt both in bright pastels and a short skirt that made for easy access to the giant huggies diaper she wore. “I hate to bother you appear to have made a stinky”

Rachel blushed. She had decided to buy some “protection” the other day after an embarrassing incident the other day. She had just gotten home from the store when a sudden and desperate need to pee had struck her. She dropped her groceries and ran into the house and just barely made it to the bathroom in time to release the remaining half of her bladders contents into the toilet. So by the time she had cleaned the puddles carpet stains and pants she had damaged she decided it was best for her to have some kind of protection. But for all her searching she couldn’t find any mature or adult forms of diapers, forcing her to settle for a package of flowery princess print pull ups.

And sure enough the seat of these pull ups bulged with a mess that she had made without realizing. Her face was beat red with embarrassment as she excepted her offer and followed the worker to the changing room. The changing room was a large side room just off to the side of the registration room, it was lined wall to wall in changing tables each large enough for even an adult and a majority of them were in use. There were several babies ranging from actual infants to teenagers, and there were even a few other parents who were dropping off there children or maybe even staying for the day.

The worker led Rachel to one of the few unoccupied tables and gently assisted her on top and started removing her shoes work skirt and pantyhose. “I’m sorry it’s so crowded in here” she apologized as she worked “mornings tend to get a bit hectic around here.”

“Guilty as charged” chimed a mother in a sing song voice from across the isle of tables before returning to her baby bottle of coffee (or maybe it was chocolate milk, who knows). All the while another worker spread powder across her butt and privates.

15223123322.content:
The sights and sounds of the daycare seemed overwhelming for Rachel. Laughter, crying and uncoordinated yelling from all sorts of different directions bombarded her ears. It didn't help as groups and lone wolves nudged beside her down the corridor as she eyed each part of the daycare for her missing children. Two children, possibly between the ages of four and twelve sat together in the middle of the hall while mischievous teenagers idly wandered past with grins and an assortment of toys and baby supplies in hand.

Inside a small room, oddly quiet from the rest, sat Elise and Benjamin gathered round a large TV displaying all-sorts of cartoons and animations. The accompanying beanie chairs, blankets and soft toys made the experience somewhat oddly relaxing compared to the rest of the daycare. A few steps in, and Rachel eventually settled next to her children.

"Mommy?" Elise hummed, "You're staying with us today?"

"I suppose I am," Rachel wasn't exactly sure, but, the sudden invitation by the daycare workers left her in the position of ignoring her commitments at work and instead choosing to spend time with her children. "You're watching cartoons?"

"Uh huh," Benjamin replied, delicately moving his cherry red pacifier to the side of his mouth. "It's quiet here. The other big babies are too loud for us."

While Rachel agreed, she wasn't too thrilled with her regressed children sitting by and watching TV the whole day. The assortment of nearby teddies, plushies and dolls were enough to get them on their feet and playing, but something otherwise itched in the back of her mind, pleading her to just up-and-front leave and continue the rest of her day like an adult.

152231311.content:
Memories are a funny thing. It seemed, for Adam, that something wasn't quite right with Mommy and the rest of the neighbourhood. He couldn't quite put his finger on what; but the strange flash of light that appeared in the sky had done something -- whether it was good or bad, he wasn't able to completely tell. His fourth birthday had gone and went, and with the promise and excitement of being treated like a big boy; Adams's sudden disappointment and confusion in having to go back into diapers, drinking bottles and watch Mommy do the same was oddly strange.

There was, albeit periodically, a positive to having Mommy relieve her usual grownup activities and spend more time with him. Mommy had never had enough time on her hands to play with Adam as much as she does now; the endless hours of playtime and cuddling were wonderful. The downsides were obvious -- as opposed to Mommy's original stern and caring personality, she's now carefree and careless with her approach to being a Mommy.

A weekly playdate by Adam and his few friends in his garden were one of the highlights. His time to himself; his real friends away from Mommy and the rest of the other 'grownups' gave way to discussions he normally wouldn't have. Especially those that his Mommy wouldn't understand.

"He 'den drew all over the walls," Toby finished, "We were playing an' then Daddy took the crayons and coloured on the walls. He used ta' say its naughty when I did it, but its not naughty anymore." he shuffled on his seat, that being a patch of grass as his diaper crinkled from underneath his shortalls. The others, including Adam, nodded with a sense of understanding.

"That's bad." Eric replied, shuffled to the side and crossed his leges, "If I did that, I'd be in loads of trouble."

"My Mommy said wetting my pants was bad." Tammy added, her twin, Amy nodded as confirmation. "Had lot'sa trouble potty training, Mommy and Daddy said that's bad when we go potty in our pants."

"And then, Mommy and Daddy put us back in diapers. Said we dun' have to worry 'bout going potty anymore." Amy continued, she grabbed her pink t-shirt and lifted it to reveal a thick disposable diaper.

"So confusing." Eric scratched his head, "Mumma said, when I gottta pee, I just use my diaper like I always did, too."

No one was certain why things were different. Perhaps, even grownups needed time to relax and play. For Adam, he sat still amongst the group, idly sucking on a pacifier clipped to his shirt. The conversation was soon interrupted,
152231311.title: An actual baby/toddler

1522313111.content:
A large fart sound came from Toby's direction. Toby got off his bottom and stood up, before squatting and locking his knees. His face started to turn red as more noise-and a smell-came from him. Soon, he stood up.

"Poopy."

Toby was always the youngest of the group, before the strange things started happening, and even when everyone else was trying to ditch the diapers, Toby still was the one who necessitated a call of 'Toby wet' or 'Toby stinky' during their play. The others had their accidents, for sure, but Toby was still a Baby, and not a Big Boy.

Toby was at least learning to be a bit more self-reliant. He started toddling over from the garden to the house, to find Adam's Mommy and get a change.

Toby waddled in and found her.

"Poopy."

Adam's Mommy, who was sitting on the couch drinking from a sippy cup and watching Blue's Clues seemed to nod. "Can you go to Adam's room? I'll change you on his changing table."

Toby waddled further, his poopy diaper pulling his shortalls down, until he found Adam's room and walked in. As he waited for Adam's mommy to come in, he saw something.

15223131111.content:
His patience eventually ran its course; leaving Toby to eventually lose his concentration at idly standing by in Adam's bedroom for a mere twenty seconds. His curiosity caught the better of him, prompting a small waddle over to a nearby set of drawers. A gentle tug on the lower rack revealed a pack of pull-ups which made Toby's mouth drop. A short tug on the plastic packaging was enough to reveal a small tear; allowing Toby to remove one of the pull-ups and unfold the undergarment to be greeted by a blue colour scheme and images of toy trucks -- bringing a smile to his face.

"Oh, Toby..." Adam's Mommy tsked, "Where did you get those silly things?"

Briefly startled; Toby turned and noticed Adam's Mommy standing in the doorway. Her attire was similar to Amy and Tammy's clothing; simple colours, a basic t-shirt with an obviously thick diaper wrapped around her waist. A pink bow was nestled deep in her brunette hair; with matching ruffled socks to finish the toddler-esque appeareance.

"Addy's Mumma," Toby presented the pull-ups front and centre, "Can I wear puh-ups?"

"Why?" Adam's Mommy inquired, her head tilted as she lowered herself to Toby's level. Her legs were evenly spread to keep her diaper in view, imitating toddler's sitting position while she slowly shuffled across the carpet closer to Toby. "Pull-ups aren't what babies wear. They're silly."

Before Toby could respond, he felt himself being taken by the hand and over to the changing mat. While Adam's Mommy preferred to crawl, Toby was guided over and laid down appropriately next to the spare diapers.

"Buh-- Buh," Toby squirmed, "Pull-ups fuh' big boys."

"Babies go potty in their diapers. I go potty in my diapers. You go potty in them, too." Adam's Mommy replied, she undone the buttons on Toby's shortalls and pulled back the tapes on his messy diaper.

As the change underwent; Toby continued to think about the pull-ups -- ultimately losing focus on them as he noticed the yellowed stain on the front of Adam's Mommy's diaper. He didn't speak, but complied with her commands and quietly accepted another fresh diaper. The change itself became a blur as Toby felt a pair of hands wrap around his waist and carry him downstairs and back into the garden outside.

"Go on," Adam's Mommy leaned down and settled the toddler back onto the grass, "Go and play with Adam. I'll be watching cartoons if you want another diaper change."

With the change said and done -- Toby returned back to his friends, more specifically, Adam and his gang of friends. He pondered on the pull-ups, occassionally stoppign to listen to the crinkling of his diaper underneath his shortalls. He returned to his friends, but his thoughts turned to
15223131111.title: Pulling open a drawer, he saw Adam's pullups

It was his Mommy standing over him, playfully snatching the pull-ups from him

152231311113.content:
Confused and unsure; Toby glanced back and forth toward his group of friends and the backdoor into the house. He took his time and thought things over -- eventually long enough for Adam and his friends to notice Toby's odd behaviour and toddle towards him. Adam took charge, plucking the pacifier from his mouth and wiping the strings of drool that escaped his lips.

"What's wrong, Toby?" Adam asked, he leaned forward and rested a hand on his small friend's shoulder.

"I wun' the puh-ups. But your Mumma said I gots'tah wear the diapers." Toby explained, small tears escaped his eyes as his thumb soon met the entrance of his mouth.

"There, there." Adam hushed his friend, he rotated his pacifier over and aimed the nipple into Toby's already-occupied mouth. Toby accepted, and removed his thumb and began to suckle on his new gift. "Binky should keep you calm."

"Hey," Eric budged in, "I got an idea. Why don't we sneak in your bedroom and get the pull-ups for Toby?"

"Good idea!" Adam replied, smiling. He looked at Toby's calmed body, "Don't worry. We'll get some pull-ups from my bedroom. If you or anyone else wants'tah wear pull-ups, then they can!"

A delightful hum came from behind the pacifier Toby was sucking on. He bounced and jumped for joy as Tammy and Amy took each of his hands and directed him back over to the grass, leaving Adam and Eric to slowly enter the living room. Surprisingly, Mommy wasn't in the living room -- but the TV and the leftover toys and half-eaten snacks were equally littered all over the floor. A half-empty sippy cup with juice inside caught Eric's attention, to which he grabbed and began to sip on the remaining drink.

Ascending up the stairs, Eric carelessly left the now-empty sippy cup on the floor and carefully scanned the horizon. It appeared that Adam's Mommy was nowhere to be seen; for Adam, he slowly waddled back into his bedroom and instantly saw the opened package of pull-ups sitting on the floor. While the curtains had been pulled to, the room was much dimmer than he remembered, with only the slightest flicker of sunlight getting through.

The crib where his big boy bed once stood caught his eye. He didn't understand why his bed was replaced with his old crib, but he frowned at the sight of it. He quickly grabbed onto the packaging and slowly pulled it toward the door. He quickly stopped and realised that something had moved in the corner of his eye. He dropped the packaging and saw something as he turned around.

1522313111133.content:
The changing table was returned to Adam's bedroom several weeks ago. Adam's Mommy took the liberty of rebuilding a large portion of the table itself; granted the several impromptu breaks, playtime sessions and general lack of concentration over the task delayed everything. A pair of familiar adult legs drooped over the child-sized table -- quite easily presenting his Mommy in the nude as she balled her obviously soggy diaper into a tight ball. The look of concentration over depositing her diaper into the nearby trash bin was abruptly paused, instantly feeling a pair of eyes staring, she turned and saw Adam standing before her.

She smiled; but Adam frowned, his past behaviour of his 'nudie' phases when he were younger were often shamed. He couldn't understand why his Mommy was allowed to break the rules despite his own warnings and punishments years prior. "Oh, Adam!" Adam's Mommy cheered, "I was just changing my soggy butt. I'm thinking a big pink diaper would make me look more pretty. What do you think?"

"Mommy...?" Adam was nervous, he slowly took several steps toward his Mother and glanced back at the package of pullups. "Can my friends have the pullups? They wanna be big kids again."

"Oh," Adam's Mommy felt her expression dim. She lowered herself down to her son's level, taking no level of care to cover her exposed breasts, and crouched. "That's so silly. We're big babies. You're friends are acting silly if they want the pullups, if this keeps up then I'll have to tell their Mommies and Daddies, too. You don't want your friends getting into trouble because they wanna do something naughty, right?"

"Buh-- buh-- It's for playing!" A quick excuse from Adam did no favours in the situation. "P-Playing pretend!"

Adam's Mommy soon rolled her eyes; visibly frowning at her son's response -- only to lean back and sit herself on the carpet with her legs gently crossed. She hummed lightly before looking back at her son with an expression her son couldn't read.

Jacob, after some nummy breast milk, asked, "whys yous wearn fancy diapees?" Jenna answered, "Babyshower today. peoples gonna be here soon." James started to tear up, he wasn't invited to the babyshower. it was a girl thing he knew that but he still wanted to be included. he was about to throw a tantrum, wailing that he wasn't tired, that he wanted to play, and he didn't want to take a nap. As an adult baby, may usually went nakie but whenever she wore anything (except her diapee) was going to have lots of frills. in her arms were baby shower gifts, diapers and clothes for mommy and baby alike. in her mouth was a pink pacifier and in her hand was a pink rattle. she made a beeline for a chair and sat down, dropping the presents and focusing on the rattle.

after her came her daughter August, toddling in and appoligizing for her mother, "Twaffic was bad and the wady at da store was a meaniehead." before maturity had been eradicated by the comet, she was a goth. now like all girl goths she now wore exclusively pink, adorning her was pink babydoll dress and pink cloth diaper. she had her mothers green eyes and her fathers red hair, upon her long firey locks was a pink bow. She also had made a stinky, but so had Jenna.

then waddled in the woman of the hour Destiny. her long deep brown hair flowed free with a pink baby bonnet identical to Maria's upon her head. her hazel eyes shined with ethusiasim, and she wore a pink baby shirt that didn't cover her bulging belly, and over it she wore a bib that said "mommy in diapees." unlike the others she didn't wear a cloth diaper but instead pampers preggers. she was a proud woman before the comet made everyone babies, refusing any help because she was pregnant. that continued as a baby but instead of pride it came from a childish stubbornness, even refusing the government aid offered to pregnant women, such as stroller rides and changies.

maria closed the door and smiled, saying, "lets have fun." and they played like babies.
1522313121.title: baby babyshower

152231313.content:
Stretching in his bed, James slowly woke up, feeling his arms and legs bump up against the guard rails on his bed. Sitting up, he looked around at his room, covered in shark posters and his pile of stuffed sea animals in the corner. Pushing the guard rail down, he hopped out and began tugging eagerly at his footie pajamas, trying to get the Velcro to give way.

Finally succeeding in removing them, he gladly stepped out, his sagging diaper around his waist the only thing left he was wearing. Grabbing his stuffed shark, he toddled out into the hall, and saw his mommy and his little sister playing in the toy room, which had formerly been the office.

"Mommy!" James called out as he approached them, "I need change!"

"Ok James!" His mom called back, grabbing the nearby diaper bag and pulling out a Mickey Mouse diaper for him. Laying down, he let his mom get to changing him as he eagerly eyed his mommies boobies, the sixteen year old just couldn't wait for breakfast!

"James went poopy!" His 14 year old sister Marie sang, pointing and laughing at him, despite the fact that she had a fully diaper this morning too.

Uncaring that his sister was seeing his now hairless peepee being wiped clean by their mom, James frowned up at her, "At least I don't have cooties!"

"Enough!" Their mom yelled, getting both of them to stop. Taping up James' diaper she set aside the dirty one and gestured to her boobies, "Now get breakfast so we can go shopping."

Smiling, James eagerly snuggled up to his mom and began suckling away, enjoying his nummies, unaware that this would've been hell before the comet changed everything for them.
152231313.title: A teenager

1522313131.content:
James finished his breakfast and let out a small burp. Amy, there mother, then said, "ok, mall time." The family then toddled to the front door, each wearing only diapers and carrying there favorite toy. Each of these toys were actually a link to there lives before the comet, James had once planned to be a marine biologist but now only knew sea creatures were cool. what was it.

152231314.title: Other

1522313141.content:
In one of the apartment buildings on Main Street there was a 26 year old red headed girl named Lilly. She lived alone, but had recently been talking with her bestest friend about moving in with her so they'd have a permanent sleepover!

Anyway, Lilly woke up this morning like she always did, stretching in her bed and sucking on her pacifier, and of course noticing the full diaper around her waist. Siting up, she toddled a little unsteadily to her bathroom and looked at herself in the mirror, naked except for her Disney princess diaper, and her hair up in pigtails, with ribbons haphazardly clipped in from the party at work yesterday. She absentmindedly pulled them out and undid her diaper, the messy garment falling to the ground with a wet *plop*, and she quickly wiped herself clean before turning in her bathtub and putting in a ridiculous amount of bubble bath.

She toddled over to a basket of bath toys and, picking up the basket, launched them all into the tub, giggling as the warm water and bubbles splashed across the walls and floor before hopping in and playing while cleaning herself up. She especially enjoyed watching her boobies make splashes in the water! Boobies were certainly fun to play with, and most girls enjoyed jiggling them because it was entertaining, (bras had become completely forgotten by week 2).

After getting herself all clean and tidy, Lilly hopped out of the tub, and quickly applied the baby powder and slipped on the kitty diaper that was on the shelf. A quick bit in her bedroom as she slipped on a frilly pink dress that flared out at the waist, exposing her diaper completely, and grabbing her diaper bag and a bottle of milk from the fridge, she headed out to work.

Slipping into her little tykes foot car, she pushed herself down the street, giggling as she honked the horn and waved at her friends and the various others going about their infantile day.
1522313141.title: Follow Lilly

choices: Lilly and Alicia are the first ones there
15223131411.content:
Parking her car haphazardly in the parking lot, filled with similar little tyke foot cars, Lilly grabbed her diaper bag and skipped into the elevator, noticing several marker drawing on the inside of it. Most of them depicted poorly drawn stick people and houses, occasionally having misspelled words or names saying who'd drawn it, or what it was. Lilly though, couldn't really read anymore (like most of the town), so they just looked like squiggles to her.

Once on her floor, Lilly skipped down the hall, passing coworkers drawing on their former reports and charts, making them prettier or cooler depending on if the big baby drawing on them was a boy or girl. Finding her cubicle, Lilly grabbed a pile of papers labeled "Paychecks" and started to draw on it with a nearby marker.

"Hi Lilly!" A voice said behind her, surprising her and causing her to jump a bit.

"Alicia you scared da poopy out of me!" Lilly giggled at her friend. Alicia was a 25 year old black girl who'd been looking at trying to become a model, but now her biggest goal in life was to be "the most prettiest princess ever".

"Sorry..." Alicia said, upset that she'd scared her friend before getting happy again, "Dan brought donuts! Dere in da break Room!" She said, slightly leaning forward as muffled farts could be heard from her diaper, causing it to sag as she left a load in it. "Lets go!"

Lilly laughed and toddled after her friend, donuts were the bestest! Sure she probably get messy and have to put away her dress, but being nakie wasn't bad, it was cute!
15223131411.title: An average day at work

Lilly plays along, thinking it's a game, and takes Terry to her friends

152231314112.content:
A short hop through countless corridors and past several co-workers left Lilly losing her concentration on Alicia's dash toward the break room. She eventually stopped; feeling the remnants of her sudden burst of energy disappear, and scanned her surroundings to realise she was in a part of the office she didn't recognise. Fancy chairs; plush carpets and not a single toy in sight.

"What...?" Lilly stood still, her diaper leaving nothing but several faint crinkling noises, "This doesn't look like the break room."

The lack of bright infantile pastel colours and animals prints on the walls were the first sign. The basic white walls and other muted colours that seemed to lack the bright attention-grabbing motif Lilly was familiar with. A pile of toys was usually found in almost every room inside the office; but this room lacked anything accomodating for adult babies such as herself at all.

This room seemed off-putting for Lilly, she couldn't land a reason why -- all of which felt confusing and muddled as her thoughts turned cloudy at trying to make sense of this room. She immediately broke out of her stupor as she noticed another person on the opposite side of the room,

"You alright?" A man, visibly the same age as Lilly, slowly walked over to her with an endearing smile. "I saw you standing there and I thought you were confused for a moment. Hope I'm not bothering you."

"Whuh-- Who are you?" Lilly asked, the man was perplexing, a lack of babyish clothing with no apparent diaper hiding under his trousers was stranger enough. The suit and tie were equally strange.

"I'm from out of town. I understand things are done here differently," The man replied; his eyes drifted lower to Lilly's short dress and the obviously visible diaper hanging underneath. "I'm here on a business request. I thought I'd do some work here, " he chuckled, "but it seems everyone else isn't doing that much work from the looks of things."

Lilly chuckled, "We gotta do a lot of work." She plainly replied, a hint of giddy excitement came across her voice. "I draw. I do lot'sa drawings, Mister."

"Oh," The man smiled, "Just call me, Terry. No need for formalities."

"My name is Lilly, Mister Terry." Lilly replied, she raised her hand and took Terry's own, carelessly shaking the man's hand before erupting into a chrous of giggles.

"I've got a few days in town," Terry nervously chuckled, he gently released his grip from Lilly's hand and felt his cheeks redden. "I was wondering if there's anything interesting to do. I'm not much of an expert on the local area."

The man in the strange clothes seemed nice. Cute, even. His nervous demeanor, the short curled brown hair and the pleasant handshake were signs of a budding friendship. Lilly soon tapped her chin -- slowly humming to indicate her thinking over Terry's question, "Oh, oh. There's lot'sa stuff to do."

"Would you be interested in showing me, after work, of course." Terry asked, his smile soon turned a nervous grin, all the while idly scratching the back of his head.

"Like a date?" Lilly felt her eyes widen.

"Well, I guess so. Yeah..."

Lilly smiled! "Cool! I always wanted a boyfriend!" Her expression grew comically serious, "You don't have cooties do you?" She leaned in, squinting her eyes up as if to try and see if he had any.

Terry meanwhile backed up a bit, uncomfortable with the violation of personal space, "Uhh, pretty sure I don't." For some reason, the only thing that was disturbing him was the violation of space, not the people's behavior here in town. He recognized it as strange, but aside from that, no real reaction, he just figured to let it go and worry about that nagging feeling later.

"Great!" Lilly grabbed his hand, leading him back down the hall as she spoke "First we gotta get to the break Room! Dan brought donuts and I love donuts but imma messy eater to I hafta wear a bib or let my boobies out and then somebody has to wipe my face 'cause I get the chocolate over my mouth an....." her infantile rambling was interrupted by a rumbly feeling in her tummy.

Terry watched in silence as Lilly bent forward, puffed out her cheeks, and squinted her eyes, looking somewhere between cute and obviously mentally handicapped. The silence was interrupted as a few muffled farts echoed in the hall coming from her diaper as Lilly dropped a load, the back of her diaper sagging and swinging noticeably.

Giggling, Lilly smiled a total Terry, "I made a poopy, change me?"

Terry wafted the smell away from his nose, "Can't you change yourself?"

Lilly giggled, "No silly! I'm only a baby, and babies can't change themselves silly!"

Terry nodded at the statement, the effects of the comet making it seem as logical and simple as "the sky is blue", "Oh, uh, right. Where's your diaper bag?" He asked.

Lilly pointed down the hall, back to where the laughing and squealing of her coworkers could be heard, "In my work space, but you gots to change me quick, I wanna get donuts!"

Terry nodded, letting Lilly lead him down the hall to what had become a form of massive play place.

15223131411231.content:
A few minutes of wandering through several corridors and taking an occassional impromptu break; Lilly finally finally remembered the directions back to her office. The main hall resembled a large play zone for the rest of the workers, an arrangement of toys, teddies and other infantile objects were scattered around for all to enjoy. As Terry kept close to Lilly, he idly glanced at the other regressed adults -- having no real reaction to the ensemble of playing and general lack of work being done.

"Are these your friends?" Terry asked, his eyes eventually shifted back onto Lilly's full diaper.

"Yuh-uh," Lilly smiled, "They're super cool. They like sharing, sharing and playing with toys is good, too."

They soon entered a nearby restroom. For Terry, he noticed the lack of typical restroom colours or signs to indicate whether the restroom was for men or women. Lilly hummed, "It's gotta be done on a changing table. All the good diaper changes happen on a table, Terry. People from outta' town don't do that, do they?"

"They don't." Terry firmly replied, "We don't have adult changing tables." It was the best response he could muster, still scanning the room for any sign of a regular toilet. He watched as Lilly took the lead and headed to one of the many nearby changing tables and gently climbed onto the soft changing mat. Underneath the table was an assortment of spare diapers and changing supplies.

"Come on," Lilly continued giggling, she flatly rested her bottom against the changing table and looked at Terry expectantly. "Diaper changes are always the bestest when friends do it.

Upon looking at the soiled diaper around Lilly's waist; the nervousness inside Terry was starting to visibly show as he cautiously stepped closer, he grabbed the wipes, powder and a spare pink diaper and began pulling at the tapes. He felt his eyes again drift away to repect Lilly's privacy, "I'm not exactly an expert on this. I had a little practice when my brother and sister were toddlers, but, I guess it can't be that difficult."

The changing process was made a lot harder for Terry when he suddenly noticed Lilly staring at him. Her soft emerald eyes looked up to him; curiously gazing at his diaper changing technique, never seemingly complaining about how long it was taking to apply the clean diaper around her waist.

"Wow," Lilly began, she held onto her pink dress and idly kicked her legs, "You've got little brothers and sisters?"

"I do," Terry smiled, he finally deposited the used diaper in the trash, "They're several years younger. Just working hard so they're proud of me, that's all."

"I gotta Mommy, I gotta Daddy but I don't have any brothers or sisters." Lilly replied, she smiled as the final tapes were secured onto her diaper. She leaned up, loudly sniffling the scent of changing powder in the air with a smile.

"All don-" Terry clapped his hands, seemingly proud of his handiwork, but suddenly felt Lilly lock her arms around his chest as she pulled him closer into a warm cuddle. "Woah, hey!"

"Thank you, boyfriend!"

"It's n-nothing, Lilly." Terry blinked, "You were saying something about donuts earlier. I think a coffee or something might go with them."

While awkard enough; Lilly leaned forward and quickly wrapped her legs around Terry's waist -- using the changing table as a counterbalance before feeling Terry's arms support her backside. As Terry quickly caught the rest of Lilly's surprisingly little weight, he began holding her and carrying her without even properly realising.

"Aren't you going to walk?" Terry asked, he began to sweat and nervously re-adjust his hand as it brushed against Lilly's inner thighs.

"I wanna cuddle," Lilly soon rested her head against Terry's shoulder, "We can go play, eats lot'sa food and lots more now!"

Before Terry could leave, even with Lilly wrapped around his chest, he suddenly noticed another person enter the bathroom looking a little upset. Lilly turned her head, smiling, "Alicia!"

"Lilly?" Alicia blinked, sniffling as she held back tears. "Can you change me? I had lot'sa bottles of milk and now I wet my diaper too much."

"Ooh! Ooh! Terry is good at diaper changes! He changed mine!"

"Wait a minute," Terry attempted to interject. "I changed one diaper. Like I said; I'm not an expert on this type of stuff. We don't really know each other that well yet and it's more being polite than anything."

The pair didn't listen to Terry's words; with Alicia soon climbing the changing table and pulling back her princess dress to reveal her soggy diaper. Terry gently placed Lilly back on the ground and walked back over to the changing table. "I'll try and be quick, can't promise anything..."
