choices: A nursery, which happens to provide a changing table and crib.
1522313222.content:
A few rough ideas and plans were pleasantly swimming in your head, and the idea of going on a miniature tour of Redwood to see what the small town had to offer didn't seem like a bad idea. The first and foremost thing to do was to settle in and set a base of operations at the motel and eventually work out from thereon. Your luggage, being a large travellers backpack and several pieces of attached camping equipment, weren't going to take up much space in the motel room as there was plenty of space for souvenirs and other little nick-nacks near the end.

Upon entering the motel, you're suddenly greeted to an explosion of smells, sounds and sights that leave you somewhat puzzled. A waft of what smelt like... talcum powder, applejuice and the faintest marking of urine - of all things, permeated through the reception. The sounds of other people present, possibly being the other guests, were impossible to ignore. The echoes of crying, childish whining, laughter and playful yelling were somewhat off-putting at first. The decor wasn't something you expected either, bringing a full range of pastel coloured walls, an unbearably soft carpet that resembled babyish prints and a litter of toys for children and toddlers alike scattered on the floor. It seemed that the janitor wasn't doing his job, or the parents if their kids are that unruly to leave toys around.

Your sights were immediately set on a teenage girl sitting at the reception. A slow walk towards her revealed the humoursly coincidental clothing choices that suited more of a child going straight to daycare more than a receptionist at a motel, which ironically seemed to have a consistent theme. The girl seemed to be around the age of seventeen, possibly younger, wearing a sort of yellow sun dress with a pink t-shirt underneath. Her feiry red hair seemed to match well with the pig tails on the side which undoubtedly made her look look much younger, and cuter, than expected.

She seemed busy, or busy with something than wasn't receptionist-like, happily engrossed in drawing pictures using crayons and a myriad of pencils and other materials. You stood before her, awkwardly scanning the desk to see two empty sippy cups and a cherry red pacifier on the side. You clear your throat and eventually catch the teenager's attention,

"Hello. I'd like to check in to Room 218, my name is Donald so it should be on the list."

The girl didn't look so pleased, as if you broke her concentration, and happened to produce an immature scowl before slowly adjusting her expression into a light smile with a bouncy attitude to boot. "Oh! Oh! You're new! I haven't seen you before!" She was quite perceptive, too.

"Thanks," You shrug off her bouncy attitude as some form of excitement, or training - depending on how receptionists are supposed to act. The smalltalk continued, "The reception is a little colourful. Did I accidentally book into a motel made for families with young kids or something?" You refer to the overblown colours in a joking manner, and yet, your curiousity is piqued a little.

"I like the colours." She replied, plainly. "The colours are very pretty."

You smile in response, "They're a little too 'daycare' for my tastes. I guess it's all down to subjective tastes and all that."

While the receptionist didn't seem to respond directly, as if she was trying to process what you said, she leaned back in her chair and continued to smile some more.

"I like the colours, too." She repeated, "I'd have everything pink because I really like that colour."

You chuckle, "That's cool. That's cool." You point to one of the hallways, "Which way is my room? Mind if I have my key now?"

"Oh!" The girl gasped, "I'm sorry!" She leaned foward, and dipped her hands into one of the drawers - a drawer full of pacifiers and hotel keys. She pulls out a small yale key with a tag attatched and hands it to you. She points towards the hall on the left, "You can't miss it! There's a sign with the door number, but if you can't read then just let me know. I'm good at reading!"

You shrug that off, perhaps as part of her training to accomodate people with learning disabilities - diversity and inclusion training perhaps. You begin to head towards the hallway, still noticing the consistent 'daycare' decorum and the mish mash of toys and other infantile scents that happened to linger. A single glance back towards the reception area lead you to notice the teenage girl from before still sitting on the desk, now back to continuing with her work with the crayons. A weird girl, but perhaps things are done differently in Redwood, for the most part.

Weirdly enough, travelling down the hallway gave way for the familiar crying, childish laughter and cheers to grow slightly louder than before. You pass by several doors with your equipment and key in hand feeling confident, only to realize that several doors were wide open for people to look inside. The quickest of glances had several rooms reveal themselves as traditional motel rooms which were surprisingly empty, and several rooms shared the same 'daycare' style even coming with large cribs and a changing table. Your joke about being in a motel made for families with young children was starting to become more than that.

A minute in, and you reach a door labelled with the correct number. You lodge the key into the keyhole and begin to open the door, only for a flurry of footsteps to come whizzing down the hall. You turn, and see two toddlers happily running down the hall with two parents hastening their approach to keep up with them. Strangely, the toddlers weren't wearing any clothing but their diapers and the parents were wearing clothes that looked like the toddlers themselves should've been wearing. A pair of shortalls for the father and a flowing princess-like dress that fell slightly above the mother's knees.

You shrug it off, but something bites at the back of your mind, to immensely question why parents - of any kind - would allow their children to run down hallways without proper clothing. The key is twisted, and the door slowly opens to which you get a good look at your room. You're satisfied, although something is off, but you're focused on being satisfied with the quiant little room you've been given and prepare to settle in for the evening.

You prepare to happily settle into...
1522313222.title: The Babyish Behaviour of the Town

choices: "Do you want to play in the nursery with me?"
"Do you want to come on a playdate with me?"
15223132221.content:
You prepare to happily settle into a regular motel room. There seemed to be something quaint about the small bedroom, but the neatly-tucked bed, small kitchen area and the random plate of candy left by the window left a positive impression. You set your suitcase by the bed and begin to unpack your belongings. A empty chest of drawers were quickly filled with your clothes and travelling equipment, leaving yourself practically finished and settled in with nothing else to do.

The clock conveniently ticked to two o' clock and you decide to relax. The TV was switched on, instantly turning itself to a channel presenting an ensemble of kids cartoons. You roll your eyes; instantly turning the channel over to something completely different and suddenly find more cartoons -- cartoons which seemed to be aimed towards very young children. A few more seconds of channel hopping led to the same conclusion as before. The TV is nothing but cartoon's and children's programming.

"Why am I not surprised?" You mutter to yourself. The design of some of the rooms, and the hotel's general decor with the pastel colours and toys spread across the halls should've been an obvious indication the motel was aimed at children and families. You sigh, and ultimately decide to switch the TV off -- leaving you to tap your feet together and find something else to do.

The door knocks, in which you suddenly stand to attention and head over. You open the door to see the teenage girl from the reception, still donning the pleasant smile from before. Your eyes lower; and the rest of her clothing is briefly inspected while you discover her 'sun dress' had barely dipped below her actual waist. Quite confusingly, she wore what appeared to be a large diaper instead of traditional underwear which forced yourself to immediately lock onto her eyes. The cherry red pacifier that dangled around her neck was probably the least strange fashion choice.

Her lips begin to twitch; and more importantly -- you notice her cheeks getting redder, as if she's embarrassed for what she's about to say.
15223132221.title: A regular motel room

152233.content:
who else is it gonna be? perhaps it happens when a family takes a trip to a theme park?

or did it happen at the movies?
152233.title: More Options

1523.content:
At the peak of their maturity, Jack and Helen are two twins who, at the age of five, broke expectations for parents, Julie and Robert. As they take their first steps into school earlier than expected, with the intent of making their parents proud, the comet known as Noisserger's Flame passes by the Earth. It's reality-altering powers manages to reshape the lives of Jack, Helen and the people around them in brand new ways. Once reality begins shifting, Jack and Helen learn what it's like to see their old mature lives fade away into that of pure innocence and immaturity.

---

[OPTION #1] - The Comet Approaches

On their first day at school, Jack and Helen go in expecting their classmates and teachers to be as mature and as grown up as they are. But as Noisserger's Flame, a distant comet with reality-altering powers passes by the Earth, they suddenly realize their brand new school is slowly turning into a giant daycare for children and adults alike.

[OPTION #2] - Backwards Parenting

Jack and Helen wake up one day to find their parents acting very strange. Privileges they once had to being grown up and mature are being taken away from them with each passing hour. And for some reason, they keep on treating the twins as if they were babies. As Noisserger's Flame passes by the Earth, Julie and Robert's perception of what mature and grown up is now forever changed. The twins find themselves being taught how to grow down into big happy babies.

[OPTION #3] - Perception

During the weekend, Jack and Helen find themselves acting more like babies. And for some reason, they can't help but feel happy and carefree. As the weekend goes on, they later find themselves ditching their maturity and responsibilities for acting more innocent and infantile. Unbeknownst to them, Noisserger's Flame begins altering their reality and puts them down the path of innocence.
1523.title: Maturity to Immaturity

choices: Jack and Helen find their way to class.
Jack and Helen get lost in the hallways.
15231.content:
"It's time to bug out."

The seatbelts clicked out of place and reeled back up to the corners of the car and gently rested up against the wall. Jack and Helen opened the back doors and both excitedly hopped out of the car with their backpacks in hand, they walked over to the curb and stood beside the drivers door and looked at their Mother.

"I can't believe you two are growing up so fast!" Julie smiled at her children from the drivers seat, she cranked the window down and leaned out of the car, licking the tip of her finger and wiping a stain on Jack's school shirt. "It felt like yesterday you two went to kindergarten, I'm happy proud of both of you. Remember: Be polite. Remember to smile and do what the teachers tell you."

"We will!" Jack and Helen happily responded in unison.

"I better go before I tear up," Julie blinked, holding back her tears. "I don't want to embarrass both of you on your first day at school. I'll pick you up by the gates at three-thirty, sharp. Make sure you keep all of your pencils and rubbers together and try and make a good first impression."

"Mom!" Jack rolled his eyes. "You're embarrassing us!"

"Oops," Julie giggled. "Sorry, honey. Just remember-"

"Mom!" Jack groaned.

"Alright, alright," Julie continued to giggle, twisting the car keys, she revved up the car and placed her hands on the steering wheel. "I love you. my little honey bunnies."

"Goodbye, Mom!" Helen happily waved as the family car picked up in speed and drove away until it disappeared from view. "I can't believe we're not going to kindergarten any more. I bet we will find some new friends! And... And... We can learn how to play new games! What if our new friends have some cool toys? The big kids always have the better toys! Isn't that right, Jack?"

Jack didn't respond at all. Helen looked up and noticed her brother standing by the side walk looking up into the sky. He partially shielded his eyes with his hands, ignoring everyone around him.

"Jack?" Helen walked over to her twin brother. "What's wrong?"

"H-Huh?" Jack broke out of his concentration and looked at his sister. "What?"

"Earth to Jack!" Helen exclaimed. "You're looking at the sky!"

"I know!" Jack frowned. "There's a strange thing in the sky."

"Where?" Helen asked.

"Over there!" Jack lifted an arm up into the sky and pointed at a bright circle that radiated a bright white colour that pierced through the sky. "It's a space man!"

"Space man?" Helen blinked, shielding her eyes from the bright light.

"Daddy told me about the men who go into outer space! That's gotta be one of them!"

"Why would the space man shine a bright light at us?"

"I don't know," Jack shrugged. "Maybe he's trying to say hello to us?"

"Wow..." Helen continued to look at the anomaly. "A space man said hello to us... I can't wait to tell Mom when I get home."

Without a warning, the bright light in the sky suddenly blacked out. All traces of the strange white light had disappeared, leaving both Jack and Helen confused.

"Where did it go?" Helen asked her brother.

"I don't know..." Jack looked back at the ground.

"Aww," Helen groaned. "That was so cool."

Before the two could continue, the sound of the school bell ringed throughout the complex, causing the surrounding children to stop what they were doing and quickly head towards the main doors.

"Oh no," Jack yelped. "It's the bell! We've got to get to class!"

"Class!?" Helen exclaimed. "I'm so nervous!"

"Don't worry!" Jack held his sisters hand. "It's only school. What's the worst that can happen?"
15231.title: The Comet Approaches

choices: ...A fellow student who entered the room.
...A fellow teacher who entered the room.
152311.content:
Room 2B was the destination for Jack and Helen. Before their trip to school, they were given information about the whereabouts and plans of their future lessons. Using this information, they located Room 2B in a matter of minutes, dodging the chaos that was the school corridors, they managed to get through unscathed. Jack and Helen walked up to the doors and both took a deep breath.

"Ready?" Helen placed her hand on the handle.

"Ready."

Helen applied pressure to the handle and pressed it downward, resulting in the door to slowly slide open, the twins slowly walked into the large classroom and found themselves in a state of confusion. Helen and Jack scanned the room and realized the room they had entered was completely empty. Not a single student or teacher could be found, resulting in Helen to slowly slide into a state of panic.

"Oh no..." Helen whimpered. "The classroom is empty!"

"Maybe we're early?" Jack suggested. "It's not a problem." He smirked, "Let's pick a seat and wait for the teacher to come, if he doesn't, then we ask another teacher where were supposed to be."

"That's..." Helen paused, "That's a good idea." She slowly walked over to a nearby desk and rested herself on the seat, shuffling her bag under the desk.

"If we stay together," Jack mused, "Then nothing bad could ever happen to us, right?" He took the opportunity to take the seat next to his sisters and chuck his bag under his seat.

"You're right," Helen agreed, resting her arms on the desk. "We're big kids now. We need to take respon... reppon-si..."

"Responsibility...?" Jack corrected.

"That's it! We'll learn even bigger words, too!"

"How big? I don't want to say words with a gazillion letters in them." Jack leaned back in his chair and scanned the room, taking note of all the posters and the drawings on the walls.

"There's no such thing, silly." Helen giggled.

As Jack and Helen continued on with their conversation, an unknown aura of energy surged through their bodies and the rest of the school, causing changes to not only the students, but the teachers. But as that was going on, Jack and Helen were unaware of a certain figure now standing in the classroom. It was...
152311.title: Jack and Helen find their way to class.

1523111.content:
The silence was quickly broken by the new visitor with a simple clearing of the throat. Jack and Helen immediately stopped in their tracks and looked forward to see another student standing by the classroom door. A young girl wearing a basic light blue jumper with a school shirt underneath, followed by a grey skirt that went down to her knees and a pair of frilly white socks that matched with a pair of black school shoes. Her ginger hair was tied into a bun at the back while a pair of glasses calmly rested on her nose, radiating her bright blue eyes.

"Oh wowie!" A warm smile crept on the girl's face. "I didn't know we had new kids in school today!" She slowly walked over to the desk and grabbed a seat for herself, smiling all along the way.

"T-Thanks." Helen nervously smiled.

"No problem." She continued to give the twins her warm smile.

"Are we in trouble for being in class early?" Jack asked the student, occasionally glancing at the new girl.

"Pfft," She rolled her eyes. "You won't get in trouble at all." The girl looked at Helen and then focused back to Jack, "So what are your names? I'm Maggie."

"I'm Jack," He introduced himself, "And that's my twin sister, Helen." Jack pointed at his sister.

"Nice to meet you," Maggie smiled. "It's nice knowing that you're not the only new kid in school."

"You're a new kid, too?" Helen asked, her eyes widened at the fact.

"Yeah," Maggie's cheeks turned red, "Well, sort of, I've only been here for three days, but that still makes me a new kid!"

"That's so cool." Jack exclaimed.

"Speaking of cool, do you want to be my friends? I haven't spoken to anyone here before and I think we should stick together." Maggie rested her backpack on the table and unzipped the top, pulling out several sheets of paper and two pencils.

"Sure!" Helen smiled.

"Yeah!" Jack agreed.

"Okay," Maggie continued to smile, she dipped her hands back into her backpack and pulled out two chain necklaces with a bright blue gem hanging from the bottom. "If we're going to be friends, you should wear these!"

"What is it?" Helen asked.

"Friendship necklaces." Maggie explained.

"What do they do?" Jack looked at the necklaces and then glanced at Maggie.

"They're special necklaces you put around your neck!"

"It's so pretty." Helen's eyes widened at the sight.

"Here, try it on." Maggie handed the twins their necklaces and watched as Jack and Helen placed the necklaces around their necks.

"So does this mean we're friends now?" Jack asked.

"We're all friends!" Maggie happily announced.

While the trio celebrated their new-found friendship, the classroom door began to open, more students of similar age began to pour through the door and take their seats. Jack, Maggie and Helen all sat together, still happy over their new friendship. Finally, the teacher entered the room. A man in his late thirties entered the classroom and walked straight over to the front desk, resting his briefcase on the top of the desk.

"Hello again, class. It's time for another week of learning." The teacher announced, a few moans of disappoint followed suit from several pupils. He turned round and scanned the classroom to see the happy faces coming from most of his students. His focus changed when he noticed Jack, Helen and Maggie sitting together.

"Ah," The teacher smiled, "I see we have some new students today, who might you two be?"

"Er," Jack was the first to speak, but found himself silent as the rest of the class rested their eyes on him and his sister. "I'm Jack and this is my sister, Helen."

"It's nice to see some fresh faces," He commented. "You can just call me Mr. Simmons. Usually, we have an introduction so you can tell us a little about yourself but unfortunately I had to attend a fellow student because they had a little accident. Either way, let's get this class going, let's continue from where we left off and learn about..."
1523111.title: Meeting Maggie

15231112.content:
"We're going to learn how to change a diaper." Mr. Simmons announced.

Between Jack and Helen, something was off, or was it? Helen and Jack exchanged confused glances at each other before looking back at Mr. Simmons. Maggie, on the other hand, felt increasingly nervous and just as confused as her new friends.

"Diapers...?" Maggie whispered to herself. "That doesn't make any sense." She quickly turned around and caught a strange reaction from the rest of the class, the rest of the students had seemed to pay no mind to what Mr. Simmons had announced, acting as if this was a normal thing, a few of the boys sitting in the back of the class could be seen sucking on their thumbs whilst some of the girls paid the teacher no attention to the lesson at hand and started to chew on their hair.

"Like I mentioned, we're going to be learning how to change diapers," Mr. Simmons continued, "For every child, this is a fundamental skill that everyone learns before the age of seven. What's special about this skill? Not only is it something you can learn to help yourself, but it's also something you can use to help others in need. If your best friend has wet themselves then you'll be able to help them, and in return, they can help you."

As Mr. Simmons continued on with his class, despite the rest of the class losing interest in what he had to say, Helen and Jack continued to listen to what the teacher had to say. They were confused at the subject matter, but were still interested enough to learn about what Mr. Simmons was talking about.

"For this class, I was originally going to ask for a volunteer to help me perform the diaper change so I can show the whole class how to do it." Mr. Simmons walked over to the classroom door, unaware of the lack of focus from his students, he continued to teach. "But I found a student who is willing to help us with the lesson."

Mr. Simmons opened the classroom door and presented a fellow student to the class. But Mr. Simmons didn't care, he continued to teach on despite the class having broken down into anarchy, several of the boys had left their desks and had begun to play with the contents of their backpacks like toys, pulling out water bottles, juice boxes in an attempt to consume them, despite the fact that they were all sealed. Many of the girls continued to ignore the lesson and kept playing with their hair or trying their best to soothe themselves by copying the rest of the boys' thumb sucking sessions. One of the girls decided to crawl under one of the desk's, loudly talking to herself in unintelligible strings of baby babble.

"Thanks for coming, Melissa."

As the class devolved into noise, Jack, Maggie and Helen were the only ones aware of their surroundings, and they didn't understand what they were seeing. Maggie started to look at her classmates and noticed the strange behaviour coming from them, unable to comprehend what they were doing, she quickly looked forward and noticed a new student enter the room on her knees. A student that Maggie recognized made her way into the classroom by crawling up to the teachers desk like a newborn infant.

Although that would've been the most shocking thing, the thing that tipped the scales in terms of craziness was the large thick white diaper that hugged the student's bottom, spreading her legs out into an infantile waddle.

"Maggie," Jack tapped his new friend on the shoulder. "Is everyone supposed to be acting like this? I thought they were all big kids."

"I don't know..." Maggie turned to look at her friends. "They're acting crazy! We need to get out of here!"

"J-Jack...," Helen leaned down and grabbed her backpack, she swooped it up from the floor and held it close. "I'm scared."

"We're going to be okay." Jack grabbed his sisters hand and pulled her in for a comforting hug.

"Follow me, I know a place we can hide!" Maggie hopped out of her seat and quickly rushed over to the classroom door. Jack and Helen followed suit with their belongings.

"Shouldn't we tell a grown up?" Jack asked.

"I don't know," Maggie looked back at her former classmates, glancing at Rachel, one of the few girls in the class, sat on the floor with her thumb in her mouth. Her shoes were gone and she idly wiggled her toes as a damp spot formed on the front of her skirt.

The door to the classroom was slammed shut, despite the majority of the class mentally regressing, Mr. Simmons continued to teach his infantile students as if they were still listening. Melissa sat on top of the teachers desk, ready to be changed.

"If we can get to my secret spot then we should be safe from all of the crazy kids." Maggie let go of the handle and looked at Jack and Helen, she nervously looked down the corridor and then looked back at her friends.

"I still don't get what's going on!" Jack whined. "Why are all of the kids acting like babies? Did our Mommy send us to a special daycare?"

"I don't know..." Maggie shrugged, "They were normal yesterday, and the day before that. Maybe their brains are broken?"

"I hope our parents can help us." Helen sniffled, on the verge of tears.

"I think we'll need more than our Mommies and Daddies..." Maggie shivered.

"Why?" Jack asked.

"Because..."
15231112.title: The Great Change

152311121.content:
As chaos began to tear apart the disciplined nature of the school, Maggie, Helen and Jack had begun their mission to find a safe place. Maggie lead the charge through several corridors, dodging her mentally regressed peers as they played, cried and crawled all along the floor. Jack and Helen kept up at a steady pace and dodged a few of the overgrown toddlers, only to be met by Maggie stopping in the middle of what felt like the sixth corridor they passed through.

Maggie stopped to take in the strange behaviour unfolding before her, she looked around and noticed so many of the familiar faces she knew from the past few days suddenly crawling around acting like infants all of a sudden. She noticed one particular girl lying on the floor with her thumb in her mouth, Maggie's eyes widened in shock at the girl and rushed over to her.

"Oh my gosh," Maggie gasped.

Jack and Helen finally caught up with their new friend and paused when they noticed Maggie grabbing one of the girls.

"What's wrong, Maggie?" Jack asked. "Why did you stop?"

"It's my big sister!" Maggie leaned down and grabbed her sister by the arms, pulling her up to her feet, "My big sister has turned into a big baby!" She cried out.

"That's horrible!" Helen exclaimed, she took a step forward and grabbed the girl's arm, keeping the over-sized toddler steady on her feet. She managed to get a glance at the girl and noticed the familiar ginger hair that Maggie and her big sister both shared. She wore a blue vest with a basic white school shirt underneath, followed up by a skirt that went down to her knees, similar to Maggie, the difference being that there wasn't a wet spot on the front of Maggie's skirt.

"Donna!" Maggie cried out, "Can you hear me? Stop acting like a baby! You're a big kid!" She waved her hands in front of her older sibling and found no answer, only a string of baby babble.

"Why isn't she listening?" Jack looked at the older child and noticed the wet stain on the front of her skirt. "And why did she pee her pants?"

"W-What!?" Maggie looked at the wet patch on her sister's skirt and looked back up at Donna, who was responding by giving a satisfied smile. "Oh no, my seven year old sister is a two year old! I can't be the big sister! I'm only five!"

"I think we need to get her a diaper." Helen suggested, holding the toddler's hand.

"We can't do that!" Maggie exclaimed, "She's not a baby!"

"She can't keep on peeing all over the floor, she'll get dirty." Helen explained, "If that girl we saw in class is wearing a diaper, maybe there's ones for big kids too!"

"And what if she does a stinky?" Jack added, "That's not good at all."

"Ugh," Maggie frowned, "Let's find her a diaper, but where are we supposed to find one?"
152311121.title: ..."The whole school is like this!"

choices: "We need to wear them, just in case."
"Why don't find some pull ups? It's better than diapers."
1523111211.content:
After travelling through more parts of the school, and realizing the scope and size of the situation unfolding, Maggie, Jack and Helen were more than motivated to make it to the Nurses Office, despite a setback made by Donna. The mentally regressed older sibling soon found walking to be boring and stopped dead in her tracks, she sat herself down on the corridor floor and continued to suckle on her thumb.

"Donna!" Maggie commanded her older sister, grabbing her free hand, she pulled the over-sized toddler back up on her feet. "Get up! We need to put a diaper on you!"

But in an instant, Donna dropped back down onto the floor, more interested in her thumb than anything else going on around her. Maggie continued to pull her sister towards the Nurses Office but couldn't find the strength to continue.

"Please!" Maggie cried out, "I don't want Mommy finding out you peed your pants at school!"

"I've got an idea!" Helen announced, she slowly walked up to Donna and revealed her backpack to Maggie's older sister. This immediately caught the mentally regressed child's attention. "Aww," Helen cooed, "Does baby want a drink?" She dipped a hand into her backpack and pulled out a water bottle, Donna leaned forward and tried to snatch the bottle out of Helen's hands, but failed. "If baby wants a drink, come and get it!" This prompted the giant toddler to start crawling towards the group, ignoring everything else around her.

"That's super smart!" Maggie smiled, "Come and get the bottle, baby!" She playfully raised her voice at her big sister.

It took longer than expected, but the trio and Donna soon reached the Nurses Office. Maggie jumped forward and opened the door, coaxing Donna to crawl inside. Helen and Jack encouraged Maggie's sister to come in. Maggie took this opportunity to close the door behind them.

"I can't believe we managed to do that." Helen handed the bottle over to Donna, who began to suckle on the top.

"We make a pretty good team." Jack commented.

With that over, Maggie took the opportunity to walk over to the Nurses cabinets, she opened several of the cabinets and began to rummage through.

"When I first came here," Maggie poked her head out of the cabinet, "I fell over in the playground and the Nurse put a bandage on my knee. I just know she keeps all of her Nurse stuff in here somewhere!"

"Why would the Nurse keep diapers here? I thought big kids don't use diapers." Jack walked over to Maggie and looked inside the cabinets.

"I don't know," Maggie shrugged. "She's a Nurse, she fixes a lot of boo-boo's, why wouldn't she keep diapers here? It's an emergency!"

Upon moving to a different cabinet, Maggie rummaged through another and discovered something different. She inspected the strange item and pulled it out to reveal a large cardboard box, Maggie opened the top and found what she was looking for and more.

"I think I found what we need!" Maggie announced, she dipped her hands into the box and pulled out a pack of large diapers, on the front of the packaging was a mix of pretty colours and an image of a child looking happy whilst a diaper hugged his behind. "These should be big enough for my sister!"

"Wait..." Jack paused, "You don't mean we have to change her, do you?" He pointed at Donna.

"Ew," Maggie giggled. "She's my sister," She walked over to her sister with the pack of diapers in hand and ripped open the top of the packaging, she rested the pack on the floor and pulled out a single diaper. It unfolded before the trio's eyes, causing them to look at the undergarment with curiosity. "She's my responsibility."

"Hey," Jack chuckled. "There's that word again."

The first part of the change had begun, Donna was laid down on the floor while Maggie positioned the diaper under her sisters bottom, she then slowly pulled down her sisters skirt and rolled it up into a ball, revealing Donna's frilly pink underwear to the group. Jack covered his eyes and turned away as the rest of the change proceeded.

Once Donna's underwear were also discarded, the front of the sides covered up her crotch while the sides soon followed after. Maggie stretched the tapes over to the front for a nice and secure fitting, all the while Donna continued to suckle from the now-empty water bottle, completely unaware of the thick diaper around her legs.

"All done!" Maggie sang, patting the front of her sisters diaper.

"Phew," Jack sighed in relief. "Diaper changes are so icky," He commented, looking at Donna, "Our aunt has a little baby and he stinks!"

"I'm glad we don't need diapers." Helen smiled at her brother.

"Actually..." Maggie sighed.
1523111211.title: The Nurses Office

choices: "It's for pretending to be a big baby!"
15231112111.content:
Jack and Helen stared at Maggie, both wearing a look of confusion and shock on their faces, they stepped closer to Maggie and continued to wear their shocked expressions. Maggie grabbed Donna by the arm and lifted her onto her feet, occasionally glancing back at the pack of diapers next to her. She manoeuvred her big sister over to a corner and dipped a free hand in her pocket to pull out a bright pink pacifier for the mentally regressed child. The amber nipple was slowly slipped into Donna's mouth and she began to loudly suckle on while Maggie looked back at the twins.

"That should keep her quiet," Maggie smiled. "I found a pacifier in the cabinet. I think it will keep her calm."

"Excuse me," Jack spoke up, grabbing Maggie's attention. "But did you say we have to wear a diaper?"

"Oh," Maggie blushed. "Well," She rubbed her chin, "It's just to be safe."

"Safe?" Helen raised an eyebrow. "What do you mean, safe?"

"We need to wear them just in case we have any accidents, that's all." Maggie explained. "I don't know why everyone is acting like a big baby, but I was thinking that if we wear a diaper each, then we won't have to worry about turning into a baby."

"I don't understand." Helen scratched her head.

"I think someone's trying to turn all of the kids back into babies!" Maggie continued.

"That's crazy!" Jack frowned.

"There's no way my sister just decided to act like a baby for no reason! I bet, there's someone out there who's turning all of the kids back into big babies for some reason. If we wear a diaper then maybe he'll think we've already been turned into babies!"

"There's no way I'm wearing a diaper around school!" Jack crossed his arms.

"I'll do it." Helen raised her hand, catching Jack and Maggie's attention.

"W-What!?" Jack's eyes widened, he quickly made his way over to his sister and looked at her, straight in the eyes. "You're not a big baby! We're grown ups now! You can't walk around school in a diaper! I won't let you!"

"Jack!" Helen whimpered, "But what if Maggie's right? What if there's a spooky man out there?"

"Er, I don't know," Jack paused. "But I won't let you wear one! You'll turn into a big baby faster than everyone else did!"

"I'm a big girl and I have the reppon-si-bi-lee to do what I want!" Helen growled.

As Jack and Helen continued to argue, Maggie walked over to her big sister with a diaper in hand and eventually noticed that Donna had fell asleep. The overgrown infant sub-consciously suckled on her bright pink pacifier in her nap while her legs idly kicked around without coordination. With her sister now relaxed and asleep, Maggie reached for the buttons on her skirt and allowed it to fall to the ground, revealing her frilly white underwear, She laid the diaper on the floor and positioned herself on top of it, she slid her underwear off her legs and pulled the front of the diaper over her crotch. The sides were pulled over and the tapes to fastened for a snug and secure fit for Maggie.

With a little bit of effort, she managed to regain her composure and stand up, her legs were instantly spread out by the immense thickness of the diaper and her balance was slightly thrown off. She slowly waddled over to the cardboard box and dipped her hands inside to pull out a bright pink pacifier that resembled the one Donna had in her mouth. Maggie slowly placed the amber nipple inside her mouth and began to suckle on the pacifier, instantly finding an immense sense of calmness. But before she could continue suckling, she ripped the pacifier out of her mouth and looked at the twins.

"Come on," Maggie cleared her throat, catching Helen and Jack's attention. "See? I'm wearing a diaper and I'm fine!" She looked at her undergarment and smiled back.

"Are you sure?" Jack rubbed his chin. "If you're feeling fine, then why have you got a pacifier in your hand?"

"Because..."
15231112111.title: Precautions

choices: "But we need to wait until school is over!"
"We need to figure what's going on and fix it!"
152311121111.content:
Jack continued to stare at Maggie's pink pacifier before finally deciding to take a step back, finally shrugging his shoulders, he walked back over to Helen and wrapped an arm around her shoulder.

"Okay." Jack nodded, looking at the open package of diapers, he finally gave in and looked back at Maggie. "I'll wear a stupid diaper!" He moaned, throwing his arms up into the air.

"You will?" Maggie blinked, holding the pacifier in her hand tightly.

"Jack..." Helen took a step forward and placed a shoulder, prompting her brother to turn round. "Are you sure? What if you turn into a big baby?"

"I'm your brother," Jack weakly smiled. "I've got repp-, uh, repp-sib-bee..."

"Responsibility?"

"That's it," Jack nodded. "I'll go first. And if I start to feel funny, I'll be the first to tell you. I promise."

"You're so brave, Jack!" Helen weeped, wrapping her arms around her brother, embracing him into a tight hug.

Jack pulled himself out of Helen's hug and made his way over to Maggie, who happened to be holding a fresh diaper for him, she gestured for him to lie down on the floor and he did as he was told. Without being asked, Jack removed his trousers and soon followed up by removing his underwear, Maggie somewhat looked away but continued to rest the diaper underneath Jack's bottom and pulled the front over his crotch. The tapes were quickly pulled over to the front and he was fastened into a tight and secure fit.

Once the change was complete, Jack wiggled his legs and felt the immense amount of thick padding swell up between his legs. Maggie reached down and grabbed him by the arm and slowly pulled him up onto his feet. Jack looked down at his diaper and prodded the front to get an idea of the thickness within. Helen slowly walked over to the two and began to giggle to herself.

"What's so funny?" Jack felt his cheeks burn a bright red.

"Aww," Helen cooed, "You look so cute."

"Do not!" Jack whimpered, he attempted to cover up his diaper with his hands.

"You're just like me now!" Maggie happily announced, "There's no way, we'll get turned into babies if the person behind this thinks we're already babies!"

"Pretend babies!" Jack corrected.

"Sure." Maggie nodded, she walked over to the cardboard box and dipped her hand inside, pulling out a light blue pacifier. "If you're going to play pretend, you better need this!"

"Oh, come on!" Jack continued to whine, "There's no way I'm sucking on a pacifier! It's for babies!"

"But we're pretending to be babies!" Helen added.

"But..., I said... I mean..."

"No buts, big baby," Maggie waddled over to Jack and handed him the pacifier by the hook. "The better we act like babies, the better we'll fool the person behind all of this!"

"It's something my Daddy said." Maggie explained, waddling back over to the package of diapers, she plucked out a fresh diaper and looked at Helen. "It's time for a fresh diaper, Helen."

"Tee-hee," Helen giggled, she walked over to her brother and Maggie and sat herself down, removing her skirt to reveal her pink underwear. "What are we going to do when we're pretending to be babies?"

"I've got a plan..." Maggie continued.
152311121111.title: "It's for pretending to be a big baby!"

choices: They're woken up by their mother, it's morning.
15233.content:
"It's almost time to go to bed. Get your pyjamas on. You've got ten minutes before the lights go out."

As Julie's announcement ringed through the halls down to their bedroom, the twins suddenly jumped off their beds and sprang into action. Jack and Helen dashed to the closet and pulled out a pair of footed sleepers each. Jack was the first to take off his clothes to neatly fold them, remembering exactly like how mom taught him, he pulled off his t-shirt and folded it by the middle and rested it on his desk for tomorrow morning's laundry run. His blue running shorts and red socks shortly followed. Leaving him in his underwear.

Helen was noticeably slower than her brother, by the time Jack had dipped his feet into his sleeper, Helen had begun to pull down her skirt and socks. She tossed the clothing aside and quickly dipped her feet in the pink sleeper in a mad dash to get dressed in time. She pulled the sleeper up to her chest and reached round for the zipper, pulling it up to the very top.

Proud of their handiwork, the twins looked at each other and gave themselves a victorious nod.

"Jack, Helen," Julie's voice started to become louder with each passing second. "Times up!"

Julie entered the bedroom, her presence immediately caught the twins attention. They watched as their mother stepped into the room. The bedroom door closed behind her and she looked down at her two children. The smile on her face quickly faded when she noticed several articles of clothing lazily thrown on the floor.

"Helen," Julie's tone of voice lowered, almost turning into a scold. "What have I told you about leaving your clothes on the floor?"

Helen swallowed the lump in her throat. She watched her mother pick up the dirty clothes and neatly fold them together.

"I've told you a million times. You fold your clothes and leave them on the desk when it's time to do the laundry tomorrow." Julie walked over to the bedroom desk and set them down next to her brother's clothes.

"I'm sorry." Helen squeaked, eyeing the floor instead of her mother.

"It's okay," Julie turned her frown into a light smile. "Get into bed and we'll talk about this tomorrow. I knew I shouldn't have let Robert teach you how to fold your clothes."

The twins exchanged looks at each other before waddling over to their beds. They hopped on the mattress and dug their legs under the blanket. Julie finished their work off by pulling the blanket over their bodies and giving them a light kiss on their forehead.

"Do any of you have to go to the bathroom before you go to sleep?" Julie asked.

"No." Jack and Helen responded, burrowing into their blankets.

"Good," Julie smirked. "If I see any of you in the hallways once the lights go out, you won't be allowed to read your comics." And with that, Julie turned out the lights and left the room, closing the door behind her. The twins silently rested in their beds, only having the moonlight outside to brighten their room.

"That's not fair...," Helen whispered, catching her brothers attention. "I put my pyjamas on by myself. Daddy said, I was a big girl when I do that by myself."

"It's okay," Jack lifted his head off his pillow and looked at his sister. "I can teach you how to fold your clothes, then you'll be an ever bigger girl!"

As Jack looked at his sister across the room, he looked out of the bedroom window for a split second. A bright light caught his eye during his quick gaze at the world outside. He kicked his blanket off his body and hopped off the bed, walking to the window.

"Jack," Helen whispered. "What's wrong? You'll get in trouble if mommy finds out out of your bed."

"It's only for a second!" Jack hushed. "I think there's a shooting star outside."

"A what?" Helen's curiosity got the best of her. She hopped out of her bed and waddled over to her brother. Her glance outside was quickly fixed on the same bright light Jack had spotted.

"A shooting star!" Jack replied, pointing at the bright anomaly. "It's a shooting star!"

"What's a shooting star?" Helen blinked, rubbing her eyes at the brightness of the object in the dark sky.

"I don't know." Jack shrugged.

"Do you think it's an astronaut?" Helen asked.

"What's an astronaut doing in the sky?" Jack looked at his sister.

"They're supposed to be in the sky, silly." Helen frowned.

"I didn't know astronaut's were so bright." Jack looked back outside.

Before the twins could continue with their conversation. The beam of light shone directly into the twins eyes, effectively blinding them for a couple of seconds. From outside, a loud bang could be heard.

"Ugh," Helen whimpered. "It's too bright!"

"But look!" Jack rubbed his eyes. "It's gone!"

Much to Helen's surprise, the mysterious object in the sky had disappeared. Not a single trace of the bright light was left.

"Where did it go?" Helen rubbed her eyes.

"I don't know." Jack leaned closer to the window, trying to get a final look at the outside world.

"That's spooky." Helen commented.

"Oh well," Jack sighed, shrugging his shoulders in confusion. "It must've disappeared."

"Let's get back into bed before mommy finds out." Helen waddled back over to her bed, climbing under her blanket.

"Good idea." Jack did the same as his sister and climbed back into bed.

A few minutes passed and their memories of the bright light dimmed as they fell in and out of conciousness. Their eyelids began to droop and they entered dreamland. Unbeknownst to the twins, their thumbs had slipped into their mouths and a strange aura of energy passed through their bodies.
15233.title: Perception

152331.content:
Jack had a nice dream involving him being a superhero, while Helen dreamed of being Princess of the Sugar Fairies.

Soon, Jack feels his body being shaken. His eyes flutter open. "Good morning, Jackie-pie. Ready for a big day?" His mother was waking him.

Jack felt weird... he sat up, and then felt a squelch. He threw the covers off his bed.

Wet.

The sheets and his PJs were wet.

Jack wanted to scream. He hadn't wet the bed since... well, since he was in Pull-Ups!

"Looks like I might have made a mistake letting you go to bed in those undies. C'mon, let's get you cleaned up." Mother picked up Jack and walked him to the laundry room, stripping his wet PJs off and putting them in the laundry machine.

Jack felt comforted, until his mother said, "Let's get these on", and revealed an undergarment.
152331.title: They're woken up by their mother, it's ...

choices: She was watching something Jack didn't like.
She was watching baby programs, which Jack liked all of a sudden.
She was watching something Jack also liked.
1523313.content:
He was so confused; normally bedwetting didn't even occur to him, and Jack was left to argue with himself over the panic that sank in as he realised he was doing something that didn't resemble grown-up. Or he thought so -- suddenly finding a sense of confusion wash over him as an inch of him felt immensely satisfied for needing to relieve himself, yet he persisted to feel fustrated until his Mommy suddenly revealed his choice of underwear -- a diaper.

"A diaper?" Jack squeacked, he felt a flurry of red cover his cheeks before drifting his gaze away from the infantile garment. "I'm big enough to wear big boy underwear. I didn't mean to wet the bed!"

"You wet the bed," His Mommy responded, unfolding the sides of the diaper, "It's just a precaution incase you have another oopsie-whoopsie. I don't want my baby boy to have another accident on his sheets."

There was something satisfying about hearing Mommy tell him about his accidents. Almost praising him. He couldn't understand; but he felt more relief than before as his Mommy taped the diaper around his body -- initially forgetting about the routine of going to the bathroom and felt instead going where he stood was a better option. As the tapes to his diaper were enclosed, Jack shook his head in confusion as he couldn't remember which was the best place to go and relieve himself. No matter what, it felt good to do so anyways.

"You run along," Jack's Mommy finished, "We've got a whole weekend to ourselves. Helen's probably waiting in the living room. I bet y'can't wait to see all of those cartoons you love."

The question of why she left him in just the diaper itself had to wait. Jack suddenly jumped at the chance to watch his favourite cartoons; and immediately waddled from out the laundry room and into the living room where Helen was waiting. Upon locking his eyes on the TV; he noticed something about Helen and the cartoons she was watching.
1523313.title: A disposable diaper for Jack

15233132.content:
Helen's eyes were glued to the show she was watching, which was Blue's Clues. Normally, Jack thought that and stuff like Dora and Little Einsteins were for babies and toddlers, and he watched big kid shows like Ben 10 or... whatever.

But somehow, this seemed to... grip him. He sat down on his diapered bottom and watched it with her.

Time passed. So did a couple of episodes, and soon, the kids stomachs rumbled.

"Mommy, I'm hungry!" said Helen, and quickly, their mother came in with...
15233132.title: She was watching baby programs, which Jack like...

choices: ...She was given a sippy cup and a bowl of porridge.
...She was given a glass of orange juice served with toast and beans.
152332.content:
The scent of bacon and eggs filled the kitchen. The light sizzling noise coming from the frying pan reminded Helen of the large empty void in her stomach. Breakfast was imminent and she couldn't wait.

Jack sat at the kitchen table with a spoon in hand. He dunk the spoon into the bowl in front of him and pulled up a spoonful of cereal. The tip of the spoon was quickly shoved into his mouth and he loudly munched on his breakfast. Small amounts of milk and cereal found themselves escaping his mouth and falling onto his sleeper, he quickly devolved into a mess as his mother seemed completely unaware of his current state.

"Good morning, Helen." Julie smiled, turning away from the stove.

"Good morning, mommy." Helen greeted her mother, yawning as she sat on a table stool.

"I decided to let you sleep a little longer than usual," Julie grabbed a clean plate from the cupboard in front. "It is the weekend after all. Your breakfast will be finished in a couple of minutes so sit tight."

Helen kept herself still on the stool and twiddled with her thumbs to pass the time. The more she played with her thumbs, a thought came into her mind, she didn't understand what it was, but her thumbs felt strange and tingly at first. An urge came over her to quickly stuff one of her thumbs in her mouth, at first, she denied herself the feeling. But this urge started to grow stronger and stronger until it was no use.

Her lips began to pucker and her thumb continued to tingle, the sensation was too much for Helen as she let go of her feelings and quickly planted her thumb in her mouth. The moment her thumb entered, she began to suckle. The tension inside of her began to fade away the more she focused on her thumb, and it was working. Her thoughts were consumed by her sudden wave of relief, she couldn't believe how good her thumb felt inside her mouth.

Before she knew it, a plate was dropped in front of her. Helen's concentration on her thumb was suddenly broken.

"Here you go," Julie sang. "Enjoy your breakfast!"

Helen stared at the contents at the plate and noticed...
152332.title: Skip to Breakfast

1523322.content:
Toast and baked beans. Helen's favourite. Her mouth felt that familiar tingle as she looked at her breakfast in delight. Helen's enthusiasm for her breakfast quickly dropped as she noticed a large fork by the side of her plate. Something felt odd, Helen couldn't explain it. The more she looked at the fork Mommy had given her, the more she wanted to eat less.

Helen looked away from her delicious breakfast and turned round to look at her brother. Jack had finished his breakfast in record-time. The downside to that was the large splotches of milk and cereal that covered him and his blue sleeper. He held the bowl by the sides and began to drink the last remaining remnants of milk from the bottom, unaware of the milk that fell out and landed on his pyjamas.

For some reason, the way her brother consumed his breakfast felt right. Helen couldn't explain it. Her focus went back to the baked beans and toast that awaited her. She put two and two together and shrugged off any worries she might have had.

Just like her brother, Helen began to carelessly work her way through her breakfast as quick and as lazily as she could. Her hands dipped into the sauce as she managed to pick out several baked beans. A few of the beans entered her mouth as several others fell out of her messy hands and landed on her pink sleeper.

It took her a while, but Helen finally managed to swallow several handful's of baked beans without the help of a fork or a spoon. She felt rather proud of herself. Her hands rubbed against her sleeper which spread more of her mess around her sleeper and finally decided to work on the toast.

As she worked on the toast, Julie walked over to her daughter and...
1523322.title: A Regular Breakfast

choices: ...discovers that the living room has been slightly altered.
...she discovers that her underwear are suddenly wet.
15233221.content:
As the last morsel of toast was devoured. Helen continued to wipe her hands on her sleeper, just as she expected, her hands were clean to a degree. She completely forgot about the state of her sleeper and the large mess she created. Toast crumbs and baked beans slid down her sleeper, extending the mess down to the kitchen floor as her food fell off her seat.

Unaware of her footsteps, Helen noticed an intimidating shadow fall over her. She stopped eating her breakfast and turned round to see Julie standing over her. Instantly, Helen recoiled in fear, she mentally punched herself the second she realized that wrong she committed. She wasn't supposed to eat with her hands, the fork was there for a reason!

"Helen," Julie raised an eyebrow at her daughter, resting both hands on her hips. "What have you done?"

"Oh," Helen choked on her food, loudly coughing up her beans and toast. "N-Nothing mommy!" She rested a hand over her dirty sleeper, trying her best to cover up the messy evidence.

"You're hiding something from me, aren't you?" Julie responded with a light frown on her face.

"N-No!" Helen shook her head, using her other arm to cover up the remaining pieces of beans and toast.

"Let me see." Julie reached forward and grabbed Helen's arms. She pulled them away from the sleeper, revealing the mess on her daughters pyjama's.

"P-Please don't punish me!" Helen begged, grabbing her mothers arm. "I didn't mean to do it!"

Julie looked up and stared at her daughter straight in the eyes. Her soft frown turned into a light smile before releasing several chuckles at the messy sleeper. Helen blinked several times, unable to understand what her mother was doing. She continued to make herself small in front of her mother, still expecting the worst to happen. It was at that point where Julie released her grip on her daughter's arm, confusing Helen even further.

"Oh silly," Julie smiled, holding her laughter in. "You're messy. You can't help making a mess. I knew you weren't big enough to use the fork on your own."

"W-Wait!" Helen mumbled. "I'm a big girl! I can use a fork on my own!"

"You can't," Julie shook her head. "You didn't even use it." She pointed at the discarded fork nearby.

"I forgot how to use it!" Helen tried to reason. "I'm sorry, please don't punish me!"

"I'm not going to punish you, you tried your best," Julie continued to smile. She picked up the clean fork and rested it down on the plate. "Take off your sleeper and I'll wash it."

Helen complied with her mother and hopped off the stool. She reached for the zipper and pulled it downwards, causing her sleeper to drop as she pulled on the zipper. As it hit the floor, leaving Helen in a pair of basic white underwear.

"What am I supposed to do now?" Helen asked her mother, covering up her underwear with her hands.

"Go and wait in the living room," Julie cooed. "I'll be with you in a few minutes." She turned round and looked at Jack from across the kitchen. "I need to go and sort out Jack."

Helen walked over to the kitchen door and looked back at Julie. She walked over to the kitchen table and looked at Jack. Helen stopped and looked at her brother, noticing the same type of mess that coated his sleeper. What caught Helen's attention was the large wet spot that appeared on the lower front of her brothers sleeper. Jack sucked his thumb, unaware of what he was doing. He looked up at his mother and smiled.

Helen exited the kitchen and continued to make her way to the living room, feeling a cold shiver tingle her backside. Once she enters the living room she...
15233221.title: Unnecessary Praise

choices: ...Julie and Jack enter the room, with Jack wearing different clothes.
152332212.content:
As Helen walked into the living room, the strange feeling she felt from earlier began to gnaw the back of her mind. It was as if the strange feeling was waiting for her to leave the kitchen and go somewhere else before it decided to kick in. Once Helen reached the living room, her hand slowly crept up close to her mouth, her lips twitched and her mouth opened before her thumb was slowly shoved inward.

Helen began to suckle on her thumb without thinking. Her worries about what happened in the kitchen and her lack of clothes were suddenly put at ease once her thumb was inside her mouth. A wave of calmness shuddered throughout her body, one that she wished would stay longer than before.

Her calm state was abruptly ended by a strange hissing noise coming from somewhere in the living room. Helen scanned the room and noticed no differences, but then, she felt a strange warmth emanate from her crotch. Her eyes widened, she looked down and noticed the puddle she stood in.

From further observation, she immediately noticed the large damp spot on the front of her underwear. Panic and anger erupted within the child, causing Helen to quickly step outside of the puddle and pull her thumb out of her mouth.

"Oh no," Helen whimpered, lowering her hands down to her crotch to hide her wetting. "I'm a big girl... This shouldn't happen!"

Her mind went into total shut down. Nothing like this had ever happened before.

As Helen panicked and she continued to wet herself, she didn't notice...
152332212.title: Wet Underwear

choices: "We need to put you back in diapers-knew you two were too young to train."
"You're not ready for undies, let's get some Pull-Ups on you and your brother."
1523322121.content:
As Helen continued sucking on her thumb, she didn't hear the footsteps coming from behind her as Julie walked in with Jack on her hip.

"Helen, why are you standing in a puddle?" Julie said, looking at Helen. Helen nearly jumped, scared by the suddenness of what her mother had said.

"Uhhh..." was all that Helen could say, but Julie picked her up and began taking her to the twin's room, while saying...
1523322121.title: ...Julie and Jack enter the room, with Jack wea...

choices: ...Give in and play with the baby toys.
1523322122.content:
It didn't take long for the panic and dismay to quickly fade away and move back into the recesses of Helen's mind. Her thumb quickly dipped into her mouth and her lips quickly sucked on the intrusion for comfort. Helen began to wonder why she was just panicking just a minute ago, she argued with herself, unable to figure out why she was worrying over wetting her underwear in the first place. Her bladder was full and she needed to relieve herself. It was simple.

Her daze was quickly ended by the loud noise and creaking wood and the sound of crinkling. Helen blinked and scanned the living room, completely ignoring her wet underwear, she continued to suckle on her thumb and took several steps toward the couch. As she made her way over to the couch, she noticed something strange appear in the corner of her eye. Standing still, she turned and noticed a large play-pen resting in the corner of the living room. Helen continued to suckle on her thumb before deciding to walk over to the large contraption to get a better look.

"What's a play-pen doing in the living room...?" Helen mumbled, lightly chewing on her thumb as she spoke.

Inside the play-pen were an assortment of teddy bears, toy trains, baby blocks and a large play-mat that rested underneath the toys. Helen slowly went up to the wooden bars and peeked through the gap to get a look at the objects inside.

"It's just a bunch of toys." Helen stated, unable to comprehend the sudden appearance of the strange toys. She continued to peak through the bars until something caught her attention, her eyes focused on a large cream bunny plush and Helen decided to...
1523322122.title: The living room was different.

choices: ...A doll, which looks like Helen's mother.
15233221222.content:
It felt hopeless. As Helen stared at the giant bunny, she felt it's lifeless beady eyes look back right at her and tempt her to enter the play-pen. The side of the pen mysteriously opened by an unknown force and the door swept right open, allowing Helen to enter and play with the irresistible baby toys. With every step, Helen's posture and coordination slowly hid itself behind the back of her mind. Her slow walk turned into a cumbersome waddle as her steps became bigger and bigger, finally crossing over the threshold and into the play-pen itself.

"This" she said, she pointed on the side of the crib was a peice of card saying "for ages six months-3 years, ABC (Arizonas Baby Center)"

Sandy was a bit taken back, but she quickly said "So, whatever weirdo who made this would try to make it althentic, so the wimp who used it would feel better", Jane retorted "But its stamped with the oficial stamp", "so" said sandy, "well" jane said, "I not really sure, but I think I heard the law teacher saying it was ellegal to use some other companies signiture stamp if it was made by that company, in that few minutes when I dropped my ipod", "so" she continued "That means that this was made by ABC and they only make real baby things"

"This is stupid" said Jane, "We aren't babies, look at these, I've got perfect CC", "I know" said jane, looking down at her own figure, "and the only other possibility is..." she stopped in mid sentance, suddenly realising what it ment if they were still the same age, "No, no it can't be, its impossible, we aren't" she stoped "aren't" again she stopped, frantically the girls looked around the room, but there was nothing in the room that was regular sized, except, "The Door", quickly they ran to it, "See said Sandy we are still the same height with this door, as we were in the corridor", "Based on the door?" asked Jane, "Yes" said Sandy, "that door?" asked Jane again, "Yes" said sandy, "The strangly short door?", "ye..." Sandy stopped in mid, "What?" "Look" said Jane, looking up the door was many feet away from the celling.

The two girls looked at each other, had they shrunk to baby size? What would happen to them if Alice or for that matter anyone found them now? As if there thoughts had been read they heard someone comming, quickly they turned and saw...

Note: 1) is they are baby sized, 2)there still the same size.
