choices: A rented home in the Florida Keys
1551.content:
LITTLE GIRL'S WEEKEND

45 year old Lauren is excited to get away from the stresses of Motherhood and hang out with her best friends Victoria and Nicole. The three friends have planned a self proclaimed "Girl's Weekend" in sunny Florida. Mary's vacation, however, takes a turn for the weird when everyone, including her friends, start beleiving that she is a baby. Lauren is also shocked to find herself acting like the baby she is supposed to be.

Now here is your first option: Where is the Girl's weekend located in Florida?
1551.title: "Little Girl's Weekend" Plot Beginning

choices: They head off to Disney World.
15511.content:
"I'm finally here."

Lauren looked through the plane window; she could see the beautiful oceans and beaches of Florida where all of the families were happily playing and basking in the sun. Not Lauren. She was tired from raising her 3 children and the stresses of motherhood. Now that her children were all away in college, she and her friends had celebrated by going on vacation in Florida.

Lauren gathered her carry-on from the top cabinet and followed the people out of the plane. Outside, she saw her best friends, Nicole and Victoria, holding up a sign that said, "Girls' Weekend!" written on it.

Excited Lauren shouted, "Hey, girls!

"Lauren!" the two mothers shouted.

The three women ran over to each other and hugged it out. Nicole said, "I'm so glad you finally made it!"

"We almost thought you couldn't make it here." Victoria said.

Shrugging, Lauren said, "Well, I'm here aren't I?" The girls cheered and hugged it out again. "So what's first on the agenda.

"Well, the young hotel men have already gotten out luggage and taken them to our room, so we can head off to..."

Lauren asked excitedly, "What? A spa?"

Victoria said, "No, even better!"

"What is it? Pamala Beach?"

"Nope! We're going to...Disney World!"

Then, Lauren's happy smile slowly frowned. She was expecting something more...mature for three grown women to go to. "Uhh..." Lauren said. "That's..not quite what I was expecting."

"Come on! We don't wanna miss the 12:00 parade!" the two mothers grabbed Lauren by the arms and brought her into the car where they drove off to the most wonderful place on Earth.
15511.title: We're Going to Disney World!

choices: One of the Disney World rides.
155111.content:
The car drove in the parking spaces of the theme park (which most of them were filled today) and finally parked in a avaiable space.

Victoria, rather excited, said, "I can't believe that we're going to Disney World!"

"Yeah." replied Nicole. "I haven't been here since I was a little girl."

Lauren happily ignored them and the fact they were STILL grown women who were deciding to a kid's theme park. She blushed at the embarrassing thought.

Anyway, the girls head the Disney gates, following the thousands of the people (including children) into the park. As the mothers entered the massive park, Lauren checked out the time on one of the clocks in the park.

"Well," she said. "We're a bit early for a parade. I think we should do something to pass the time 'til then."

Victoria and Nicole looked in the Disney World map that they had gotten and chose to go to...
155111.title: They head off to Disney World.

choices: Lauren wants to go the Princess Meet and Greet
Lauren wants to go on the Winnie the Pooh ride
1551111.content:
"Let's go on one of the rides!" Victoria said.

"How about we let Lauren choose our first ride." Nicole said. "I mean, you and I have been here so many times, let us have a first timer choose."

Nicole hands Lauren the map, and Lauren takes a look. She is about to say that she only wants to go on thrill rides, but she, for some reason, begins to feel scared of thrill rides.

"What am I thinking? I love thrill rides." Lauren argues in her own mind. Yet she cannot bring herself to go on Space Mountain or Big Thunder. She is just too scared.

What does she decide instead?
1551111.title: One of the Disney World rides.

1551112.content:
"Let's go to the gift shop!" Victoria and Nicole both shouted.

Lauren nerviously nodded along and the two mothers dragged her into the Disney gift shop. Inside, Lauren waited by the store door as her friends looked around, picking out cute T-shirts and other Disney junk.

Lauren couldn't understand why her friends had chose such a childish place for a vacation. This vacation was to get her mind away from her kids, not be surrounded by kids. Then, she noticed a cute pink shirt with Tinkerbell on it and thought that she could "suprise" Victoria with.

The woman grabbed the shirt and brought it to the counter where a slightly older female clerk was working.

Lauren said, "I like to purchase this shirt for my...friends."

The woman smiled and said....
1551112.title: The gift shop.

choices: Said no..This is just to odd for her
15511121.content:
"I'm sure you'll fit perfectly in this shirt ma'am! Now do you have anything else you want to purchase?" The clerk said, smiling, and rang up Lauren's item.

"Well it's really for my friend...And I don't think I could fit in a shirt that small!" Lauren said, laughing and expecting the sales women to hand her the bag.

"Nonsense! A young women like yourself could fit in this shirt! My daughter, at least your age, could fit in it! Be happy with your body at your age!" The clerk said, with a smile, but still didn't give the bag.

"I..I don't really think it would fit me haha!" Lauren said, getting more and more uncomfortable at this sales lady want of her to try the shirt on. Lauren, a patient girl, didn't reach for the bag.

"Tell you what! I'll pay for the shirt, and a pair of tinker bell pants, if you try them on in the dressing room!" The sales lady said, with a smile. Should Lauren do what this weird woman wants? What's the worst that could happen? Then again, she is a on schedule.

Lauren promptly..
15511121.title: "Of course, ma'am. Bring it up."

choices: Nicole and Victoria come to claim Lauren.
The clerk takes Lauren to the Disney Daycare Center.
15511122.content:
The woman smiled and said, "Hello, little girl. Are you lost?"

Lauren paused in confusion. She looked behind herself, thinking that the clerk was talking to an actual little girl nearby, but there was no little girl. Then, Lauren said, "Uhh..who exactly are you talking to?" The woman, once again, smiled at Lauren and giggled, "I was talking to you, sweetheart. Do you know where your Mommy is?"

Lauren backed away from the woman, showing off a bit of anger. She said, "Listen, lady. I think you need some glasses or something because I'm NO little girl! I'm a FUCKIN' grown woman!" Then, the clerk came from behind the counter and grabbed Lauren's hand and led her to the back of the shop. Lauren tried to struggle free from the woman's grasp, but...she couldn't find the strength to escape.

The woman dragged Lauren over to a big pole which was the park's speakers. She grabbed the red phone connected to it and announced, "IS ANYONE MISSING A LITTLE GIRL?" Lauren blushed into an intense red of total embarrassment and tried to cover herself using her Disney map. "IF ANYONE WISHES TO CLAIM THIS LITTLE GIRL, THEY MUST COME FOR AT THE DISNEY DAYCARE CENTER!" The middle-aged woman's eyes shot up in fear at the clerk. This was madness! She wasn't some lost child and she's too old for daycare!

Then...
15511122.title: Identity Confusion

choices: Victoria lets go and everything is normal again
155111221.content:
Nicole and Victoria come up to the clerk as fast as possible. "She's ours," Victoria said and quickly took Lauren's hand. "We're sorry about that. We don't know how she got away from us so quickly."

The clerk just nodded and let go of Lauren's hand and went back to her job. Lauren looked at Victoria and tried to get her to let go. "Well that was weird. You can let go now, Victoria, I'm fine," she said.
155111221.title: Nicole and Victoria come to claim Lauren.

choices: Nicole and Victoria come to claim Lauren from the daycare
155111222.content:
"Let go of me! I'm not a child!" Lauren yelled over and over again. She was ignored by the clerk and led to the daycare. The clerk told the worker that she was to stay here until someone came to claim her. The worker agreed and took Lauren's hand and guided her inside.

"Alright then, little girl. What's your name?" The worker asked.

"I am not a little girl!" Lauren grumbled.

"Of course not. I'm sure you're a very big girl, but I still need to know your name," the worker said.

"Lauren," she replied and rolled her eyes. The worker quickly wrote down Lauren's name on a sticker and stuck it on the front of her shirt.

"Okay, Lauren, you can go play. If you need anything just come see me," the worker said. She guided Lauren over to the toys and went back to help some of the other children.
155111222.title: The clerk takes Lauren to the Disney Daycare Ce...

1552.content:
"Better Babies Through Chemistry"

Synopsis: Socially inept boy-genius Herman Gethnor exacts his revenge on his big sister and her stuck up high school friends for tricking him into dressing-up like a baby the last time they had a sleepover at their house. The "Baby Hermy" photos that later circulated around school made life miserable for the boy.

Hatching a diabolical plan for revenge, the nerdy-but-determined Herman painstakingly researches, seeks out, and eventually obtains certain chemicals and medicines that he has saved for tonight to sprinkle over the teen princesses' pizza delivery.
1552.title: Tale #2

15521.content:
Prologue: Socially inept boy-genius Herman Gethnor exacts his revenge on his big sister and her stuck up high school friends for tricking him into dressing-up like a baby the last time they had a sleepover at their house. The "Baby Hermy" photos that later circulated around school made life miserable for the boy.
Hatching a diabolical plan for revenge, the nerdy-but-determined Herman painstakingly researches, seeks out, and eventually obtains certain chemicals and medicines that he has saved for tonight to sprinkle over the teen princesses' pizza delivery.


The four high school hotties are:

Alicia - Bitchy-but-beautiful blonde with a perfectly proportioned body. Loud and sarcastic. Queen of the cut-downs. The other girls all strive to be like Alicia.

Sandra - Brunette, long-legged knockout. Believed to be the one who actually snapped the photos while Herman wasn't looking. She does whatever Alicia tells her to do.

Jennifer - Herman's older sister. Arguably the "cutest" of the four girls. Hot body, and a pretty face with large brown eyes. She didn't even know about the texts of Herman being humiliated as a baby for the girl's amusement were circulating until it was too late to stop them. Still, here she is, inviting the same girls over for another party while the parents are away!

Lynn - Slender Asian with feline features and long, lustrous dark hair. She is likely the one who went the next step, and published the "Baby Hermy" photos to the web.
 
 

Beginning: An hour after eating the drugged pie, the four teen girls are placed into a helpless, baby-like state. While they are all still completely cognizant of their surroundings, and still have complete sensation in their limbs and digits, they have lost almost all coordination and balance, even the ability to speak clearly. Their pleas and cries only vocalize as "Wah!", Ga-ga!, "Goo-goo!" and similar baby-like blabbering. The best they can manage is to crawl on their bellies on the carpet. Even rolling over is a slow maneuver for the girls now.

Since they are already in cute sleeper wear, Herman only removes the assorted shorts, pajama bottoms, sweat pants, and of course panties and thongs of all four outraged girls. Next, the boy methodically wipes and powders all four hotties before fastening each into tight baby diapers with big pink safety pins and extra tape.

Herman leaves the small tee-shirts and tops they were already wearing on...for now. Two were already barefoot, and two are still wearing cute little socks.

Each girl then receives her own baby bib and rubber nipple. Finally, Herman gives two of the girls cute baby-bonnets to wear and gives the other two girls big ribbons and bows for their hair, completing the babyfication of his older sister and her mean friends.
 
 
 
As we enter the story:

Freckled and bespectacled little Herman sits down on a foot stool, hands on knees, back straight, and looking as pleased as a boy can look. On the floor to all sides below him, wiggling around, crying, and frantically trying to right themselves are four teenage mean girls clad only in diapers and tight, tiny tops.

"Your attention, brats!", announces Herman, "You are feeling the effects of a unique combination of muscle-relaxers and a rare nerve synapse suppressant. This is why you can't seem to form words or control your movement at all like you are used to. As you no doubt noticed while I wiped and diapered you, your ability to feel sensations or think hasn't been compromised in the least. You may also notice the effects of a stool softener and mild diuretic. Not to worry, though. That's why you're all powdered and wearing snug diapies! And you'll all still be pretty babies to me if you make messies or wee-wees. Oh, and the reason you are drooling on yourselves is due to the expectorant I threw in as an added touch. We have hours before my parents are due home, but don't worry girls, I'll be your sitter `til then.".
15521.title: "Better Babies Through Chemistry" Plot Beginning

155211.content:
[When the full realization of their situation hits them, all four teen hotties begin screaming and crying like, well, babies - while renewing their spastic efforts to right themselves or roll over, succeeding mostly in tangling up each other on the carpet.]
 
 
 
With a snide grin, Herman says, "Oh, now! Who's the fussy baby? Hmmm?

Is it widdle Alicia with her pretty bonnet and sockies on, acting like a crybaby?

Maybe it's my big baby sister? Don't fret, Jenny, I won't play favorites during this sleepover party!

Is it my lil' screamer Sandra, eyes and nose running like some snot-nosed brat?

Maybe quiet lil Lynn there, looking too sweet with her pretty hair tied into long ponytails like a baby-dolly?".

Suddenly, Herman's face lights up, as he snaps his fingers and says, "I know what this party needs! Let's make-up a fun game to play together!

Why don't we all play..."
155211.title: Play Time

1552111.content:
Herman then gently rolls each diaper-clad teen over onto their bellies, which only intensifies their fussing and wiggling. "By now, my pretty babies probably need to make tee-tee, don't you? Hmmm?
Laughing, he continues,
"So, here's how this game is played. When I say 'Go!', each of you will crawl as fast as you can over to the corners of the room, where a toy prize awaits you. The first two of you to bring me your toy will get to sit on the potty. The third place baby will have to wait until the other two are done, and the last place baby doesn't get to use potty at all.
Now...GO!"

Which girls carpet crawling do you want to follow along with?
1552111.title: "Baby Races"

15521112.content:
[The vengeful boy begins snapping photos of the teens laughable efforts to crawl across the floor towards their toys, diapered bottoms wagging back and forth.]


"Hurry lil' bratty babies! Bring me your toys, so we can take a potty break!", encourages Herman. "If you can't hold it until you make it back with your toy, I will put you into 'Time Out', and you'll be stuck wearing your wet diapies until I'm ready to change you again.".

Herman watches as Jennifer and Lynn frantically attempt to crawl across the carpet, their efforts uncoordinated, their muscles unsure, just like baby girls, only built like the high school babes they really are!

His big sister Jennifer reaches her toy, a rubber-ducky squeak-toy, and in her desperation win the cruel game, she picks it up by biting it and carrying it back in her mouth!

Meanwhile, petite, equally frantic Lynn isn't giving up, her teddybear clutched in one small fist and she now crawls, hampered slightly by the toy, back towards Herman, perched on his footstool like a little lord over the floorbound, humiliated girls.


[Herman continues laughing and using the girls own cell phones to take pictures and movies of them in their humiliating situation.]

Follow:
15521112.title: Jennifer or Lynn

1552112.content:
"Let's play the Tickle Monster Game!", smiles Herman, fingers wiggling in the air at each of the diapered teen babes. The girls are already desperately crawling away from him, having flipped themselves over onto their bellies, diaper-clad bottoms wagging back and forth as they slowly, clumsily fan out across the carpet.

Laughing, the malicious boy continues, "Don't you want to hear the rules? It's a minor variation on 'Hide-&-Seek'. While I count to one hundred, you brats try to find hiding places. Then, I let the Tickle Monster in. The Tickle Monster loves to find baby girls and tickle them until they wet themselves! Wait! Here's the good news! Any babies the Tickle Monster doesn't find after a half hour get to skip the tickling and make poopies and wee-wees on the potty just like big girls!".

Placing his hands over his eyes, Herman, laughs and loudly says, "GO!", as the discombobulated teenyboppers try to navigate their ways across the carpet, heads lolling around, forearms and lower legs practically useless, wailing and crying like little toddlers again.

"One-thousand-one. One-thousand-two, One thousand-three. One-thousa...", and the countdown begins.

Which teeny babes do you wish to follow during the Tickle Monster Game?
1552112.title: "Tickle Babies"

15521121.content:
"...One-thousand-hundred.", Herman finishes counting and opens his eyes. The room is silent, and unless one is hiding behind the couch, his uncoordinated babies have crawled out of the room to get as far away as possible from his 'Tickle Monster'. or at least further away than the other girls.

Grinning, Herman says to the quiet house, "Here's comes the Tickle Monster to play with naughty babies!"

The first girl the Tickle Monster finds is:
15521121.title: Sandra and/or Lynn?

15521122.content:
"...One-thousand-hundred.", Herman finishes counting and opens his eyes. The room is silent, and unless one is hiding behind the couch, his uncoordinated babies have crawled out of the room to get as far away as possible from his 'Tickle Monster'. or at least further away than the other girls.

Grinning, Herman says to the quiet house, "Here's comes the Tickle Monster to play with naughty babies!"

choices: He quickly finds the other three babies
He cannot find the other babies
155211222.content:
"The tickle monster's gonna find naughty babies and tickle them till they go pee-pee!", Herman calls out to the still silent house. Obiously the babies know really good hiding places, becuase even after searching the house once, Heman is still looking for a baby to tickle. On his second time around, he sees a tiny bit of white diaper hiding behind a desk, and he tiptoes over. Then with a loud "Gotcha!", he drags Jennifer out into the open. Jennifer claws at the ground and the desk walls to get away from the tickle monster, but Herman rolls Jennifer over onto her stomach and starts tickling Jennifer.

"The tickle monster's gonna make you wet your diapie!", Herman says, glee in his voice as Jennifer starts to giggle against her will. It doesn't take long for a huge yellow blotch to form on the front of Jennifer's diaper as she giggles uncontrollably. Herman takes his thumbs and pushes them deep into his sister's soft stomach skin. Then, starting with small circles, Herman massages Jennifer's tummy until you hear a soft "Frrrrrt..." in the back of Jennifer's diaper. He turns her over, to do a diaper check, and as he expected, the back of the diaper is filled with a huge amount of soft poop. Then, Herman carries Jennifer over to a huge playpen, dropping her in on her messy diaper.

Even thought they're drugged at the moment, the girls obliously knew that spankings was serious business. Herman, padding the paddle sinfully, said, "So, who's gonna get spankies first?"
155212.title: Who's Gonna Get A Spanking?

1552121.content:
By now, three of the teen beauties have successfully rolled over onto their bellies, and are trying to crawl away across the carpet from Herman and his wooden paddle. Herman laughs watching their diapered butts wagging back and forth as the sobbing girls make a futile attempt at escape.

15531.content:
Regression Reunion

On the first day of the Family Reunion Weekend, 52 year old Carrie becomes upset that her 25 year old daughter Zoey doesn't seem to care about having children, and argues with her, embarrassing her own daughter and getting the family reunion off to a terrible start. That night, Carrie wishes on a falling star for her daughter to have a cute baby as soon as possible. The next morning, Carrie wakes up in a crib and diaper, with everyone beleiving she is Zoey's brand new baby girl.
15531.title: Regression Reunion

choices: Carrie decides to join the rest of the family for dinner
Carrie suddenly becomes very tired and falls asleep.
155311.content:
Carrie slammed the door of her hotel room, still fuming over the incident with her daughter.

"Why won't Zoey listen to me?" Carrie frantically said to no one as she paced around the room. "All I want is a grandchild. Why is she so against it?"

Carrie took a deep breath and walks out onto her balcony to get some fresh air. She looks longingly at the starry night sky, and sees a falling star. Carrie remembers back to her childhood, when her own mother told her about wishing.

"I wish my daughter would just have a baby." Carrie said
155311.title: The Wish

choices: Carrie wakes up the next morning in a crib.
Carrie has a extremely strange dream that night.

As soon as the words left het mouth, a large feeling of sleepyness falls over the unsuspecting Carrie. Carrie lets out a huge yawn, and walks back inside.

"Well, I'm beat. It's been a long day."

Carrie looks at the clock and sees that it is only 6:30.

"Why am I tired this early? I must be getting old." Carrie thought as she climbed into the hotel bed. "All the more reason for Zoey to have me a kid."

Carrie fell asleep almost as soon as she laid flat on the bed. She smiled as she fell asleep, not realizing the changes in her life that would occur tomorrow.
1553112.title: Carrie suddenly becomes very tired and falls as...

15532.content: A young college student named Jennifer heard rumors of a witch living in the woods outside of the town she lives in. When deciding to investigate one day, she realized that not only were the rumors true, but she found herself in the witch's spell where Jennifer was mentally regressed to that of an infant and is now being mothered by that said witch.
15532.title: Tale #4 Enchanted Mother

choices: A figure appears in the distance...
New and conflicting feelings and thoughts arise in Jennifer's mind.
155321.content:
"Hmmmm...."

Jennifer wonder down through the deep, dank woods, shining her flashlight through the black trees and the dead bushes. "Can't believe this; there's NO such things as witches," She said to herself, chuckling. "Victoria's such a dumbass, making up dumb....crap..."

At that moment, she suddenly smelt something weird in the air...it almost smelt like....baby powder.
155321.title: Deep Down in the Woods

1553211.content:
Jennifer looked ahead and spotted a figure in the distance. It was shrouded by fog but she could make out that the figure was feminine in appearance. Upon seeing the figure she didn't think that it was a witch, but a lost hiker instead.

"Hello?" Jennifer hollered, "Are you lost?"

The figure did not respond. It just stood there instead. Jennifer got a bit closer and the smell of baby powder got stronger so she stopped. Still the figure was too shrouded in the fog for her to make out any details. Just then the figure motioned to Jennifer as if she wanted her to come to her. She was a bit frightened but for some odd reason she was compelled to accept the invitation so she decided to come closer. Closer and closer the figure started to show some details in the fog. The lady had black hair and what looked like a dark-blue dressed but was ragged.

"Do you live around these parts?" Jennifer asked.

She got no response again. Jennifer got close enough until she saw the person's magenta lips. When she got close enough, the figure...
1553211.title: A figure appears in the distance...

choices: ...snickered and strapped her into an adult-sized baby carrier on her chest.
15532111.content:
Jennifer blinks, rubbing her eyes and coughing. "Hey! What the hell was that, you...you...." Her voice began to trail off as she started losing balance and her vision started to warp and double on her.

The mysterious woman revealed an devious-looking smirk, showing off a pair of sharpen teeth. "My, my...." she said with a sickeningly sweet tone. "Are you lost, little one? Where's your mommy and daddy?" Jennifer looked up at her with what little strength she had and said, "W-What? I'm like 18...I'm not a...chi...chi...."

"Child?" The woman finished.

With that, Jennifer could no longer keep her strength up nor her eyes open and immediately dropped into the group, blacking out. The woman, deciding to take pity on the poor child....

The woman decided to walk back to her cabin, deciding what to do to the girl. There were so many options that she couldn't decide what to do first. She pondered and pondered until she came to a decision. The woman decided to...
155321111.title: ...snickered and strapped her into an adult-siz...

She heads towards the front door.

Suck, suck, suck, suck....

15533212.content:
Lilly was on her last nerve, her baby boy, Max, was crying up a storm while she was shopping for him at babies 'r' us, getting more supplies to last the week, and she was so frayed, that when she saw a baby rattle to replace the one he'd lost, she didn't read the label as she gave it to him.

"Hypno rattles", the label said, and on the back it described that all one had to do was shake it while saying something, and it would hypnotize those who heard it by rephrasing whatever was said, but not the one shaking it.

They'd ended up at the store as a result of a clerical error, and poor Lilly was about to suffer the consequences, not noticing the employees carting away the rest of the rattle display to return them, as Max had calmed down significantly and was enjoying his new rattle.

A quick trip through checkout, and they were on their way home, in the rear view mirror, she saw Max using his diaper. "That's right, baby, just go in your diaper, mommy will change you once we get home."

But with the rattle being shook by her son, her head was now being programmed with "Just go in your diaper, change once we get home."

"Just go in your diaper, change once we get home." Echoed in her mind, and wormed it way into the deepest recesses of her subconscious, until it was a part of her. And so she did, unleashing the full might of her bladder on her poor panties and business skirt,, but not noticing anything. It wasn't until she hit a traffic light when she noticed that her seat was wet.

"Did my diaper leak?" Lilly asked, lifting her skirt, but only seeing some useless panties, now soaked, underneath, "When did I put these on?" She wondered, "No matter, I'll just pull over." Pulling over to a drug store, she reached in the back for her diaper bag, but didn't see it there.

Sighing, she grabbed her son and his diaper bag before heading into the drug store, headed for the incontinence supplies, not noticing the other shoppers or the employees giving her odd looks, following their noses. Grabbing a few sets of diapers her size, she went into the bathroom to change her son's diaper first before she swapped out her skirt and panties for a large adult diaper, powdering herself, and strapping on the diaper. "Uh ma'am," the uncomfortable cashier asked Lilly, "did you forget something?" The poor cashier was just a high school senior who was trying to earn herself a few extra bucks.

Lilly was surprised at the question, and answered "No, those panties were no good, so I wear diapers so I don't make a mess."

Little Max was shaking his rattle as she said this and the people around them all were ingrained with "Wear diapers so I don't make a mess"

The cashier nodded dumbly before realizing she wasn't wearing a diaper, and dashing off to get a pack before she ruined her pants.

Lilly, now with a diaper her size and several spares, drove the rest of the way home. As she carried her son and the grocery bags in the house, she stopped a bit to dump a full load in her diaper, before continuing her way inside.

"Why did you mess yourself in a diaper? Are you a baby inside or something?" Gwen asked as the rattle embedded 'mess yourself in a diaper, you are a baby inside' in both Lilly and Gwens minds.

"Of course dear." Lilly said as she began carrying the baby supplies, and her own newlyweds purchased supplies upstairs, "Not like I'm potty trained." 'Not potty trained' echoed in both minds with the previous commands.

Gwen, now with the commands floating in her head, released her bowels and bladder on herself, soiling her jeans.

Lilly, coming back downstairs with her new diaper on after changing herself, saw the soiled pants on her daughter and called her over to change her, before both were shocked that Gwen wasn't wearing a diaper, and promptly fixing the problem.
1553321211.title: Lilly's daughter sees her

15533212111.content:
After diapering her daughter, Lilly sat Max and Gwen in front of the tv so they could watch Blues Clues together, and they wanted to because of the command 'baby inside'. While they were watching, Lilly saw how nice it was outside, and decided to play outside instead of watching tv, so she took the family out back (a very secluded backyard) to play. Not wanting to have to do too much laundry, Lilly took off all of Max's clothes, leaving him in just his diaper.

"Play in just your diaper Max, I don't want to have laundry to do." Max shook his rattle as she headed over to the swings.

'Play in just diaper' echoed in their minds, and Gwen and Lilly stripped themselves down until the diaper was all that they were wearing too.

Swinging in what was almost their birthday suits, Lilly and Gwen were having a fun time until Lilly saw saw Max heading over to her garden, and she rushed over, not wanting him to get dirty. "No Max!" She said as she picked him up, "don't play in the garden, you'll get dirty."

'Play in the garden, get dirty' echoed in their minds, and Lilly and Gwen decided to play with Max in the garden, getting dirt and mud everywhere.
15533212111.title: More hypnotic commands

choices: Head back out to the store
155332121112.content: After getting the mud all over themsleves and in every creaves of their diaper gwen and the others decide to head inside to take baths gwen was outside rhe bathroom with the door cracked when lily set max down to bathe him she said "i wish you could bathe me someday" and suddenly "bathe me" rang through gwen and lilys minds lily and gwen were confused why they werent all in the bath together so they all hopped in and began to scrub each other as if it were completely normal after that they decide to.
155332121112.title: Head inside for a bath

1553322.content:
No, that's not the story! The story we've got here is:

You're an 18 year old girl named Ashlyn who's just gotten back from college, you got a scholarship when you were in 10th grade, and everybody is just being mean to you. Mostly your mother and sister, they're teasing you about being so smart. They were blonde, anyways. You were a slim woman, with that perfect curve around the hips and some odd D-size breasts. You had the cutest face that always showed when you were blushing, and you had long brown hair that went down to the middle of your back.

This is the story we've got, isn't it?
1553322.title: Not at all!

15533221.content:
It's been just one week, and already you've been picked on so much by your mother and sister. Well, one day when you wake up, you find a watch-looking thing on your dresser right beside your computer. The PC had opened up a text document saying:

"Dearest Ashlyn,

I've noticed you are having some problems with your return from college. Take this watch, it'll allow you to change reality or hypnotize people's minds at your will. It's specially made to where only you know about it, and only you can use it. Nobody else will even be able to see the thing.


If you're wondering who I am, let's just say I'm your guardian angel."

Well then. That just happened. So, you put on the watch, and since you and your friends have been having sleepovers with a lot of truth or dares ending up putting someone in diapers recently, you decide to mess with your ___'s world.
15533221.title: After 1 week of torture...

choices: ..put her in a diaper and make her mess it.
make her wet and mess the bed.
155332212.content:
Yeah, your sister, Samantha or "Sammy" for short, is the one that's been REALLY picking on you lately. So, you decide to mess with her.

She's got short, blonde hair, and a mediumly-slim body. She's actually pretty weighty. She wears glasses that make her eyes HUGE. So, you go into her room, she's still asleep. You...
155332212.title: Sister Samantha.

choices: or do you make her wet the couch?
1553322122.content:
You decide to make her go to the bathroom in the bed. She sleeps with just a shirt on, nothing else. You never knew why she did it though. She was liable to a number of situations like this. One being her current situation.

You push a button on the watch and you hear her stomach grumble loudly. At first nothing happened, but then she threw her covers off and lay flat on her back. Immediatly you noticed the bed was entirely wet, all of the top. She really messed it. Like, it was all over the bed. It went down to her knees. Jeez, you wonder how powerful this watch is. You decide to be a little nice and change her appearance and make her a little more slim, change her hair color, and get rid of those horrid glasses. Well, she looked slightly better. Blondes were naturally idiots, anyways.

So, you leave her bedroom and head downstairs. Your mother has to sleep on the couch, she snores really loud and it bothers your father at night.

Your father. Boy, he wasn't like the other two. He's the only proud one. Once you stepped through the front door, he was right there with a Monster drink in his hand. That was his way of congratulating you. With a drink. He knew you loved Monster, anyways.

You get down into the living room and sit down quietly. You look at your mother with a devilish look in your eyes. What do you do to her? Do you..
1553322122.title: Eww! Gross!

15533221222.content:
You zap the watch at her and she immediately starts to wet the couch. And she wakes up too.

"W.. ugh..." Never was a morning person, your mother.
"H..what the.. is the couch.. wet?!" She screamed.

You snicker as you go back upstairs to check on your sister to see if she's awake yet. Sure enough, she's awake and she's freaking the flip-flop diddly-doo out! You zap the watch again at her to make her think it was natural for her to do this, and then again to change her underwear drawer to..

info.brief_description: 8 Tales of Mental Regression! And now you can make your own tales!
info.description:
Welcome to the "World's Strangest Adult Babies Tales"! Prepare yourself as you jump into eight stories filled with magic, strangeness and diapers!

Rules:
1.) No "fat" adult baby stories.
2.) The only regression allowed is MENTAL
3.) The plot cannot interact with each other. (Secondary characters are only things that are allowed to be used in the other plots!)
4.) No sex
5.) No swearing the Devil's words! (Only use them for truly funny bits.)
6.) No ridiculous long "other" paths; stick to the story!
7.) Entries MUST be at the length of a paragraph; one sentence is not acceptable.
8.) Have fun!

The "World's Strangest Adult Babies Tale" is personally dedicated to Yoshi king and "fivefooteight", the two authors would have inspired me for making this and for their own awesomely cool stories as well!

-The Creep E. Crawly Man
info.pretty_title: The World's Strangest Adult Babies Tales
